Title: $27 / hr - Plus Benefits - Class A CDL Truck Driver

Title: Make $60,000+ and Get PAID to Learn
Description: Get Paid While You Get Your CDL Looking to become a professional truck driver?  Join Roehl and you'll be paid $500 when you work a full week as you get your CDL. You are hired and paid as an employee on day 1. Training to obtain your CDL is part of the job. You’ll earn while you learn in our four-week CDL training program, located at our local terminal in Northwest Indiana. Once you have your CDL, you'll continue getting paid on the job training with a Certified Driver Trainer (between 2-3 weeks). From there, Roehl drivers are making $60,000 or more a year.  After you have your CDL, you'll start your on-the-job training as a long haul truck driver. Join our team and grow with us! If you were to go to a CDL school, you would not get paid while you are training AND you'd have to come up with the tuition for the school.  We're a stable company that provides full benefits - we invest in you. Because the demand for this popular program is so strong, the first step is to complete our Get Started form on Roehl.Jobs   http://www.roehlrefer.me/gycdl-cl-ad If you contact Roehl by email, please include your first name, last name, email address, phone number, zip code and if you already have Class A CDL in your message so we can connect with you. You can also provide this information on our website. You will then move through a learning and application process, where we ensure that you have a good understanding of the program, the basic qualifications and the characteristics of a truck driving job with Roehl so you can complete a thoughtful and informed application.    Premium Benefits Roehl offers a complete benefits package to truck drivers, including one of the top profit-sharing contributions among US trucking companies, to support drivers and their families. In a truck driving job with Roehl, you'll find our benefits both comprehensive and affordable. Learn more about our pay, benefits and why so many experienced truck drivers choose Roehl.  Career Path Opportunities Want to advance your career? Whether you're an experienced driver, an owner operator or just starting out in the industry, with Roehl you'll find a wide variety of options both inside and out of the truck. Dedicated fleets offer many unique schedule, pay and freight options. In certain areas, local truck driving positions are regularly available for drivers with six months experience. You can also become a Certified Driver Trainer. From owning your own business to becoming an instructor - including non-driving positions  - your career path with Roehl is filled with options.  About Roehl Transport and our Truck Driving Jobs Roehl Transport provides professional truck driving jobs for those who are looking for a long-lasting career with a forward-thinking, driver-oriented company that is built on values. Our truck driver jobs include all levels of experience, as well as flatbed/specialized, van, refrigerated, and curtainside cargo. •         Experienced Company Truck Drivers •         Owner Operators •         New Drivers CDL School Graduates •         Learn to Drive a Truck (We will pay you while you get your CDL) Roehl also provides career opportunities for non-drivers. Roehl is one of the 100 largest trucking companies in the nation. Our customers include some of the most prestigious brand names in America. When you join Roehl you'll be part of a hands-on family business with people that are passionate about delivering the goods that drive America - we're giving trucking a new name. Roehl Transport Our drivers are leaders.  Our leader is a driver. Title: Make $60,000+ and Get PAID to Learn
Description: Get Paid While You Get Your CDL Looking to become a professional truck driver?  Join Roehl and you'll be paid $500 when you work a full week as you get your CDL. You are hired and paid as an employee on day 1. Training to obtain your CDL is part of the job. You’ll earn while you learn in our four-week CDL training program, located at our local terminal in Northwest Indiana. Once you have your CDL, you'll continue getting paid on the job training with a Certified Driver Trainer (between 2-3 weeks). From there, Roehl drivers are making $60,000 or more a year.  After you have your CDL, you'll start your on-the-job training as a long haul truck driver. Join our team and grow with us! If you were to go to a CDL school, you would not get paid while you are training AND you'd have to come up with the tuition for the school.  We're a stable company that provides full benefits - we invest in you. Because the demand for this popular program is so strong, the first step is to complete our Get Started form on Roehl.Jobs   http://www.roehlrefer.me/gycdl-cl-ad If you contact Roehl by email, please include your first name, last name, email address, phone number, zip code and if you already have Class A CDL in your message so we can connect with you. You can also provide this information on our website. You will then move through a learning and application process, where we ensure that you have a good understanding of the program, the basic qualifications and the characteristics of a truck driving job with Roehl so you can complete a thoughtful and informed application.    Premium Benefits Roehl offers a complete benefits package to truck drivers, including one of the top profit-sharing contributions among US trucking companies, to support drivers and their families. In a truck driving job with Roehl, you'll find our benefits both comprehensive and affordable. Learn more about our pay, benefits and why so many experienced truck drivers choose Roehl.  Career Path Opportunities Want to advance your career? Whether you're an experienced driver, an owner operator or just starting out in the industry, with Roehl you'll find a wide variety of options both inside and out of the truck. Dedicated fleets offer many unique schedule, pay and freight options. In certain areas, local truck driving positions are regularly available for drivers with six months experience. You can also become a Certified Driver Trainer. From owning your own business to becoming an instructor - including non-driving positions  - your career path with Roehl is filled with options.  About Roehl Transport and our Truck Driving Jobs Roehl Transport provides professional truck driving jobs for those who are looking for a long-lasting career with a forward-thinking, driver-oriented company that is built on values. Our truck driver jobs include all levels of experience, as well as flatbed/specialized, van, refrigerated, and curtainside cargo. •         Experienced Company Truck Drivers •         Owner Operators •         New Drivers CDL School Graduates •         Learn to Drive a Truck (We will pay you while you get your CDL) Roehl also provides career opportunities for non-drivers. Roehl is one of the 100 largest trucking companies in the nation. Our customers include some of the most prestigious brand names in America. When you join Roehl you'll be part of a hands-on family business with people that are passionate about delivering the goods that drive America - we're giving trucking a new name. Roehl Transport Our drivers are leaders.  Our leader is a driver. Title: INDY O/O'S ARE YOU STILL RUNNING FOR 1ST QUARTER RATES? $3K+ NET!
Description: THIS IS WHAT YOUR COMPANY WILL NOT TELL YOU, BUT I WILL!  Try to visualize this map in your mind: all freight moving from the south going north to Detroit, MI and back west to Milwaukee, WI moves for an average of $2.50-$5.00 per mile, sometimes more, and the deadhead should be as minimal as 100 miles per week. If you are not getting at least 70% of those kind of rates you are being under paid!  All of these companies out there offering $.95-$1.50 plus FSC per mile are making approximately $2.00-$3.00 per mile on your truck after your cut, and that is ridiculous! This is the opportunity for you to get a fair percentage of daily market rates in what is more than likely the best market and economy most of us have ever seen in our professional careers! The consumer is spending, unemployment is lower than what it has been in 48 years, and freight is moving at incredible volume and the rates are higher than they have ever been in our industry! If the carrier you are signed on with isn't showing you these kind of rates, then one of two things are happening: (1) they are hauling extremely cheap freight, or (2) they are not being honest with you about how much they are being paid--"probably the second scenario"! You should be running for a minimum of $2.00 per mile to your truck after the carrier's cut, and that is a "minimum" of $2.00 per mile. Most of the time you should be making more than $2.00 per mile!  We email all of our O/O's every contract and rate con for every load you haul! You see every rate on the real contract, not some make believe contract/rate sheet that a crooked operations manager put together on an excel spreadsheet! We are pretty sure we are the only company in this area doing this!  Our owner operators take home $3000-$4000 every week after fuel and deductions, not gross that's take home, with an average of around 2200-2500 miles per week!  Notice the lack of "BS" in this ad/rant; that's because this program was designed and developed by a former O/O of over 20 years! We truly understand what it takes to run a truck, support maintenance and make the money you should be making! RESPECT and HONESTY are the most important aspects of our company!  Ask your dispatcher to send you the rate sheet, and if he says "NO" then they are skimming money off the top! If they are giving you a true percentage of the rate they should show you the contract "rate con" and anyone running for mileage pay is definitely being under paid!  We are a locally owned and operated trucking company. We have 24 hour dispatch. Everyone in our operations office is either a former driver or the son/daughter/wife of a driver. Our Safety Director drove for 20 years before becoming our Safety Director 14 years ago!  We have plenty of regional lanes for O/O's and company drivers! We do have long haul as well for the drivers who like to stay out longer!   NO CONTAINERS! NO MICROMANAGING! NO NICKEL-AND-DIMING!  NO AGE LIMIT ON TRUCKS! 99'S AND OLDER ARE WELCOME!  WE OFFER: <>MAINTENANCE HELP PROGRAM <>100% NO TOUCH FREIGHT <>PRE-PASS PLUS ELITE  <>BASE PLATE PROGRAM <>IFTA PROGRAM--WE FILE YOUR FUEL TAXES FOR YOU <>100% FREE TRAILER USAGE WITH NO MAINTENANCE COST TO YOU <>NO CARGO INSURANCE EXPENSSES  <>ROADSIDE INSPECTION BONUS <>RIDER POLICY <>COMDATA FUEL CARDS <>WEEKLY SETTLEMENTS <>ADP PAYROLL CO. DIRECT DEPOSIT EVERY WEEK <>24/7 DISPATCH WITH EXPIERIANCED DISPATCHERS THAT HAVE EXTENSIVE KNLOWLEDGE OF THE INDUSTRY <>NO FORCED DISPATCH <>NO HAZMAT <>FAMILY OWNED COMPANY <>LOW EXPENSES  For more information please call or text 513-608-3517   Do not hesitate to text with any questions, or concerns you may have!  Check us out here!  This is a class A CDL Regional/OTR position, we require 2 years recent OTR experience and over the age of 25 with a clean driving record!  • At least 2 years verifiable Class 'A' Tractor-Trailer experience • No positive and/or refused drug and alcohol test(s) • Stable work history and good safety record • NO serious violations in the last 3 years  Thank you for reading! Title: Truck Driver @ Taylor's Bakery
Description: This job is a guaranteed 40 hours per week, Monday through Saturday. The start time is 5:00 a.m.  The Driver transports all goods between our 2 locations and makes all local deliveries.  The driver would be required to drive a box truck, cargo vans, and transfer transport cabinets.  Driver must have a valid Driver’s License, safety skills, and common sense.  Previous driving experience preferred, but not required.  Our insurance company will run a Motor Vehicle check on your drivers license, so please don't apply for this position unless you are confident in your driving history.  Please apply at:  www.jointaylorsbakery.com

Title: CDL A | $7,500 sign on | Home Weekends + 1 time during week | Per Diem
Description: This truck driver position provides the opportunity for you to get home on weekends and once during the week. Primarily run OH, IN, IL, WI, MI in the Midwest. Wisconsin is a common destination. Although Culture  is hard to describe, you will notice something unique about this family run business. We take a lot of drama out of trucking and focus on the needs of the driver and the customer. The new mileage pay package combined with our freight mix offers consistent work, miles and weekly paychecks.HO Wolding Application  Home weekends + once during the week   Practical Mile   Up to $.535 per mile   Top 20% of drivers earn >$76,000  $7,500 sign on bonus 2,200-2,800 miles each week Per Diem Pay=$66/day Detention Pay=$20/hr after 2 hours 50% Drop and Hook ELD Compliant New Pay Package OTR and Team positions also availableJob Requirements Class A CDL 6 months of recent experience Will consider recent driving school graduates No major accidents or tickets in the last 3 years Safe place to park truck and trailer during home timeBenefits Blue Cross and Blue Shield Medical Dental and vision insurance Paid time off 401kAbout HO WoldingFounded in 1935 by Herbert Wolding, HO Wolding has grown from a one-man milk route to a nationally recognized dry van carrier operating over 300 tractors across the continental United States. A Wisconsin-based company, HO Wolding operates on the small-town integrity and values that were set forth from the outset. In 2019, HO Wolding was acquired by Bison Transport, one of Canada’s largest fleets that has been recognized as one of North America’s Safest Fleets and have been consistently named one of the Best Fleets to Drive For. With this partnership, HO Wolding is available to offer drivers the service and culture of a smaller trucking company with the resources and efficiency of a large corporation.  HO Wolding Application Keywords: cdl, cdl driver, cdl a license, cdl-a, cdl class a, cdl class a license, cdl license class a, tractor trailer driver, commercial driver, class a cdl driver, professional driver, cdl-a driver, cdl a truck driver, class a cdl driver, cdl truck driver, cdl commercial truck driver, cdla, truck driver, truck driving job, home time, solo truck driver, truck driving jobs, truck driver, class a driver.

Title: Magnum Express, Inc. - Midwest Regional Dry Van - Class A CDL
Description: Magnum Express, Inc. has been voted one of the Best Places to Work in Indiana for 7 out of the last 8 years by the Indiana Chamber of Commerce! Get rewarded for being one of the BEST drivers in the industry!   Our new pay scale tops out at $.60/mi! Come be a part of our All-Star Team of Drivers!  Magnum Drivers start at $.50/mi. OR MORE plus a $.02/mi. GOOD DRIVER BONUS, $5000.00 SIGN-ON BONUS AND...THREE RAISES THE FIRST YEAR! Give us a call so we can see if YOUR years of service can benefit you here at Magnum!     BENEFITS OF BECOMING A MAGNUM EXPRESS DRIVER:   INDUSTRY LEADING PAY! Start at $.50/mi. or more loaded and empty!   Good Driver Bonus paid monthly at $.02/mi. on all miles driven that month!   Three raises the first year! Annual $.01/mi. raises on your hire date each year after that up to year 10!  Receive an EXTRA check (vacation bonus checks) after EVERY 50K miles!   Medical! Vision! Dental! Life! 401k! Health Savings Account! Aflac! More!   Magnum drivers are home EVERY weekend. That's the way it's always been. Take the truck and trailer home with you. Or, if you live close enough, you can park at the Magnum yard for the weekend. You choose!   70%-80% drop and hook. Midwest Regional. Dry Van.   Newer Equipment. (2015's, 2016's AND 2018's AND... 2019's) Well Maintained. Great CSA Scores!   Magnum freight is 100% no-touch.   Free ride-along program.   One, small dog is ok. No cats, alligators, etc. :o)   Weekly Direct Deposit.   Come be a part of Magnum's All Star Team of Drivers...where the drivers really do make the difference.    To be eligible, drivers must:   Have at least 2-years, verifiable, OTR experience.   Have a good driving record   Have a good MVR   Have a Class A CDL   Be able to pass a pre-employment drug screen   Give me a call for more details, OR go to www.gomagnum.com to fill out the application!   Thanks,  Bob Kendall  866-218-3489 x225   Magnum Express, Inc. Title: $$ CDL A - TRUCK DRIVER - 56c $1600+ per week DRY VAN only $$
Description: $$ CDL A - TRUCK DRIVER - 56c $1600+ per week DRY VAN only $$   Growing trucking company is looking for a CDL A truck driver. We are family owned style company trying our best to make sure you are satisfied with our service and your pay check! Out of state drivers are welcome! You keep same truck and trailer all the time and take it home for your home time.  We are paying 56c per mile. ALL MILES paid, empty and loaded. We run Dry Van's only, BEST PAY IN DRY VAN industry!  - We pay every Friday, direct deposit - Cash Advances - Extra stops, layovers, detention, breakdown all PAID  - Reliable, well maintained equipment, 2015 and newer Freightliners with 2019 models available - Trucks equipped with a driver in mind, refrigerator, power inverter and microwave in the trucks. - Driver friendly environment with 24/hr dispatch and breakdown support. You will have 1 dedicated dispatcher looking over all your loads and needs. Were we are trying to keep one-on-one relationship so everything can be addressed right away.  - Occupational Accident insurance - Driver Referral Bonus Program - We pay 1099 - No-Violation Inspection Bonus Program - Quality home time - No New York City or Canada. Driver no touch freight, no hazmat, flat beds or reefers - GREAT OPTIONS FOR TEAMS!!! Ask us about a team program - Steady year round business with plenty of miles available - Pre-Pass and Toll Pass covers every state - Drivers are averaging $1600 per week  Requirements:  Be at least 23 years of age, Valid CDL class "A", Valid Med Card, 1 year of verifiable experience    THANK YOU AND WILL SEE YOU ON THE TEAM! PLEASE CALL 708-887-2222 JAMIE FOR MORE INFO

Title: Class A CDL Truck Drivers
Description: Brite Logistics, Inc. is a well-recognized logistics company and has been a leader in the transportation industry for 10-years!  We offer the following Class A CDL truck driver positions:  OTR Drivers: Earn $0.52 per mile (W2) Earn $0.60 per mile (1099) 2500 miles or more per week including loading over the weekend  Team Drivers: Earn $0.70 per mile 5000 miles or more per week including loading over the weekend  Owner-Operators: 80% of the loads gross if hauling our Company's trailer 88% of the loads gross if hauling your own trailer  Why Brite Logistics Inc.: 24/7 highly rated professional dispatchers 24/7 truck maintenance support Owned fleet of 200 trucks and 400 trailers Brand new trucks equipped with APU units, Volvo VNL and Freightliner Cascadia Dry van only, no hazmat Secured yards in Chicago and Philadelphia Brand new truck sleeping rooms for drivers at Chicago location Dedicated customer loads, dedicated lanes Drop and hook Direct deposit Orientation hiring bonus Wellness Program - LA fitness discount.  Requirements 1 year of relevant experience Good MVR and PSP records CDL class A  Please call or text: • Phone: (773) 362-5863 – Mary • For more info, please visit our website: https://www.britelogistics.com/ • Feel free to check out Brite video: https://youtu.be/6Nhpia5SJ1M

Title: Class A Driver - .60 a mile - HOME WEEKENDS
Description: Need Regional Class A Driver who lives in the Indianapolis area.  $2000.00 hire on bonus for new hires   Company has endless drop and hook freight available. Established company based out of Indiana with over 100 trailers in fleet.  EMPTY TRUCK IS AVAILABLE WAITING FOR A QUALIFIED DRIVER Truck is equipped with a apu, fridge and inverter.   Majority of the freight will be going to and from- Louisville, Chicago, Detroit, Columbus, Cincinnati   You will be dispatched and kept moving at all times.     REGIONAL CONTRACTED DEDICATED DROP AND HOOK DRY Van -  -NEW PAY PLAN-  Driver has 2 options.    Pay is .60 a mile  Or Driver keeps 50% of the revenue after fuel and expenses.  Truck averages NET ranges from 2900 to 3800 a week.  Weekend work is limited but one can drop on Saturday or perhaps pull out Sunday night.  A lot of the shippers and receivers are open deliveries and for the driver who is a go getter can allow a driver to cover lots of loads.    Which ever is greater the driver will get paid.  Driver is in full control of the end pay for the week.   Average pay this options is 1400.00 per week    You will be a contracted driver with Bohren Logistics and be dispatched out of Indianapolis terminal.    Orientation Pay Breakdown Pay    Experience Needed:  2 years recent CDL Class A -  NO Hazmat needed. No accidents last 2 years No 15+ mile over Acceptable MVR and Safety report.   What we offer -  NO touch freight 75% dedicated drop and hook No hidden issues on PSP report.    There is an office and yard in Indy where you can park the truck and your car.  We will get you home on weekends.  No hazmat - No reefer - No overnight runs -  Looking to fill position asap   If your ready to start making money consistently every week and wanna stay nearby home ...   Questions call?    Mark Preisler 858-692-6689
Compensation: .60 a mile or 50% of net revenue- Home weekends

Title: Dedcated Regional work
Description: Morristown Express hauls food grade liquids. (Soybean oil, corn syrup and chocolates) and has openings for Class A Drivers to run a mix of regional and local freight.   Morristown is a 35 truck fleet that runs a dedicated local and regional operation with occasional long haul opportunities for its professional drivers.   Drivers for Morristown Express can expect:  • An average income of between $1200 to $1400 / week  • Top drivers can earn over $68,000  • $1,100 / week minimum “Guaranteed Transition Pay” for 8 weeks starting 2nd week  • New drivers earn a $500 Bonus after 12th week of employment  • Off weekends for drivers that stay in truck during the week  • Dedicated customer base.  Repeat lanes  • Assigned equipment with free XM  • Paid orientation and tank training  • Full benefits package: Medical, Dental, Vision & 401(k)  • $950.00 Gross weekly minimum guarantee pay agreement   General Driver Qualifications:  • Class A CDL with at least 12 months tractor trailer experience preferred  • Tanker endorsement (not needed to apply)  • The ability to pass DOT physical and drug screen  • Truck parking at home or terminal.    To apply please click here to APPLY NOW, or call 855.525.2855

Title: Semi-Local Dedicated CDL A Truck Driver – Home All Weekend!
Description: Join West Side Transport to continue your wonderful career as a Class A CDL Truck Driver by choosing our Home Daily position. As a Home Daily Driver, you will be running close to home freight to various customers in the region. Depending on experience you can expect to make $55,000 to $65,000/year. Come to the Best Side and Work for West Side –  APPLY TODAY! West Side Transport Offers: $55,000 to $70,000/year ($.55 - $.75 cents per mile) Home Daily PTO Bonus - Earn 16 days off/year! (All home daily positions only) 2016 or Newer Truck 401K Company Match Full Benefits – Medical, Vision, Dental Driver App – receive all driver info. on your phone!  Week Snapshot: A typical week has our drivers running 5 days per week, Monday through Friday. All drivers can typically make 2 to 3 turns per day, with the majority of the freight being customer freight and 99% no touch. Weekend freight is available upon request but not mandatory. Requirements Valid Class A CDL 6+ months experience Schedule flexibility Delivering Quality Service by the Truckload - APPLY TODAY!

Title: CDL A Drivers (26-31% pay, home wknds) !!!
Description: CDL A Drivers (26-31% pay, home wknds) !!!   Located in Alsip, we specialize in hauling flatbed, conestoga and dry van loads ranging from lumber to coils and oversize. Even though we are a company located in Illinois, we hire our drivers from all over the United States. We have dedicated regional lanes and some long distance, so we are positive we will find something that suits your needs.  PAY & BENEFITS:  - Start pay is from 26 to 31 % with a sign on bonus for qualified drivers. - Average driver is driving anywhere from 1,500 - 3,000 miles per week. - AOBRD or ELD Log Books (Omnitracs) - 24/7 dispatch availability - Direct deposit - Fuel Cards, I-Pass - Paid Occupational Insurance - Drivers with no flatbed experience are welcome as well. Pay does vary for non- experience flatbed drivers.  Driver requirements: --- CDL Class-A --- Must be aged 23 or above --- Eligible for employment in the United States --- Be able to handle full work day (14 Hours rule) (11 Hours Driving) --- Have good communication with dispatch  ***** Drivers are welcomed in our office from 7am - 4pm for interviews***** (Please try to call an hour in advance before coming, thank you)  *****You can also apply online at: ***** https://intelliapp.driverapponline.com/c/medioncorp http://www.medioncorp.us/    - 80% of our drivers have been dedicated to MC for more than 1 year, and there is a reason why! Our drivers receive bonuses every week with no questions asked. Every driver gets a bonus for hard work, because we know firsthand how it is to be on the road. We know that it can get stressful, which is why we never discredit any driver by under paying them on what they've earned.   - We have been expanding and employing more hard working individuals than ever before. Our crew of drivers are all well valued and looked upon as family. That is why all drivers have the right to choose from proposed loads instead of being forced, and can control where they want to go and when they want to come home.   ----- Now leasing company trucks ----- Jump on board with Medion Corp and have the opportunity to become an owner operator sooner than you think! ASK us about our Lease Program, in which loyal drivers have the chance to lease one of our trucks.  ***-----------------***------------------***------------------***------------------****------------------***  Please come see us in our office in Alsip located 5330 W 124th St. Alsip, IL   THANK YOU Mike Recruiting  MEDION CORP Office - 708-926-9315 Cell - 224-241-1916

Title: Class A OTR Driver
Description: TeamOne Logistics is a nationally recognized third-party logistics partner exclusively focused on the asset-based transportation and logistics industry. With over 100 locations across the country and growing, a key component of our success is our people. We get it happy clients happen through happy employees.  We are currently hiring for professional Class A Solo OTR driving positions that are based out of Toledo, OH.  Truck Driver Benefits:  • Average over $70,000 per year • $1275.00/Average weekly pay with guarantee based on three-week period** • $.50/mile plus $.06 loaded mile incentive** • Weekly Pay • Company paid tolls, GPS, Company fuel card  • Full Benefits – Available on DAY ONE OF EMPLOYMENT • Travel and Lodging paid for Orientation** • Bonus for clean level 1 inspections  Truck driver Job Description:  • Expedited runs with minimal waiting times in the automotive freight industry • 100% No Touch Frieght • Over the road for three continuous weeks • One week off each month (5 continuous days, which is optional) • $500 power bonus on week off ($6,000/Year)/or option of travel home in lieu of power bonus  Truck Driver Equipment:  • Most trucks are 2015 Volvo's w/sleeper • 53' dry van • All trucks have ELD systems • Newer, clean equipment with TV's installed!  Truck Driver Qualifications:  • Valid Class A CDL • Acceptable Background • Acceptable MVR • 1 Years of OTR experience within the past 36 months • Minimum 23 yrs. of age  CLICK APPLY NOW or Copy and Paste into your web browser:  https://intelliapp2.driverapponline.com/c/teamone?jr_direct_select_id=60615  Or call/text Lisa @ 479-264-7322 for immediate consideration! Title: Class A Driver - No Touch
Description: Class A Driver Needed in Indianapolis, IN  Monday – Friday, $22.00 per hour, HOME DAILY  ProDrivers is seeking a Class A Driver to Start IMMEDIATELY  Job Description: Start time: 6:00 pm Driver will work Monday-Friday, 8-10 hours per day Driver will start work in Plainfield, run to Hebron, KY and back No touch freight opportunity - all live load/unloads, d&h, p&d Driver will average 45-50 hours per week  Seeking dedicated driver to start immediately Hazmat Required   ProDrivers Requirements: Driver Should Have Customer Service Minimum of 12 Months T/T Experience w/in the last 3 years Clean MVR & Accident History Valid Medical Card Solid Work History   ProDrivers has great benefits: Weekly Pay & Direct Deposit Family first company Immediate Benefits for the driver and family – Health, Dental, Vision Holiday Pay and Reliability Bonus  ProDrivers is a National, Award Winning Driver Employment Company. Apply Today and Join  https://apply.prodrivers.com/Applicant/EntryForms/GeneralInformation.aspx?jobnumber=511319&referrer=craigslist  Our office hours are 8am to 5pm, Monday-Friday. Please feel free to reach out to us via phone 317.643.7747 for any further questions. Walk In Interviews are welcome between 10am-2pm Monday Friday!

Title: CLASS A CDL DRIVER.  Dedicated Local - Out and Back
Description: Morristown Express hauls food grade liquids. (Soybean oil, corn syrup and chocolates) and has openings for Class A Drivers to run a mix of regional and local freight.   Morristown is a 35 truck fleet that runs a dedicated local and regional operation with occasional long haul opportunities for its professional drivers.   Drivers for Morristown Express can expect:  • An average income of between $52,000 to $57,000 / year  • Top drivers can earn over $65,000  • $1,100 / week minimum “Guaranteed Transition Pay” for 8 weeks starting 2nd week  • New drivers earn a $500 Bonus after 12th week of employment  • Off 2 weekends a month  • 2nd and 3rd shift start times available  • Assigned equipment with free XM  • Paid orientation and tank training  • Full benefits package: Medical, Dental, Vision & 401(k)  • $950.00 Gross weekly minimum guarantee pay agreement   General Driver Qualifications:  • Class A CDL with at least 12 months tractor trailer experience preferred  • Tanker endorsement (not needed to apply)  • The ability to pass DOT physical and drug screen  • Truck parking at home. Must live within 45 mins of Morristown    To apply please click here to APPLY NOW, or call 855.525.2855

Title: Experienced CDL-A and CLASS B OTR drivers needed
Description: GMG Express Inc-established company with 17years in the trucking business  is looking for highly qualified drivers for our growing fleet. We pay TOP money for TOP service. No Tricks, everything is straight forward and to the point. Hiring Established Teams & Solo Drivers. Stop waiting and get on the road NOW with our 1 day orientation.  ESTABLISHED TEAMS:  • $.70 CPM with average 5400-6300 miles weekly,$. 05 bonus if you have hazmat and tanker endorsements on those particular runs  • NEW 2018-2019-2020  Freightliner Or Volvo Trucks with Manual or Automatic Transmission  • BRAND NEW Trailers  • 1099 Independent Contractor  • Occupational Accident Insurance  • Anual preformance bonus   • Clean inspection bonus  • Weekly settlements (Direct Deposit)  • NO touch freight.  SOLO's Dry Van $ .55 CPM Starting with salary position available after 60 days on the road upon performance review. Average Miles 2700-3000 weekly  Reefer $ .60 CPM Starting with salary position available after 60 days on the road upon performance review. Average Miles 2500-2700 weekly  CLASS B DRIVERS -STRAIGHT TRUCKS Hiring experienced class CLASS B drivers. You must have valid CLASS B CDL license and actual experience driving box truck /lift gate experience and knows how to use pallet jack  - Driver earns 25% from the weekly gross of the truck revenue -2019 Freightliner M2106 w/ 24” sleeper, equipped with lift gate and pallet jack -1099 Independent Contractor pay - Clean inspection bonus - Weekly settlements (Direct Deposit) Requirements:  - Must Speak English.  - No more than 2 moving violations in last 3 years  - No more than 1 accident in last 3 years.  -Driver must be able to run all 48 states and stay 2 weeks on the road at a time    $. 05 bonus if you have hazmat and tanker endorsements on those particular runs  • New model trucks ( oldest truck being 3 years old) Freighliners and Volvo's.  • 1099 Independent Contractor  • Occupational Accident Insurance  • Annual preformance bonus  • Clean inspection bonus.  • Weekly settlements (Direct Deposit)  • NO touch freight.    Requirements:  • Established Teams Only  • 2 yr. OTR minimum experience  • Must Speak English.  • No more than 2 moving violations in last 3 years  • No more than 1 accident in last 3 years.  Please call our recruiting department -Stefan or Ana  directly feel free to ask any and all Questions. Stefan (630) 280-4566 Fill our application : https://intelliapp.driverapponline.com/c/gmgexpress?uri_b=ia_gmgexpress_1938649652  16 W 455 S Frontage Road, Suite# 104 | Burr Ridge, IL 60526 Office (630) 468-2471 | Fax (630) 206-0326  Office Hours 7:30AM to 5:00PM CST | For After Hours Please Call (630) 468-2471  Website: WWW.GMGEXPRESS.COM

Title: Home Daily Class A Flatbed Driver! First Shift, $22/hr w/ OT!
Description: APPLY NOW Job Details:  Home Daily Class A Flatbed Drivers Needed!  $22/hr w/ OT! 12 Months Experience Required First Shift, Monday - Friday! Referral Bonuses and Great Benefits!  QDS is currently seeking qualified Class A Flatbed drivers to drive out of and around the Indianapolis area. All positions are home daily and pay $22 Per Hour. Over Time and Benefits Available!  Only 12 months of verifiable DOT experience required! This is a great opportunity for qualified drivers wanting to earn great money and benefits! This position has needs for drivers looking to be Home Every Day. CDL A truck drivers will receive competitive pay and benefits along with bonuses and safety incentives. Don’t miss out on this fantastic opportunity and apply or call today! “The Best Drivers, Drive QDS” Required Job Qualifications:  Must be 21 or older  12 Months tractor-trailer experience within the last 36 months  Must meet applicable driving record and accident record  No more than two preventable accidents in the last 36 months  No more than two non-moving violations in the last 36 months  Must pass DOT physical and drug screen  Quality Driver Solutions is an Equal Opportunity Employer that fully supports diversity in the workplace. Contact a Team Member Today at 314-705-2779 APPLY NOW

Description: Now Hiring CDL-A Drivers for Dedicated Regional RunsCall Today:  866-763-0362 or CLICK HERE TO APPLY             Hogan offers our Dedicated CDL-A Truck Drivers:$3,000 Sign on Bonus for experienced driversAverage Annual pay of $66,000Home Every Other DayNo Touch FreightNewer EquipmentVacation and Holiday PayMedical, Dental, Vision, Life Insurance, 401(k)Also Hiring Owner Operators!Hogan Requires:Valid Class A CDLNo Experience? Title: Hiring CDL-A Regional Drivers | Average $70K - $75K W2 | Weekly Home Time
Description: J.B. Hunt is now hiring CDL-A truck drivers for regional driving jobs within our Dedicated fleet!This regional dedicated trucking job features the following:Average annual earnings projected at $70,000 - $75,000$1,300 weekly pay guarantee2 consecutive days off each weekPaid time off accrual from day onePick up and deliver loaded trailers from distribution centerBenefit options and a company-matched 401k planOnline orientation through our Direct to Work programRequires 12 months of CDL A driving experienceJ.B. Hunt’s dedicated jobs offer drivers competitive pay and a consistent schedule serving a single customer, allowing you reliable home time, a familiar route and an opportunity to exercise your customer service skills.Along with the perks of paid time off and onsite management, dedicated truck drivers enjoy access to comprehensive health benefit offerings including medical, dental and vision, as well as life insurance, 401K and paid vacation.Call 1-833-638-4545 for more information about this local dedicated truck driving job, or prequalify online now!

Title: Regional Class A Drivers - Up To $.50 Plus Per mile + Sign on Bonus
Description: TRANS STATES EXPRESS   NOW HIRING; Safe and Professional Midwest Regional Truck Drivers.  Call, Ron at 513 679 7100 ext. 122 or Jesse at ext. 123 Monday thru Friday 7am - 4pm.  Go to www.transstatesexpress.com or See us on face book for an online application    Trans States Express has been in business since 1982 and is a smaller family oriented company with around 50 regional drivers.  We are large enough to have good freight to keep you moving but small enough to know you by name, not by a truck number. When you walk in here you be treated with respect and become part of the team.  Trans States Express is looking for truck drivers with at least 18 months experience for regional driving jobs. Ask us about our routes.   (No New York City)  Ask About Our Sign On Bonus ( Weekly payments starting after the first full week. )   Ask About Our Referral Bonus.    *.Up to $.50 CPM Loaded or Empty   *Monthly Safety bonus   * $100.00 per day training pay.   *Direct Deposit ( Paid Weekly ) .  *8 Days paid vacation pay after one year.   *8 paid Holidays after 60 days.   *Major Medical, Dental and Vision Insurance after 60 Days   *401k ( 50% match ) after one year   *$30,000 Company Paid Life Insurance After 60 Days   *99% No touch freight.   *Late model equipment   *Pre Pass Easy Pass   *Layover pay   *wait time pay  *Detention pay  *Home weekly  *Rider Policy  *Pet Policy

Title: Mail Delivery Class A Drivers (Seasonal)
Description: Christmas is near and Postal Fleet Services is seeking Seasonal Drivers to haul the mail. We have various locations across the United States. With the holidays the mail loads increase and we are looking for experienced drivers to help move the increased volume. During the months of November and December these temporary positions will be available. A great way to earn extra holiday cash or keep busy stay busy with slower freight times. We pay weekly!!  Solo and Team drivers needed  $30.00 an hour incentive pay.  We are a USPS mail contractor in need of CDL Class A Truck Drivers with at least one year experience.  Postal Fleet Service prides itself on hiring great drivers who are honest, dependable and hardworking. We are one of the fastest growing USPS mail contractors on the USPS contractor providers.  Seasonal Starting on or around Nov. 29th - Ending on or around Dec. 25th  Opportunity to become full time driver after seasonal work has ended  Paid weekly  Requirements:  CDL Class A license Must have verifiable job history

Title: Rockstar Delivery Driver!!
Description: West Carmel is seeking fun, upbeat, and friendly delivery drivers for our night shifts!  The basic delivery driver's shift consists of safely delivering the accurate order to our customers. Drivers may also assist in food prep throughout the shift, as well as order taking. After dinner cleaning and product restocking is also required during the shift.  Night drivers make a flat rate of $8/hour for hourly pay. Drivers are paid mileage or DMR that the company reimburses to the driver ($0.45 per mile), and keep all the tips they make throughout their shift.  Night shifts are from 4pm to shortly after we close at 10pm. Although we are looking to cover a few night shifts, drivers are welcome to work day shifts as well if they are looking for more hours.  Delivery Drivers must be 18 years of age or older and must have had a valid drivers license for at least 2 years. Insurance for vehicle is also a requirement for the job.
Compensation: $8/hour at night. $.41 per mile driven on deliveries.  Drivers walk out with cash for all tips made during shift.

Title: Earn $21/hr! Join Xpress Global Systems as a Class A Linehaul Driver
Description: Earn $21/hr! Join Xpress Global Systems as a Class A Linehaul Driver  Xpress Global Systems Class A Linehaul Driver FULL-TIME $21/hr 5220 W 76th St, Indianapolis, IN 46268  APPLY HERE  Responsible for safely operating a truck with a capacity of at least 26,000 pounds. Pay is $0.47/per mile + Stop pay. Safely operate a heavy or tractor-trailer truck, properly track and document activity log, report any issues or incidents to dispatch, inspect the truck before and after each trip.  Schedule - Shift start: 6:00AM - Shift length: Based on route - Days: Monday-Friday , Weekends off  Benefits - Health, dental, vision insurance available after 31 days - Paid time off - 401k  Requirements - Valid Class A CDL - At least 6 months of previous commercial driving experience within the last 36 months - Air Brake Endorsement - Must be at least 21+ years old - Must pass drug screen - Must pass background check - Can lift 75 lbs  APPLY NOW  ------------------------------  About Xpress Global Systems Xpress Global Systems has over 30 service center facilities nationwide with exciting career opportunities for local drivers, route drivers, dockworkers and transportation management professionals. We take an approach to our business that considers our customers and our people as our greatest assets.  PID = 5534

Title: 🚛OTR TAKE HOME $2500 AND OWN TRUCK IN 18 MONTHS!!! NO HIDDEN FEES!!!
Description: Here at Four Ways Cargo INC, we are dedicated to providing affordable, timely, and reliable freight solutions to customers nationwide. We pride ourselves on our high levels of driver satisfaction. Four Ways Cargo is looking for professional truck drivers owner-operators to join our Divisions - Reefer and Flatbed OTR    * $7000-8000 Gross Earnings per week with averaging 2800-3200 miles OTR   * You get 75%from the line haul gross (Included Reefer Trailer Rent with covered Engine Maintenance ($350 value) & Included Cargo and Liability Insurance ($200 value) )         Call Now: 630-570-5961  BE #1 BY RECEIVING TOP PAY IN THE INDUSTRY! DON'T TAKE A SINGLE DIME LESS THAN YOU DESERVE!  We have everything you need ranging from:   ➠ A professional  NO FORCE dispatcher assigned specifically to you ➠ Booking loads together with the dispatch ➠ 24/7/365 Dispatch, Detention Pay!!! ➠ Maintenance account ➠ Plate, registration and all insurances included ➠All weekly expenses from $830 to $1080 ➠ 2014 to 2020 Freightliners and KW T680 Trucks For Lease ➠ Weekly pay via direct deposit ➠ Safety Bonus, Referral Bonus, and Loyalty Bonus ➠ Walk Away Lease ➠ $260k-$320k a Year Gross  ➠ 100% Independent Contractor company    No Credit Check, No Down Payment, No Balloon Payment, Own it after your last payment  You are not just a truck number, but a person and without you, we don’t exist. Our drivers and owners are not only lifelong family members but also major stakeholders because they are our business partners!  Come and see why so many Owner Operators are happy with us!!!

Title: Regional CDL A Truck Driver - $6,000 Sign-On Bonus
Description: Are you Elite? Elite drivers are those who saddle up, make the sacrifices and are dedicated to the open road. There are no challenges they can’t hit, no job they won't complete, they are Elite. You are the last Cowboy of the West at West Side Transport.     APPLY NOW!   So, are you Elite?    $65,000 to $80,000/bits year - $.50 - $.60/CPM      $1,100 - $1,500 per week      $6,000 Saddle Up Bonus      Trainers can earn an additional $.11/CPM - Break in the new amigos    EZ Pass      75% Drop & Hook    Late Model Equipment - The newest stock!     401K Company Match     Full Benefits – Medical, Vision, Dental     Driver App – receive all driver info. on your phone!      Requirements    Valid Class A CDL    4+ months experience    Schedule flexibility        Kick the Tires on a Great Opportunity - APPLY NOW!

Title: Class A CDL Driver - No Touch Freight - $7,500 Sign on Bonus
Description: YOUR EXPERIENCE MATTERS. $7,500 sign-on bonus with plenty of home time for company drivers. We have dedicated regional runs in your area. As a Company Driver with a CDL-A, you can bring your experience to Hogan and get the pay and benefits you deserve: $7,500 sign-on bonus for experienced company drivers.Top performers can exceed $74,000Excellent home time No Touch FreightMedical, Dental, Vision and Life InsuranceVacation and Holiday Pay401(k) retirement plans Pet friendly policyTeam, Student, and Owner Operator opportunities also available! *Please note: Class A CDL is requiredGive us a call today: 866-806-7210Or CLICK HERE TO APPLYKnow Where Your Next Mile Is Coming From Our drivers get the quality equipment, home time, pay, and benefits that only an industry leader can provide. We have the miles if you have the drive. Call now and speak with a recruiter.  Celebrating a Century of Hogan TraditionFrom one truck and one man in 1918 to the full-service transportation company we are today, we celebrate 100 years of Hogan success. We know our experienced drivers play a central role in that success and so we are investing in you. Join now for a $7,500 sign-on bonus, great pay, excellent home time, and a career you can count on.

Title: Driver CDL A Earn $65,000 + 1st year $8000. sign on bonus Regional
Description: SOURCE LOGISTICS IS NEEDING DRIVERS FOR REGIONAL / DEDICATED RUNS, HOME WEEK-ENDS! SOME RUNS WILL HAVE YOU HOME AT LEAST ONCE DURING THE WEEK!  The last 4 drivers hired will average $65,000. to $70,000. the first year for earnings!  Drivers will start at $.60 per mile with 1/2 cent per mile increase every 6 months, plus additional stop pay.      NOW OFFERING A $8,000 SIGN ON BONUS! DON'T MISS OUT.  Apply on line at https://intelliapp.driverapponline.com/c/sourcelogistics   Military friendly! Source Logistics is thankful for your service and understands that if you are currently active in the Reserves or National Guard, you have certain obligations that require additional time off. Be assured that Source Logistics will accommodate your required leave if needed.  You will be home weekends. You will be assigned a late model truck with no slip seating. We want you to make yourself at home. Trucks are equipped with pre-pass and toll road passes.   We offer a very competitive benefit package which includes:      *2 weeks paid vacation after 1st year of employment, and 3 weeks paid vacation after.      *2 paid personal days per year      *Company paid life insurance, short and long term disability insurance, no cost to you!      *Holiday Pay      * 401-K Retirement plan      * Payroll is weekly and all direct deposit      * Full major health insurance with prescription card, and vision & dental insurance also available      * Military friendly! National Guard and Reserves, we will work with your obligations when serving         plus more...... CALL TODAY ! 866-231-3855 option 4 (Recruiting) or 479-219-9013 (Megan)  Apply on line at https://intelliapp.driverapponline.com/c/sourcelogistics  Visit our website at source-logistics.biz  Must be minimum 23 years old with CDL A license No felony convictions due to customer base No DUI / DWI convictions within the last 10 years, none in a commercial motor vehicle Must have acceptable employment and safety history                                                                                                                                             truck driver otr over the road CDL-A
Compensation: Start @ $.60/mile plus aditional stop pay. $8,000. sign on bonus with 1st payment after 1st week

Title: OTR Company Driver up to $2,500 per week
Description: Our company is a growing, family owned company with 20 years of experience in the industry based in Illinois. We are looking for honest and hardworking people that are tech smart and phone app savvy as well to join our team.  We offer: • $1,000.00 Sign on bonus (Paid out after 1 month, in 4 increments of $250.00) • Over the road • Clean inspection bonuses • 1099 • 53' Dry Van  • Pickup Delivery • No Hazmat Loads  • Rider/Pet Policy if needed.  The pay program gives you: • $0.45 per mile • $150 bonus if you go over 3,000mi (equals your pay to $0.50 per mile) • $20 per week for cell phone and data use (Keep Trucking App)  • $25 per additional pick up/drop off • $25 detention pay guaranteed per occurrence paid by Vecto Inc. If broker pays detention you get the amount we manage to get from him.  • $50 if the truck breaks down, and you are not able to drive that day • We are always working on improving the plan to give our employees better incentive to preform better, so there will be more bonuses.  • Payroll is based on loads delivered from Tuesday until Monday. Pay Statements are sent out on Thursdays by 5pm CST. Pay is delayed by 1 week, meaning that for the work completed Tuesday-Monday, the driver will receive pay on Friday the following week. • $300 Cash Advance (per request) is available to our drivers every week   *Note: In order to make sure you achieve these financial goals, we expect our drivers to be strong performers and be able to run 11,000 miles per month while maximizing utilization of their equipment, including their ELOG’s capabilities. Also team's are welcome to apply!  Lease purchase options also available  Qualifications of the Class A CDL Driver • Fill out following link https://intelliapp.driverapponline.com/c/vecto?r=craigslistcd • Truck drivers must have a valid Class A CDL license. • Minimum of 2 years of Class A CDL driving experience -No serious accidents or violations for the past 3 years. • Submit to a drug screening.  Responsibilities of the Class A CDL Driver • Pre-trip and post-trip vehicle Inspection • No loading/unloading needed (if needed, driver will be compensated) • Maintain the safety, security and control of the tractor trailer unit at all times • Be available to dispatch and management (within reason). • Ensure overall cleanliness of the vehicle's interior. • Report all faults experienced during the trip/day's activity and ensure that all information is transmitted to the company. • Complete appropriate driving route documentation.

Title: Professionals wanted, % pay, 70-75mph trucks and no BS
Description: I'm sure you've read a ton of recruiter postings on here. I'm not one. I'm a driver for the company I'm making this posting for. Renewable Transportation Services is the name. We are a reefer company out of Indianapolis. Here's the high points, no BS;  Employee type - W2  Experience - At least a year. Minimum. Preferably more, but thats the minimum requirement  Company - Family owned, 35ish trucks. Vet friendly  Accidents etc - If you have a messed up record, lots of accidents and tickets, don't apply. We aren't interested. A couple dings is fine. But habitual tickets are not.  % pay - we are sent the rate contracts as our dispatch, so we see exactly what the gross is, including fuels surcharge (this is as close to hub mile pay as you will ever get). Whatever that number is , subtract 19 cpm as what the truck eats for operation. Everything else, you get your % of (including fuel surcharge). For instance, I've taken 900 mile loads to Florida that payed $3600 gross. So you'd take 3600 and subtract 171 (19cpm), leaving the gross at 3439. I personally make 31%, so I'd make $1062 for that 900 mile run. These are real examples.  Understand however that runs on the east coast don't pay nearly as well, so you take a hit coming back. However, the pay going in makes it worth it. I routinely see checks between 1500-1800 for a given week. Usually Ill have a 1000-1200 gross week, following by a 1600-2000 gross check. for instance last week I grossed 7300 for the week to the truck. After deductions etc, I'll make around 1950 or so gross for 1 week.  Dispatch - We get a number of loads a week and get to pick which one we want for the most part. There is some seniority involved in that obviously as far as loads out of the terminal, but with backhauls you have a lot of say. I actually have a DAT load board membership and have chosen my loads myself on multiple occasions. You get to have direct input with our dispatcher on where you go out of a list of loads.   Routing and Fuel - you decide both. You wont be told where to fuel or what roads to take. Take the ones you think are best. Fuel at any pilot or flying J. To quote our operations manager "This is a big boy operation. Pick up and deliver on time. For everything in between, that's why we have you"  Trucks - We're mostly new cascadias, with some internationals still atm as well. Owner has decided he wants to switch out the internationals for T680s though last I checked, and we are supposed to be getting some of those in relatively soon. Believe he bought 5. The Cascadia in the picture is mine, taken in late October 2019  We have insurance , paid time off, Paid Holidays, generous vacation and all the rest as well.  For experienced drivers who want to be treated like they know what they are doing and payed well, this is the best job you're ever going to find. I'm a 17 year driver myself, and this is BY FAR the best place I've ever worked. It's not even a contest.  Im going to leave our Recruiters phone number attached to this add (his names Carlos), tell him Jason sent you his way. My truck number is 19006 for reference. He can give you the finer details and answer any questions

Title: Snow Removal Subcontractors
Description: Plow/Salt Drivers- MUST HAVE a VALID DRIVER’S LICENSE, GOOD DRIVING RECORD and previous experience driving plow/salt trucks Subcontractors- MUST have own equipment and provide proof of insurance Continued employment is possible when the season ends.

Title: Deliver and Earn Up to $18/hr - DoorDash Driver
Description: No passengers. No bosses. Just you, your tunes, and the road. Sign up now and start making money! DOORDASH PERKS INCLUDE:Highly Flexible. Be your own boss. Work when you want, wherever you want.Earn up to $18/hour*, including 100% of your tips.Qualify for Fast Pay and get paid daily.Be a part of an exciting and rapidly growing community across over 1,000 cities in the U.S.REQUIREMENTS:✓ Any Car, Bicycle, or Scooter✓ iPhone or Android smartphone✓ Valid Driver's License and insurance (only applicable to cars)✓ 18+ years of ageABOUT US:DoorDash is a technology company that connects customers with local businesses. Customers order meals and other items from their favorite local merchants and Dashers deliver it directly to their doors. Dashers are third party contractors who deliver for merchants to customers. Dashing is designed to be extremely flexible. Deliver part-time or full-time -- it's up to you! You get to set your own schedule and deliver wherever you want.*Dashers are paid per delivery. Earnings vary based on pay per delivery and number of deliveries completed per hour.Driving with DoorDash is perfect for a those looking for seasonal work, temporary work, part time work, part-time work, or for those looking for a flexible full time opportunity. Hours are completely flexible. You can create your own schedule. No previous experience as a transportation driver, truck driver, taxi driver, courier driver or delivery driver is necessary. We welcome those who have driven with other gig economy platforms such as Seamless, Grubhub, Eat24, Munchery, Saucey, Drizly, Google Express, AmazonFresh, Lyft, Favor, Caviar, Uber, UberX, Side car, Sprig, Instacart, Rinse, Shyp, Washio, Luxe, Zirx, Post mates, Farm Hill, Rinse, Deliv, Amazon Prime, and Ease. Our driving partners come from all backgrounds and industries ranging from traditional driving and transportation industries to more customer service and creative industries. Title: Midwest Dedicated Class A CDL Truck Driver ($1,375/Week)
Description: Reset at home every week, out Sunday-Friday or Monday-Saturday (your pick), dedicated lanes, Midwest regional operating area, earn on average $1,375/week, full benefits, paid vacation, and paid holidays. Learn more about PTI's Regional Midwest Dedicated Class A CDL Truck Driver position.Overview:Home Time: Reset at Home Every WeekSchedule: Out Sunday-Friday or Monday-Saturday (your pick)Compensation: average $1,375.00/week (paid weekly) and average $71,500.00 annuallyDetention: $17/Hour after first hour and up to 8 hours/dayDouble Drop & Hook Pay: $10Stop-Off Pay: $20First-Load Bonus: $500 paid after first load is pulledBonuses: Up to $300/month MPG Bonus and $1,000/Referral BonusAdditional Details:Operating Area: Illinois, Iowa, Kentucky, Minnesota, Missouri, North Dakota, Ohio, and WisconsinEquipment: Late-Model Diesel SleeperPaid Vacation: 2 Weeks Per Year Paid (1 Week Every 6 Months First 3 Years)Paid Holidays: $120/day (6 Paid/Year)Insurance: Medical, Vision, Dental, Life, Short/Long-Term DisabilityRetirement Planning: 401K Match and Free Financial CounselingAllows Passengers: YesAllows Pets: YesRequirements:Current Class A CDL6+ months recent tractor-trailer experience  Learn More About This Position Paper Transport, Inc. is a for-hire truckload carrier that offers regional truckload, dedicated truckload, intermodal, and logistic services. Headquartered in De Pere, WI with multiple park locations/terminals throughout the Midwest and Southern United States, PTI has experienced tremendous growth since its start in 1990 and now employs over 850 professional Class A CDL Truck Drivers along with over 200 driver support professionals.  Job ID: MW004

Title: $5000 sign on bonus for Class A drivers
Description: $5000 sign on Bonus  MTS in Indianapolis is looking for Class A drivers with over 6 months experience and a clean MVR for its home daily no touch freight runs. At MTS we offer great pay and great benefits to our drivers. We have a verity of new runs with most driver making $1200 or more a week. We believe in treating our drivers with the respect they deserve and to make them part of the family. Below are a few of the open runs out of Indianapolis  Indianapolis to Huntington Indiana 3rd shift  Indianapolis to  Ford Chicago Assembly Plant, IL   Indianapolis to Gallatin, TN   – $260 per trip  Indianapolis to Louisville, KY  FlatBed Delivery to Detroit $275/day - No Tarps! No Chains!   2 am to 5 am start time   OTR Home Weekly  Sydney,OH to Kansas City  call for mileage rate    Casual drivers  To find out more call 800-748-0192 to talk to one of our recruiters  to find out more online go to www.mtstrans.com  The Terminal is located at 2995 South Harding St, Indianapolis IN  Come by and visit us we are always happy to sit down and talk to drivers and show them around  TOP TEN REASONS TO DRIVE WITH MTS All we do is NO TOUCH FREIGHT. No heavy lifting. No running up and down ramps. Dedicated lanes. Same stops both ways. Consistent pay check. We keep you on the road. Stable company. We have 1100+ trucks on the road. 18 terminals. Big company with small company feel. Friendly dispatch and terminal managers. Monthly paid Performance bonuses. We pay you extra for being a good driver. Safe and up to date equipment. They come back to our yards, so maintenance is always done. Detention and breakdown pay. We pay you if you get stuck for some reason. Quick hires! We can have you on the road in less than a week. GREAT BENEFITS! BC/BS PPO with LOW deductible, 401k, Dental and Vision, FREE Life Insurance Principals only. Recruiters, please don't contact this job poster.

At MTS we offer great pay and great benefits to our drivers. We have a verity of new runs with most driver making $1200 or more a week. We believe in treating our drivers with the respect they deserve and to make them part of the family. Below are a few of the open runs out of Indianapolis  Indianapolis to Huntington Indiana 3rd shift  Indianapolis to  Ford Chicago Assembly Plant, IL   Indianapolis to Gallatin, TN   – $260 per trip  Indianapolis to Louisville, KY  FlatBed Delivery to Detroit $275/day - No Tarps! No Chains!   2 am to 5 am start time   OTR Home Weekly  Sydney,OH to Kansas City  call for mileage rate    Casual drivers  To find out more call 800-748-0192 to talk to one of our recruiters  to find out more online go to www.mtstrans.com  The Terminal is located at 2995 South Harding St, Indianapolis IN  Come by and visit us we are always happy to sit down and talk to drivers and show them around  TOP TEN REASONS TO DRIVE WITH MTS All we do is NO TOUCH FREIGHT. No heavy lifting. No running up and down ramps. Dedicated lanes. Same stops both ways. Consistent pay check. We keep you on the road. Stable company. We have 1100+ trucks on the road. 18 terminals. Big company with small company feel. Friendly dispatch and terminal managers. Monthly paid Performance bonuses. We pay you extra for being a good driver. Safe and up to date equipment. They come back to our yards, so maintenance is always done. Detention and breakdown pay. We pay you if you get stuck for some reason. Quick hires! We can have you on the road in less than a week. GREAT BENEFITS! BC/BS PPO with LOW deductible, 401k, Dental and Vision, FREE Life Insurance Principals only. Recruiters, please don't contact this job poster.

Title: Earn Up To $19/hr - Be Your Own Boss - DoorDash Driver
Description: No passengers. No bosses. Just you, your tunes, and the road. Sign up now and start making money! DOORDASH PERKS INCLUDE:Highly Flexible. Be your own boss. Work when you want, wherever you want.Earn up to $19/hour*, including 100% of your tips.Qualify for Fast Pay and get paid daily.Be a part of an exciting and rapidly growing community across over 1,000 cities in the U.S.REQUIREMENTS:✓ Any Car, Bicycle, or Scooter✓ iPhone or Android smartphone✓ Valid Driver's License and insurance (only applicable to cars)✓ 18+ years of ageABOUT US:DoorDash is a technology company that connects customers with local businesses. Customers order meals and other items from their favorite local merchants and Dashers deliver it directly to their doors. Dashers are third party contractors who deliver for merchants to customers. Dashing is designed to be extremely flexible. Deliver part-time or full-time -- it's up to you! You get to set your own schedule and deliver wherever you want.*Dashers are paid per delivery. Earnings vary based on pay per delivery and number of deliveries completed per hour.Driving with DoorDash is perfect for a those looking for seasonal work, temporary work, part time work, part-time work, or for those looking for a flexible full time opportunity. Hours are completely flexible. You can create your own schedule. No previous experience as a transportation driver, truck driver, taxi driver, courier driver or delivery driver is necessary. We welcome those who have driven with other gig economy platforms such as Seamless, Grubhub, Eat24, Munchery, Saucey, Drizly, Google Express, AmazonFresh, Lyft, Favor, Caviar, Uber, UberX, Side car, Sprig, Instacart, Rinse, Shyp, Washio, Luxe, Zirx, Post mates, Farm Hill, Rinse, Deliv, Amazon Prime, and Ease. Our driving partners come from all backgrounds and industries ranging from traditional driving and transportation industries to more customer service and creative industries. If you are an account manager, accountant, accounting, actor, actress, admin, administrative, administrative, artist, assistant, barista, bus boy, busboy, busboy, busser, cabbie, cab driver, cab-driver, chauffeur, professional cleaner, cleaners, clerical, coffee, college student, construction, contractor, contract worker, courier, customer service, customer service agent, cyclist, data entry, data-entry, delivery driver, designer, drivers, education, entry level, entry-level, expo, finance, food runner, food-runner, foodrunner, freelancer, freelance worker, full time, full-time, gig economy user, health care, healthcare, host, hostess, hosts, human resources, human-resources, independent contractor, intern, interns, IT, limo driver, maid, maintenance, management, manager, manufacturing, marketing, messenger, musician, network marketing, nurse, office, on-demand driver, part time, part-time, private hire driver, receptionist, receptionists, restaurant, retail, retail associate, sales, sales person, salesperson, seasonal worker, server, servers, summer job seeker, teacher, teachers, temp, valet, valets, waiter, waiters, waitresses, warehouse, writer, worker, who is looking for a flexible part time or seasonal job, you should try delivering with DoorDash to supplement your income!Click to sign up now!

Title: Hiring 1 motivated driver to add to small fleet.
Description: DSM is looking for one driver that is open to flexibility.  We haul dryvan.  We are a smaller fleet with some great freight opportunity.  What we need is an individual that is willing to work days and sometimes nights.  Because of our size we do not tolerate call ins, if you are scheduled out then you are expected to cover the run.  We do some work with Hill-Rom which would require you to unload hospital beds and furniture (you will be trained prior).  We also plan on picking up some UPS freight moving into Dec. that will require doubles/triples endorsement. There is also a dedicated Wednesday run up to WI and back.  You may be home daily during the UPS season, you may be gone for up to 2 weeks with Hill-Rom load.  Basically need somebody that will go where the wind takes them.  If you do go out on the road, 9 times out of 10 you will be home on the weekends.  Compensation: 28% of all gross revenue to truck, including fuel surcharge, driver assist, etc... Example, if the truck generates $5k you will receive $1400.  You will be 1099.  NO W2. Paid weekly every Friday.  Requirements: 2 years min exp., no tickets in last 12 months and no accidents in past 24 months  Equipment: 2013 KW T700  Benefits: Vacation after one year, and 6 paid Holidays beginning after 90 days.  NO HEALTH INSURANCE  Please contact Dan @ (317) 667-6830.

Title: CDL class A truck drivers
Description: Viva Express Inc is currently looking for motivated Owner Operators and CDL class A truck Drivers with no less than 2 years of recent driving experience. We can provide you with a competitive and stable income in the transportation industry.  Owner Operators:  - Schedule your own home time - Dispatch support 24/7 - Assigned dispatcher - Direct deposit/weekly - Money in advance available - $6000+ gross per week - Affordable weekly payments - Run all 48 states  CDL class A Drivers:  - weekly payrolls - 55-60 cpm or 30% out of load gross - 7 days/week dispatch - mechanical support 24/7 - convenient schedule - new equipment  Our requirements: - 2 years of CDL class A driving experience - clean record(we know that nobody is perfect) - the desire to work effectively and persistently  Call (708)701-8180  for more info

Title: Local CDL Truck Driver - O'Reilly Auto Parts - HIRING IMMEDIATELY
Description: Why O'Reilly Auto Parts?Do you like being valued, appreciated and part of a team?  If so, you need to come drive at the O! We offer one of the best driving jobs in the industry.  Home every day, 5 day work week, no weekends, set routes, and low touch freight. Our salary package includes safety incentives, driver bonuses and the potential for raises every 6 months (for the first 4 years)!  Each of our trucks is equipped with an electric pallet jack and hydraulic lift gate. Our drivers are more than drivers, they are included as part of our team and are valued and appreciated!The goal of each Class A CDL Driver is to provide a high level of service to our store customers by consistently getting the right parts to the right places at the right time, in the safest possible manner.What's in it for you?Home Daily5 day work week No weekendsSet routesLow touch freight using full pallet deliveries with electric pallet jacks and hydraulic lift gates on every trailerWell maintained modern fleet of tractors and trailersFull benefit package (medical, dental, vision, 401k, stock purchase plan, etc)Salary package with quarterly incentivesGenerous Team Member discountsBeing part of a team who appreciates and values our drivers.Qualifications:Commercial Class A driver's licenseWilling to obtain Hazmat if not currentSix months regulated tractor trailer experienceSafe driving recordWhat are you waiting for? Come join an industry leader and be a part of a driving team that is truly valued and appreciated! Start your driving career with O'Reilly today! CALL (844) 924-8836

Title: Class A OTR Driver!! 46C/M. IN- TX Runs.
Description: We are looking for CDL Class A professional drivers.  Pays 46 CPM Solo and 50 CPM Teams.  IN area to TX area Runs.  Easy runs Dry Van work.  Averagely 3000 miles/week. 100% No Touch Freight.  Bonus on passed inspections. Well Maintained Newer Model Trucks and trailers.   Please call Ray at 317.374.0386 for more info.

Title: Multiple CDL Positions - Speak On-Site to a Recruiter
Description: Schneider offers an unparalleled variety of driving positions. Pick the job that meets your optimal combination of pay and home time, and always get the respect you deserve. We offer one of the widest varieties of truck driving jobs in the industry - for both Team and Solo drivers. From Over-the-Road, Regional and Local drive styles, we're here to help you choose the one that meets your needs.Click this link for open positions in your area!Don't know what to choose? Stop in to a hiring event near you and speak with our recruiter! Can't make it to an event? Give our recruiter a call!Conner Bane 317-474-5160Find Conner at Truck Driver Institute in Whiteland, IN:Wednesday, November 13th  1:00 pm - 4:00 pm Keyword Search: box, career, carrier, cdl a, cdla, cdl-a, class a, company, contractor, cpm, delivery, dispatch, driver, drivers, driving, entry level, experience, get cdl, graduate, independent contractor, job, logistics, miles, military, owner operator, o/o, recent cdl grad, region, route, school, schools, semi, shipping, Snider, Snyder, student, tow, training, transportation, trucker, truckers, trucking, veteran

Title: CDL Flatbed Drivers "Lease Purchase" $3000 Sign in Bonus
Description: Total Express is Currently Seeking Flatbed Drivers and Owner Operators    Click Here To Apply Online or  Contact us at 773-396-1845     We Offer:   $3000 Sign in Bonus paid in first 10 weeks ($300 per week) 80% to start, Our contractors are currently making approximately $5,500 – $6,500 a week in gross revenue, or $260,000 to $300,000 a year in gross revenue. 82% Top Pay 100% NO FORCED dispatch Trailer Rental Available   Lease to Own:    $0 down, 3-5 Yr Lease Term – NO BALLOON! 2016-2019 KENWORTH, PETERBILT AND FREIGHTLINER tractors available for lease Trucks equipped with APU, fridge, built in GPS navigator, deer Guard, headache rack with tool box, 5 YEAR/500K MILES FACTORY WARRANTY on new trucks License Plate Program Flatbed Equipment program Fuel Cards Getting to Orientation PAID We pay for Cargo Insurance We pay for Liability Insurance  We pay for Occupational Insurance Click Here To Apply Online   Owner Operators:   If you already own a truck we accept trucks 10 Yr and newer with recent DOT inspection Trailer Rental Available Click Here To Apply Online   Requirements:   25 Years of Age or Older  Min. 2Yr. OTR experience in the last 3 years Min. 1 year Flatbed experience in the past 24 months   Acceptable driving record  Must have current DOT Physical    Contact us:   773-396-1845 or Click Here To Apply Online

Title: Ryan Transportation, An Affiliate of Quality Carrier is Seeking Driver
Description: Quality Carriers and our affiliate, Ryan Transportation, are one of America's most reliable tanker trucking companies, offering the best opportunities for Drivers to achieve the most out of their careers.  We can’t do it without you!     We have a very supportive driver team that focus on success and productivity   Committed to keeping you loaded and running, our drivers are loaded 80% of the time!    We are looking for Company Drivers and Owner Operators for our terminal in Louisville, KY, terminal 717   You are more than a Driver! You are the elite that take on the tasks of operating the open road every day! Independent Contractors and Company Drivers come and grow your career with us supporting you all the way!     It’s all about the Driver   HIRING OUT OF ALL MAJOR CITIES!             If you are an Owner Operator: Owner Operators Average Income- $250,000/year - $5,000 Sign on Bonus -$3,000 Driver Referral Bonus ~No Limit! (ask your recruiter for details)  -Access to Management Anytime!  -Increase your Earning Potential with a Passport- loads into Canada!  -Flexible Home Time for you and your Family -Fuel Stabilization Program  -Tire Purchase Discount Program  -Plenty of Work to Keep You Moving and Happy      WHAT YOU NEED:  -Class A CDL  -Hazmat and Tanker required  -Willing to obtain your TWIC  -Tanker Experience not required  -2 Year Tractor Trailer Experience in the last 3 years  OR  -1 Year Tanker Experience in the last 10 years                If you are looking for a Company Position:  Company Driver Average Income- $100,000/year -$3,000 Driver Referral Bonus ~No Limit! (ask your recruiter for details)    - Assigned Units/No slip seating  -Consistent Home Time  - Steady Work with Very Stable Company  - Paid Orientation and Training  - Medical, Dental, and Vision Insurance for Company Drivers  - Paid Weekly with Cash Advance Options     WHAT YOU NEED:  -Class A CDL  -Hazmat and Tanker required  -Willing to obtain your TWIC  -Tanker Experience not required  -2 Year Tractor Trailer Experience in the last 3 years  OR  -1 Year Tanker Experience in the last 10 years            Speak with your Recruiter:   Melissa Brown: 813-313-6450   APPLYING TERMINAL: 717- Louisville, KY          Keyword search: box, career, carrier, cdl a, clda, cdl-a, class a, company, contractor, cpm, delivery, dispatch, driver, drivers, driving, entry level, experience, get cdl, graduate, independent contractor, job, logistics, miles, military, owner operator, o/o, recent cdl grad, region, route, school, schools, semi, shipping, QC, Quality, Quality Carriers, QDI, Quality Distribution, student, tow, training, transportation, trucker, truckers, trucking, veteran, tanker, tank, bulk, tanking, chemical, van, company driver, hazmat, hazardous, haz, twic, veterans, owneroperator, fleet, fleet driver, delivery driver.

Title: Jimmy John's Delivery Driver
Description: Pay:  You will make a base of $8.25/hr hour plus mileage reimbursement and tips (ex: If you only get tipped $1.00 and take two deliveries an hour; you just made $10 for that hour and that's on a very slow scale) This is just an example Leave with cash in hand every day that you drive, plus a check every two weeks  Duties:  Drivers deliver orders in a safe and timely manner Drivers will take phone orders and inshop register orders Drivers are responsible for bagging orders accurately and checking bagged orders Drivers help with after lunch and dinner clean-up Jimmy John's drivers are responsible for maintaining their own insurance Drivers need to have had a valid license for over two years No major infractions on your license Drivers who wish to advance may learn sandwich making and other inshop duties. Maintain clean uniform and self-presentation  Hours:  Driving shifts are as follows:  10:00 AM - 4:00 PM 11:00 AM - 2:00 PM 11:00 AM - 3:00 PM 4:00 - 10:30 PM Job Type: Part-time  Salary: $8.00 to $9.00 /hour  **REQUIRED** at least one closing shift (4-10:30pm) on either Saturday or Sunday
Compensation: $8.25 an hour plus all tips you make and mileage

Title: Deliver with DoorDash and Earn Up to $19 /Hr
Description: No passengers. No bosses. Just you, your tunes, and the road. Sign up now and start making money! DOORDASH PERKS INCLUDE:Highly Flexible. Be your own boss. Work when you want, wherever you want.Earn up to $19/hour*, including 100% of your tips.Qualify for Fast Pay and get paid daily.Be a part of an exciting and rapidly growing community across over 1,000 cities in the U.S.REQUIREMENTS:✓ Any Car, Bicycle, or Scooter✓ iPhone or Android smartphone✓ Valid Driver's License and insurance (only applicable to cars)✓ 18+ years of ageABOUT US:DoorDash is a technology company that connects customers with local businesses. Customers order meals and other items from their favorite local merchants and Dashers deliver it directly to their doors. Dashers are third party contractors who deliver for merchants to customers. Dashing is designed to be extremely flexible. Deliver part-time or full-time -- it's up to you! You get to set your own schedule and deliver wherever you want.*Dashers are paid per delivery. Earnings vary based on pay per delivery and number of deliveries completed per hour.Driving with DoorDash is perfect for a those looking for seasonal work, temporary work, part time work, part-time work, or for those looking for a flexible full time opportunity. Hours are completely flexible. You can create your own schedule. No previous experience as a transportation driver, truck driver, taxi driver, courier driver or delivery driver is necessary. We welcome those who have driven with other gig economy platforms such as Seamless, Grubhub, Eat24, Munchery, Saucey, Drizly, Google Express, AmazonFresh, Lyft, Favor, Caviar, Uber, UberX, Side car, Sprig, Instacart, Rinse, Shyp, Washio, Luxe, Zirx, Post mates, Farm Hill, Rinse, Deliv, Amazon Prime, and Ease. Our driving partners come from all backgrounds and industries ranging from traditional driving and transportation industries to more customer service and creative industries.
