Work when you want, wherever you want.Earn up to $19/hour*, including 100% of your tips.Qualify for Fast Pay and get paid daily.Be a part of an exciting and rapidly growing community across over 1,000 cities in the U.S.REQUIREMENTS:✓ Any Car, Bicycle, or Scooter✓ iPhone or Android smartphone✓ Valid Driver's License and insurance (only applicable to cars)✓ 18+ years of ageABOUT US:DoorDash is a technology company that connects customers with local businesses. Customers order meals and other items from their favorite local merchants and Dashers deliver it directly to their doors. Dashers are third party contractors who deliver for merchants to customers. Dashing is designed to be extremely flexible. Deliver part-time or full-time -- it's up to you! You get to set your own schedule and deliver wherever you want.*Dashers are paid per delivery. Earnings vary based on pay per delivery and number of deliveries completed per hour.Driving with DoorDash is perfect for a those looking for seasonal work, temporary work, part time work, part-time work, or for those looking for a flexible full time opportunity. Hours are completely flexible. You can create your own schedule. No previous experience as a transportation driver, truck driver, taxi driver, courier driver or delivery driver is necessary. We welcome those who have driven with other gig economy platforms such as Seamless, Grubhub, Eat24, Munchery, Saucey, Drizly, Google Express, AmazonFresh, Lyft, Favor, Caviar, Uber, UberX, Side car, Sprig, Instacart, Rinse, Shyp, Washio, Luxe, Zirx, Post mates, Farm Hill, Rinse, Deliv, Amazon Prime, and Ease. Our driving partners come from all backgrounds and industries ranging from traditional driving and transportation industries to more customer service and creative industries. If you are an account manager, accountant, accounting, actor, actress, admin, administrative, administrative, artist, assistant, barista, bus boy, busboy, busboy, busser, cabbie, cab driver, cab-driver, chauffeur, professional cleaner, cleaners, clerical, coffee, college student, construction, contractor, contract worker, courier, customer service, customer service agent, cyclist, data entry, data-entry, delivery driver, designer, drivers, education, entry level, entry-level, expo, finance, food runner, food-runner, foodrunner, freelancer, freelance worker, full time, full-time, gig economy user, health care, healthcare, host, hostess, hosts, human resources, human-resources, independent contractor, intern, interns, IT, limo driver, maid, maintenance, management, manager, manufacturing, marketing, messenger, musician, network marketing, nurse, office, on-demand driver, part time, part-time, private hire driver, receptionist, receptionists, restaurant, retail, retail associate, sales, sales person, salesperson, seasonal worker, server, servers, summer job seeker, teacher, teachers, temp, valet, valets, waiter, waiters, waitresses, warehouse, writer, worker, who is looking for a flexible part time or seasonal job, you should try delivering with DoorDash to supplement your income!Click to sign up now!

Work when you want, wherever you want.Earn up to $19/hour*, including 100% of your tips.Qualify for Fast Pay and get paid daily.Be a part of an exciting and rapidly growing community across over 1,000 cities in the U.S.REQUIREMENTS:✓ Any Car, Bicycle, or Scooter✓ iPhone or Android smartphone✓ Valid Driver's License and insurance (only applicable to cars)✓ 18+ years of ageABOUT US:DoorDash is a technology company that connects customers with local businesses. Customers order meals and other items from their favorite local merchants and Dashers deliver it directly to their doors. Dashers are third party contractors who deliver for merchants to customers. Dashing is designed to be extremely flexible. Deliver part-time or full-time -- it's up to you! You get to set your own schedule and deliver wherever you want.*Dashers are paid per delivery. Earnings vary based on pay per delivery and number of deliveries completed per hour.Driving with DoorDash is perfect for a those looking for seasonal work, temporary work, part time work, part-time work, or for those looking for a flexible full time opportunity. Hours are completely flexible. You can create your own schedule. No previous experience as a transportation driver, truck driver, taxi driver, courier driver or delivery driver is necessary. We welcome those who have driven with other gig economy platforms such as Seamless, Grubhub, Eat24, Munchery, Saucey, Drizly, Google Express, AmazonFresh, Lyft, Favor, Caviar, Uber, UberX, Side car, Sprig, Instacart, Rinse, Shyp, Washio, Luxe, Zirx, Post mates, Farm Hill, Rinse, Deliv, Amazon Prime, and Ease. Our driving partners come from all backgrounds and industries ranging from traditional driving and transportation industries to more customer service and creative industries. If you are an account manager, accountant, accounting, actor, actress, admin, administrative, administrative, artist, assistant, barista, bus boy, busboy, busboy, busser, cabbie, cab driver, cab-driver, chauffeur, professional cleaner, cleaners, clerical, coffee, college student, construction, contractor, contract worker, courier, customer service, customer service agent, cyclist, data entry, data-entry, delivery driver, designer, drivers, education, entry level, entry-level, expo, finance, food runner, food-runner, foodrunner, freelancer, freelance worker, full time, full-time, gig economy user, health care, healthcare, host, hostess, hosts, human resources, human-resources, independent contractor, intern, interns, IT, limo driver, maid, maintenance, management, manager, manufacturing, marketing, messenger, musician, network marketing, nurse, office, on-demand driver, part time, part-time, private hire driver, receptionist, receptionists, restaurant, retail, retail associate, sales, sales person, salesperson, seasonal worker, server, servers, summer job seeker, teacher, teachers, temp, valet, valets, waiter, waiters, waitresses, warehouse, writer, worker, who is looking for a flexible part time or seasonal job, you should try delivering with DoorDash to supplement your income!Click to sign up now!

Work when you want, wherever you want.Earn up to $19/hour*, including 100% of your tips.Qualify for Fast Pay and get paid daily.Be a part of an exciting and rapidly growing community across over 1,000 cities in the U.S.REQUIREMENTS:✓ Any Car, Bicycle, or Scooter✓ iPhone or Android smartphone✓ Valid Driver's License and insurance (only applicable to cars)✓ 18+ years of ageABOUT US:DoorDash is a technology company that connects customers with local businesses. Customers order meals and other items from their favorite local merchants and Dashers deliver it directly to their doors. Dashers are third party contractors who deliver for merchants to customers. Dashing is designed to be extremely flexible. Deliver part-time or full-time -- it's up to you! You get to set your own schedule and deliver wherever you want.*Dashers are paid per delivery. Earnings vary based on pay per delivery and number of deliveries completed per hour.Driving with DoorDash is perfect for a those looking for seasonal work, temporary work, part time work, part-time work, or for those looking for a flexible full time opportunity. Hours are completely flexible. You can create your own schedule. No previous experience as a transportation driver, truck driver, taxi driver, courier driver or delivery driver is necessary. We welcome those who have driven with other gig economy platforms such as Seamless, Grubhub, Eat24, Munchery, Saucey, Drizly, Google Express, AmazonFresh, Lyft, Favor, Caviar, Uber, UberX, Side car, Sprig, Instacart, Rinse, Shyp, Washio, Luxe, Zirx, Post mates, Farm Hill, Rinse, Deliv, Amazon Prime, and Ease. Our driving partners come from all backgrounds and industries ranging from traditional driving and transportation industries to more customer service and creative industries. If you are an account manager, accountant, accounting, actor, actress, admin, administrative, administrative, artist, assistant, barista, bus boy, busboy, busboy, busser, cabbie, cab driver, cab-driver, chauffeur, professional cleaner, cleaners, clerical, coffee, college student, construction, contractor, contract worker, courier, customer service, customer service agent, cyclist, data entry, data-entry, delivery driver, designer, drivers, education, entry level, entry-level, expo, finance, food runner, food-runner, foodrunner, freelancer, freelance worker, full time, full-time, gig economy user, health care, healthcare, host, hostess, hosts, human resources, human-resources, independent contractor, intern, interns, IT, limo driver, maid, maintenance, management, manager, manufacturing, marketing, messenger, musician, network marketing, nurse, office, on-demand driver, part time, part-time, private hire driver, receptionist, receptionists, restaurant, retail, retail associate, sales, sales person, salesperson, seasonal worker, server, servers, summer job seeker, teacher, teachers, temp, valet, valets, waiter, waiters, waitresses, warehouse, writer, worker, who is looking for a flexible part time or seasonal job, you should try delivering with DoorDash to supplement your income!Click to sign up now!

Work when you want, wherever you want.Earn up to $19/hour*, including 100% of your tips.Qualify for Fast Pay and get paid daily.Be a part of an exciting and rapidly growing community across over 1,000 cities in the U.S.REQUIREMENTS:✓ Any Car, Bicycle, or Scooter✓ iPhone or Android smartphone✓ Valid Driver's License and insurance (only applicable to cars)✓ 18+ years of ageABOUT US:DoorDash is a technology company that connects customers with local businesses. Customers order meals and other items from their favorite local merchants and Dashers deliver it directly to their doors. Dashers are third party contractors who deliver for merchants to customers. Dashing is designed to be extremely flexible. Deliver part-time or full-time -- it's up to you! You get to set your own schedule and deliver wherever you want.*Dashers are paid per delivery. Earnings vary based on pay per delivery and number of deliveries completed per hour.Driving with DoorDash is perfect for a those looking for seasonal work, temporary work, part time work, part-time work, or for those looking for a flexible full time opportunity. Hours are completely flexible. You can create your own schedule. No previous experience as a transportation driver, truck driver, taxi driver, courier driver or delivery driver is necessary. We welcome those who have driven with other gig economy platforms such as Seamless, Grubhub, Eat24, Munchery, Saucey, Drizly, Google Express, AmazonFresh, Lyft, Favor, Caviar, Uber, UberX, Side car, Sprig, Instacart, Rinse, Shyp, Washio, Luxe, Zirx, Post mates, Farm Hill, Rinse, Deliv, Amazon Prime, and Ease. Our driving partners come from all backgrounds and industries ranging from traditional driving and transportation industries to more customer service and creative industries. If you are an account manager, accountant, accounting, actor, actress, admin, administrative, administrative, artist, assistant, barista, bus boy, busboy, busboy, busser, cabbie, cab driver, cab-driver, chauffeur, professional cleaner, cleaners, clerical, coffee, college student, construction, contractor, contract worker, courier, customer service, customer service agent, cyclist, data entry, data-entry, delivery driver, designer, drivers, education, entry level, entry-level, expo, finance, food runner, food-runner, foodrunner, freelancer, freelance worker, full time, full-time, gig economy user, health care, healthcare, host, hostess, hosts, human resources, human-resources, independent contractor, intern, interns, IT, limo driver, maid, maintenance, management, manager, manufacturing, marketing, messenger, musician, network marketing, nurse, office, on-demand driver, part time, part-time, private hire driver, receptionist, receptionists, restaurant, retail, retail associate, sales, sales person, salesperson, seasonal worker, server, servers, summer job seeker, teacher, teachers, temp, valet, valets, waiter, waiters, waitresses, warehouse, writer, worker, who is looking for a flexible part time or seasonal job, you should try delivering with DoorDash to supplement your income!Click to sign up now!

Title: PROFESSIONAL CDL A DRIVERS – PERMIER CARRIER & BEST FLEET NOMINEE
Description: Hiring now for Professional Class A Drivers who are interested in working in a family environment where drivers come first!Offering Numerous Lane Choices and Home Time Options to Fit your needs!!Run Indy / Plainfield IN area to Twin Cities Area and Back!With 19 Offices in the US this Family Owned and Operated Company has been Trucking since 1974."My husband works at Leonard's as a long haul driver. His dispatcher is the nicest person. We both have a great relationship with her. When I had a death in the family he was rerouted right away so he could be home. They really take care of you. Any issues that arise are always taken care of right away. This is an awesome company to work for. I highly recommend joining the Leonard's FAMILY!!" -Stacey Johnston             Up to $.50/Mile$30 Additional Stop Pay$16/hr Detention Pay After 2 Free$160 Lay-Over PayYour Desired Home time$2000 Sign-On BonusPer Diem Pay OptionalBenefits Package Includes: Health INS, Dental, Life, Vacation, Holidays, and 401 (k) with Company MatchWeekly Direct DepositNo Touch FreightAggressive Safety Bonus and Awards ProgramFuel Bonus ProgramQ-Com, E LOG, EZPASS, PREPASSLate Model EquipmentPaid OrientationFull-Service Terminal and 24/7 Dispatch and Road ServicePet and Rider PolicyOwner Operators Welcome Just Graduate Truck School or Need a Truck School ?CDL A Students Welcome Military Veteran Programs Available (Approved for Post 9/11 GI Bill)Must be over 21Owner Operators are also encouraged to apply Apply now at: Leonard's Express Jobs or call: 585-869-3108

Title: Drive For O'Reilly Auto Parts - Local Route Drivers - No Weekends
Description: Why O'Reilly Auto Parts?Do you like being valued, appreciated and part of a team?  If so, you need to come drive at the O! We offer one of the best driving jobs in the industry.  Home every day, 5 day work week, no weekends, set routes, and low touch freight. Our salary package includes safety incentives, driver bonuses and the potential for raises every 6 months (for the first 4 years)!  Each of our trucks is equipped with an electric pallet jack and hydraulic lift gate. Our drivers are more than drivers, they are included as part of our team and are valued and appreciated!The goal of each Class A CDL Driver is to provide a high level of service to our store customers by consistently getting the right parts to the right places at the right time, in the safest possible manner.What's in it for you?Home Daily5 day work week No weekendsSet routesLow touch freight using full pallet deliveries with electric pallet jacks and hydraulic lift gates on every trailerWell maintained modern fleet of tractors and trailersFull benefit package (medical, dental, vision, 401k, stock purchase plan, etc)Salary package with quarterly incentivesGenerous Team Member discountsBeing part of a team who appreciates and values our drivers.Qualifications:Commercial Class A driver's licenseWilling to obtain Hazmat if not currentSix months regulated tractor trailer experienceSafe driving recordWhat are you waiting for? Come join an industry leader and be a part of a driving team that is truly valued and appreciated! Start your driving career with O'Reilly today! CALL (844) 924-8836

Title: Class A OTR - Drive for the Best in the Industry
Description: The drivers of Woody Bogler Trucking Company are the best in the industry.  They are attracted to the legacy of national leadership, outstanding compensation and excellent equipment.    Hiring OTR drivers with 3 years verifiable experience. The benefits: - $2,500 sign-on bonus (paid throughout the first year) - Annual raises and anniversary bonus - 100% no touch freight - Peterbilt 579's less than 4 years old - Free DirecTV with 100 plus channels - Pet program - Pay scales increase with experience, and with bonuses drivers can earn up to $90k  Job details: - Non-forced dispatch, all 48 states (No NYC and no GW Bridge) - 100% no touch - Automatic trucks, Elite Pass, TVs and refrigerators - OTR drivers out 7-10-14 days (depending on locations) - good home time  Job requirements - Valid Class A license - 3 yrs experience - 24+ years old  This job is offered through Better Thing - powered by Monster.  A new service that matches you with driving jobs based on your qualifications and preferences.  Now offering early access!

Title: YARD SPOTTER | $18.25/HR
Description: Ruan Transportation is hiring full time local night yard drivers for our dedicated national customer based in Indianapolis, IN. Our night yard driver shift is 5PM to 5AM Thursday through Saturday, and 11PM to 5AM on Wednesday. Drivers are required to leave the yard at times, are home daily and earn $18.25 per hour with overtime. Previous yard experience a plus, Class A with Tank endorsement required.    We are now offering a $1,500 Sign-on Bonus! Sign-on Bonus pay outs are $1,000 paid 30 days after hired, then 4 more equal payments quarterly until paid in full.  Call 1-800-879-7826 for more information.  About the Position  Local Night Yard – Class A $1,500 Sign-on Bonus Home Daily Based in Indianapolis, IN Paid $18.25 per hour with overtime  Ruan Driver Benefits  Paid holidays Paid time off (PTO) and 401(k) retirement plan Dedicated customer ensures year-round work Great benefits including medical, dental, and vision  Minimum Requirements  Must have at least one year of verifiable tractor-trailer truck experience in the past 36 months and a valid Class A CDL Must be at least 22 years or older No more than three moving violations in the past three years (some restrictions apply)  No more than one DOT recordable preventable accident in the last three years Additional qualifications may apply

Title: Great opportunity for a CDL class A company drivers
Description: A family-owned business where each driver has the support and attention they need from our staff and dispatchers. The relationships we have with our drivers results in one of the lowest driver turnover rates in trucking. If you are responsible driver looking to make great money and work with a great team look no further.  What we offer:  - 1099 independent contractor contract - Guaranteed mileage (average 3000 miles) - 0.60 cents per mile - Consistent revenue - 2018. Freightliner Cascadia Full loaded - Brand new trailer Wabash or Great Dane 53 ft - 24/7 support - Flexible Dispatch team - Weekly statements - No touch freights  Requirements  - Minimum 23 years of age - Minimum 2 years of experience - Clean driving record (no major violations) - Valid driver license & Medical certificate  Join our team and become part of our family. To hear more about this opportunity please call or text our recruiting team.  Call Sasha (224)-265-0856

Title: CLASS A CDL - OVER THE ROAD - COMPANY TRUCK DRIVER - GUARANTEED PAY!
Description: GO FIRST CLASS  OTR Class A CDL Truck Drivers are the backbone of May Trucking Company. We never forget that our success as an organization depends upon your success, and we work hard to ensure that our Company Drivers’ needs are met. At May Trucking Company you are a person, not just a number. Respect and understanding is key to all our interactions.  Why May Trucking Company?  WE OFFER:  • Up to $.50 CPM • Guaranteed Daily Pay • Monthly Safety Bonus • Monthly Productivity Bonus • Scheduled CPM Increases  • Paid Orientation • Paid Time Off, After 90 Days • Medical, Dental, Vision & Life • 401(k) Retirement • Pet on Your Truck • Rider Policy Available • School Tuition Reimbursement • And So Much More  Equipment:  May Trucking Company operates a fleet of the latest equipment to ensure maximum comfort and uptime for our OTR Class A CDL Company Truck Drivers. All of our tractors are equipped with communication systems that allow our Company Drivers to stay connected.   About us:  May Trucking Company began in Payette, Idaho in 1945 hauling sacks of cement to construction sites. Today, May Trucking Company operates a fleet of more than 100 tractors, providing transportation services for refrigerated and dry products throughout the United States. Our company has operating centers located in Salem (Oregon), Layton (Utah), Payette (Idaho), Denver (Colorado), Gary (Indiana), Pensacola (Florida), Nashville (Tennessee), and Phoenix (Arizona).   Celebrating over 74 years in business May Trucking Company knows that our people make us a success.  We employ only the most talented Company Drivers, utilizing the latest technology, and best equipment to ensure that May Trucking Company remains second to none.   We respect our drivers and their families and have developed our compensation, benefits, and management to cater to YOU.  Join May Trucking today and become part of the family!  Click APPLY NOW for More Information and To Apply.
Compensation: Up to $.50 CPM, Guaranteed Daily Pay, Monthly Safety Bonus, Monthly Productivity Bonus, Scheduled CPM Increases, Paid Orientation, PTO After 90 Days, Medical, Dental, Vision, Life, 401(k) Retirement, Rider Policy Available, School Tuition Reimbursement

Description: Citrin is a valet and hospitality management company that thrives on ensuring an exceptional experience for both our team, our clients, and their guests.We're currently hiring for Valet Attendants to join our team in the at luxury dealerships! Why work for us: -Represent brands like Mercedes Benz, Lexus, and Infiniti! Apply today to hear all the details! -Flexible schedules, tell us your availability and how much you want to work and we'll create a schedule!  -Work normal business hours in the morning and late afternoon (Limited demand evenings/closed Sundays!) -Weekly pay, $11/hour, cash tips, and retention raises every 6 months! -Unlimited growth opportunities locally as well as relocation. - Don't have the experience for a leadership role yet? Don't worry, our training program has your covered!    This opportunity could be an option for those looking for  temporary work, part time work, part-time work, or for those looking for a flexible full time opportunity with weekly pay at Citrin. Hours are flexible. No previous experience as a  valet driver, valet, porter, valets, valet attendant, transportation driver, truck driver, taxi driver, uber, courier driver, delivery driver is necessary. We welcome those who have worked with towne park,chariot valet,  premier parking, national parking corporation, Indiana and Indianapolis valet services, parking america, executive parking. Our valet attendants come from all backgrounds and industries ranging from traditional driving and transportation industries to more customer service and creative industries. If you are a designer, actor, nurse, valet, cleaner, college student, messenger, chauffeur, customer service agent, barista, maid, teacher, retail associate, delivery driver, salesperson, limo driver, hospitality, private hire driver, cab driver, admin, sales person, contract worker, or intern who is looking for a flexible part time or seasonal job, you should try being a member of our team. Weekly Direct deposit… No escrow, -Newest equipment, A/T, manual transmission Weekly Direct deposit… No escrow, Apply On-Line txt your number

Title: Local CDL A Truck Driver - $10,000 Sign On Bonus
Description: Central Transport is an industry leading Less-Than-Truckload (LTL) transportation carrier.  We are one of the nation's largest LTL carries and have experienced significant growth over the last several years.  As we continue to expand our network, we are seeking quality CDL A drivers to fill home daily openings at our Indianapolis, IN Terminal.  We tailor our operations, our technology, and our employees' education to provide our customers with a shipping experience that provides value to their supply chain. Our commitment is simple.  We want to enable our customers to operate their businesses successfully, smoothly, and profitably. Central Transport is privately held, financially rock solid, and firmly positioned for the future.  Positions Available: Local Line Haul Drivers (Night Shift): Dedicated Home Daily routes hauling freight to terminals in our network.  This position is a combination of driving and dock work.  Line Haul Drivers start at $25.50 per hour (for dock work).   Local Pick Up and Delivery Drivers (Day Shift): Local Pick Up & Delivery routes consist of picking up and delivering freight at multiple stops throughout the day and providing excellent customer service to our customers.  This position is a combination of driving and dock work.  Local Pick Up and Delivery Drivers start at $23.00 per hour.   WHAT CENTRAL OFFERS: • Industry Leading Pay • $10,000 SIGN ON BONUS for Linehaul drivers • $5,000 SIGN ON BONUS for Local Pick Up and Delivery drivers • Late Model Tractors - Power Units 2015 or Newer    • Reliable Routes and Shift Schedules    • Medical, Dental, PTO, Paid Holidays Off, Paid Bereavement Leave, Paid Jury Duty Leave  • Now Offering Blue Cross Blue Shield Blue Care Network • Free Uniforms Provided • Hazmat Endorsement Assistance   Job Requirements:  • Class A Commercial Driver's License with Hazmat and Tanker (or willingness to obtain) • Must be 21 Years Old • 3-6 months previous tractor trailer driving experience • Acceptable Motor Vehicle Record • Meet or exceed the medical standards of the U.S. Department of Transportation  All qualified drivers are invited to apply in person.  You can do so Monday-Friday from 8:00 am to 5:00 pm.    Our facility is located at: 1600 Oliver Ave.  Indianapolis, IN 46221  If you're interested and would like to learn more you can reach our Recruiting Team at (800) 331-1176.
Compensation: $23- $25.50 to start depending on position + $10,000 Sign On Bonus

Title: Now Hiring Snow Removal Help
Description: SEi Clean is looking for hard-working, reliable individuals to help us provide excellent snow removal services this year. We service a variety of customers on the North, South, East and West sides. Applicants must be able to work on short notice and arrive at the shop in a timely manner. We work when the weather calls for us to work. Mother nature does not care if it is Christmas Morning or 3am.  The following positions are available: Hand Labors- hand shoveling and salting sidewalks & areas the trucks can not reach Plow/Salt Drivers- MUST HAVE a VALID DRIVER’S LICENSE, GOOD DRIVING RECORD and previous experience driving plow/salt trucks Subcontractors- MUST have own equipment and provide proof of insurance Continued employee is possible when the season ends.  Go to https://seiclean.com/employment-application/ to apply today.

Title: Run Midwest! Weekly hometime! Co Paid Health Benefits
Description: Gully Transportation is family owned and operated for over 50 years~ Here at Gully Transportation we treat our drivers like family! We care about you!  We are currently seeking drivers for our awesome Regional Route that allows you to make TOP $ Dollar $ with a “Family Owned Carrier” that Truly Cares about the DRIVER! Below are just a few reasons you should Call Gully Transportation Today!  • Run Midwest! No Far NE and No West Coast • Weekly Hometime! We offer Regional or Laydown! Home every other day!  • Earn that Money while still getting HOME! • Earn $1000.00-$1300.00  Per Week!  • Assigned Highly Experienced Dispatcher!  • Paid Orientation and all orientation expenses are paid! We take care of you!  • Company Paid Health Insurance!  • Dental & Vision • Paid Holidays!!!  • Vacation Pay • Strong Customer Base!  • We know you by Name not a Truck #!   We have limited positions available! Come Join The Gully Family Today!  You can apply direct @ https://intelliapp.driverapponline.com/c/gullytransportation?r=Danya  Or you can call Direct @ 217-919-2570 and we will be glad to take your information via phone!
Compensation: Earn up to $1200.00 Per Week! Orientation Pay & Sign On Bonus

Title: OTR OWNER OPERATORS $27000-$38000 GROSS PER MONTH!!! LIMITED SPOTS
Description: THERE ARE ONLY 3 POSITIONS AVAILABLE AT THIS TIME AND WILL BE GIVEN ON FCFS (FIRST COME FIRST SERVE) BASIS TO THE RIGHT CANDIDATES!!! IF YOU WANT TO FINALLY MAKE GOOD GROSS $27,000-$38,000 A MONTH IN THIS INDUSTRY WITH THE BAD TIMES WE HAVE THIS IS YOUR TIME TO DO SO. WE ARE FILLING IN TO HAVE MORE CAPACITY FOR LANES WE HAVE ALREADY.  *****WHAT YOU NEED*****  - A GOOD SOLID TRUCK WITH A GOOD DOT INSPECTION. - A CURRENT CLASS A CDL LICENSE WITH A GOOD CLEAN MVR - HAZMAT AND TANKER ENDORSEMENT ON YOUR LICENSE IF YOU DO NOT HAVE IT YOU WILL NEED TO GET THE ENDORSEMENTS AFTER YOU GET HIRED (WE NEED HAZMAT AND TANKER BECAUSE MOST OF OUR LOADS ARE HAZMAT OR NEED TANKER ENDORSEMENT) - HAVE TO DRIVE A MINIMUM OF 10K MILES A MONTH (WE CAN KEEP YOU BUSY AND YOU CAN RUN EVEN 14000-16000 MILES A MONTH IF YOU WANT - SMART PHONE WITH E MAIL ACCESS TO LOAD INFORMATION AND USE KEEP TRUCKING E LOG - YOU NEED CURRENT PHYSICAL DAMAGE INSURANCE FOR YOUR TRUCK  *****YOUR EXPENSE TO RUN IN OUR COMPANY*****  - LICENSE PLATE PROGRAM (PRICE VARIES DUE TO LICENSE PLATES BEING CHEAPER THE CLOSER TO MARCH THAT WE GET, THEY ARE PRO RATED) - $200 CARGO INSURANCE WEEKLY - 12% DISPATCH FEE (ALL OTHER FEES SUCH AS FACTORING INCLUDED IN THE 12%) - $200 A WEEK TRAILER CHARGE IF YOU DO NOT HAVE A TRAILER  *****WHAT WE OFFER*****  - GOOD GROSS OUR CURRENT TRUCKS GROSS ANYWHERE FROM $27,000-$38,000 DEPENDING ON THE MONTH AND HOW MUCH THEY RUN THAT MONTH - OVER $2 AVG ON ALL YOUR MILES EMPTY AND LOADED FOR THE MONTH - FLEET ONE FUEL CARDS WITH NO FEES TO USE - LICENSE PLATE PROGRAM - TRAILER (VAN) - WE CAN ALSO PREPARE YOUR IFTA  LOOKING FOR OVER THE ROAD OWNER OPERATORS!!! LETS FACE IT THE MARKET IS BAD, LOADS ARE LIMITED AND COMPANIES PROMISE OWNER OPERATORS ANYTHING JUST TO GET THEM IN THE DOOR AND JOIN THEIR COMPANIES OR LET GO OF GOOD GUYS THAT THEY SIMPLY CAN'T KEEP BUSY. WE ARE A GOOD OUTFIT FOR OWNER OPERATORS THAT FINALLY WANT TO MAKE WHAT THEY DESERVE TO MAKE IN THIS MARKET. WE CAN KEEP YOU BUSY AND CAN KEEP YOU MAKING MONEY. WE STARTED THIS COMPANY BASED ON COMPANY TRUCKS ONLY, NOW THAT WE FINALLY HAVE WAY MORE LOADS THAN WE CAN COVER WITH OUR OWN TRUCKS WE ARE LOOKING TO FILL 3-4 SPOTS WITH 3-4 GOOD OWNER OPERATORS THAT HAVE GOOD EQUIPMENT AND WANT TO PUT THEIR TRUCKS TO WORK FOR SOME GREAT $$$. WE ARE LIMITED ON SPOTS SO IF YOU ARE INTERESTED PLEASE CALL US BETWEEN 8AM-7PM CENTRAL TIME TO DISCUSS ALL THE THINGS NEEDED TO START WITH US.  IN ORDER TO MAKE MONEY IN THIS INDUSTRY NOT ONLY IN A BAD MARKET BUT ALSO IN ANY MARKET YOU NEED TO HAVE THE RIGHT DISPATCH TEAM. HERE AT TWENTY 4 SEVEN EXPRESS WE ARE THE BEST AT WHAT WE DO WHEN IT COMES TO GETTING LOADS AND GETTING THE CORRECT PAY. LETS FACE IT SOMETIMES EVERYONE WILL HAVE TO TAKE A BAD LOAD IN ORDER TO GET OUT OF AN AREA WHERE NOTHING PAYS, HERE AT TWENTY 4 SEVEN EXPRESS WE WILL MAKE SURE YOU GET THE BEST POSSIBLE LOAD OUT OF EVERY AREA, WE DEAL WITH PRE PLANS AND WE BOOK TRUCKS WAY AHEAD OF TIME IN ORDER TO FIND AND HAVE TIME TO LOCATE THE BEST POSSIBLE PAYING LOADS. WE ALSO DO A LOT OF PRE PLANS SO THAT YOU CAN PLAN YOUR TIME AND SO THERE IS LIMITED SITTING TIME AT ANY SHIPPER OR RECEIVER. WE DO NOT USE SHIPPERS/RECEIVERS THAT HOLD US UP FOR MORE THAN 2 HOURS AND IF THEY DO WE PUT THEM ON OUR DO NOT LOAD OR UNLOAD LIST SO THAT WE DO NOT HAVE TO WASTE TIME SITTING AROUND WAITING, TIME IS MONEY IN THIS BUSINESS AND IF THE WHEELS ARE NOT TURNING NO ONE IS MAKING MONEY. WE HAVE A LOT OF FREIGHT THAT PAYS US MORE ON SHORTER TRIPS VS LONG TRIPS, FOR OUR COMPANY TRUCKS TAKING SHORT TRIPS DOES NOT WORK DUE TO DRIVERS MAKING PER MILE PAY, BUT FOR AN OWNER OPERATOR MAKING $1000 ON A 250-300 MILE LOAD IS WAY BETTER THAN MAKING $1000 ON A 500 MILE TRIP, LESS MAINTENANCE, LESS DRIVING, AND LESS FUEL. WE TEND TO MAKE ANYWHERE FROM 3000 MILES TO ABOUT 3500 MILES A WEEK HERE AT TWENTY 4 SEVEN EXPRESS.  REMEMBER THAT ALL THE COMPANIES OUT THERE ADVERTISING ARE TRYING ONLY TO FILL THEIR GAPS TO KEEP THEIR FREIGHT. WE DO NOT COMMIT OURSELVES TO ANYONE WE ARE LOOKING TO FILL MINIMAL SPOTS FOR THE RIGHT FEW CANDIDATES, THE MORE MONEY YOU MAKE THE MORE MONEY WE MAKE. Title: Courier Driver/Independant Contractor
Description: Courier Driver / Independent Contractors Needed!  Pillow Logistics- Founded in 1988, Pillow Logistics provides courier, warehouse and mailroom services daily. Our contract driver community is the heartbeat of the organization.  Contract Driver- Success for your business is based 100% on your availability, attention to detail, and ability to prioritize tasks. We are looking for contract drivers that put the customer first and who will promote the core values of Pillow Logistics. Contractor settlements are paid weekly via direct deposit. Commission based earning per route and/or delivery.  Responsibilities  · Transport office supplies, pharmaceuticals, lab specimens, interoffice mail, or other courier related items  · Perform dedicated on-site routes, distribution routes, and/or on demand services  · Inspecting and maintaining vehicle supplies and equipment to ensure that vehicles are in proper working condition  · Load and operate a vehicle according to established guidelines and all applicable laws  · Punctuality is vital for all our contract drivers  · Must own your own vehicle. Cargo Vans and Box Trucks are needed immediately, but all vehicles considered.  · Must have a smartphone and so the ability to navigate and use apps.  Education and Experience Required  · Must be proficient in reading, writing, and speaking English  · Must have a valid State driver’s license and a clean driving record  · Must pass a criminal B/G Check and Drug Screen  · Prior Courier experience highly preferred, but not required    Knowledge and Skills  · Have great communication skills.  · Ability to use GPS (Prefer good knowledge of local area and traffic patterns)  · Ability to lift 50lbs unassisted    For consideration as an independent contract driver, please email us or stop by our office located at 5128 W. 79th St, Indianapolis, IN 46237 (Mon-Fri 8am-4:30pm)
Compensation: 1099 contractor, commission based on route size

Title: Midwest Dedicated Class A CDL Truck Driver ($1,375/Week)
Description: Reset at home every week, out Sunday-Friday or Monday-Saturday (your pick), dedicated lanes, Midwest regional operating area, earn on average $1,375/week, full benefits, paid vacation, and paid holidays. Learn more about PTI's Regional Midwest Dedicated Class A CDL Truck Driver position.Overview:Home Time: Reset at Home Every WeekSchedule: Out Sunday-Friday or Monday-Saturday (your pick)Compensation: average $1,375.00/week (paid weekly) and average $71,500.00 annuallyDetention: $17/Hour after first hour and up to 8 hours/dayDouble Drop & Hook Pay: $10Stop-Off Pay: $20First-Load Bonus: $500 paid after first load is pulledBonuses: Up to $300/month MPG Bonus and $1,000/Referral BonusAdditional Details:Operating Area: Illinois, Iowa, Kentucky, Minnesota, Missouri, North Dakota, Ohio, and WisconsinEquipment: Late-Model Diesel SleeperPaid Vacation: 2 Weeks Per Year Paid (1 Week Every 6 Months First 3 Years)Paid Holidays: $120/day (6 Paid/Year)Insurance: Medical, Vision, Dental, Life, Short/Long-Term DisabilityRetirement Planning: 401K Match and Free Financial CounselingAllows Passengers: YesAllows Pets: YesRequirements:Current Class A CDL6+ months recent tractor-trailer experience  Learn More About This Position Founded 29 years ago in Green Bay, Wis., PTI is listed in the Commercial Carrier Journal’s Top 150 Carriers, as a for-hire, dry-van trucking company, competing with over 500,000 trucking companies in the U.S. The company focuses on regional truckload, dedicated truckload, and intermodal services with multiple locations throughout the Midwest, Southeast and Southern U.S.   Job ID: MW004

Title: Amazon Contracted Delivery Driver – DIN1 Indianapolis IN
Description: Become a Delivery Associate / Driver for a Contracted Amazon Delivery Service Partner!  Amazon Delivery Service Partners are seeking bright, motivated, hardworking individuals to fill Contracted Delivery Associate / Driver positions!  No experience needed!  Apply today to schedule your in-person interview with Amazon Delivery Service Partners. We're making on the spot job offers! (All job offers contingent on meeting eligibility requirements.)  Responsibilities:  Our Delivery Associates/Drivers drive a delivery van to drop off Amazon packages to customers within their community You can plan on working about 4-5 days a week You can plan on a typical working day being 10 hours Our drivers follow strict safety standards on and off the road You'll interact with Amazon customers and the public in a professional and positive manner You'll use handheld technology to manage the delivery process  We Offer:  Competitive Compensation - $15.00 - 16.25/hour Employee benefits available Community interaction Every day is fun and different!  Job Requirements:  Delivery Associates / Drivers must meet the following requirements:  Must be at least 21+ years old Must have a valid driver's license within the state of employment Must be able to operate and navigate a delivery van, GVWR 10,000 lbs. or less Must be able to move boxes up to 70 lbs., with or without reasonable accommodation Must consent to a drug screening Must have good communication skills and the ability to work well with customers  We are conducting hiring events at:5850 W. 80th Street Indianapolis IN 11am-5pm  November dates:  20th , 21st , 22nd.   We encourage you to apply using the link first:http://www.jobs.net/j/JGIxwEfR?idpartenaire=131 so that we can coordinate with you on scheduling interview times and with updated interview locations!  (INTERVIEWS BRING YOUR DRIVER LICENSE)

Job Summary: The qualified candidate for this position will make deliveries to residential customers with a focus on timeliness and customer service. The Delivery team will off-load materials at each stop, deliver and place products to the customers specifications. If you are a motivated self-starter and are interested in learning more about becoming an independent contractor, TopHAT is for YOU! Job Duties and Requirements: -Outstanding customer service and communication skills -Must be able to work independently and manage time appropriately to meet deadlines -Valid Drivers License -Chauffer License required (operating a vehicle between 16,0001 and 26,000 lbs) -Must be able to lift at least 50 lbs or more. -Must be able to pass background and drug test Previous or current Owner/Operator status is a PLUS Access a 26' Box Truck 2 man team required. Please forward all resumes via email.  Principals only. Recruiters, please don't contact this job poster. do NOT contact us with unsolicited services or offers Job Type: Contract  License:  Driver's License (Preferred)

Title: Delivery Driver
Description: Sharp Parts a division of Capitol City Ford is looking for route delivery drivers. We need drivers part time or full time, available Mon thru Fri 7:00 am to 5:30 pm.  No weekends, no overnights.  You tell how us how many days you want to work!!!  Job duties include: • Driving a van 8 to 10 hours a day across Indiana • Loading and unloading the truck  All applicants must be able to • Handle some heavy lifting • Work outdoors • Work in an automotive and/or body shop environment • Be clean cut and personable  Pay is $10.00 an hour.  Must have a valid license with a clean driving record.  We require stable employment history and we will verify.  Must be reliable and dependable.  Passed drug test and clean criminal history is also required.  Application taken in-person at 10320 E Pendleton Pike, parts department  We are an Equal Opportunity Employer

Title: Class A Drivers - Dedicated Trips
Description: Class A Drivers! Salmon Companies is reworking our network and we have exciting new opportunities for full-time drivers to haul mail from Indianapolis to various points. We have openings for 6 drivers, with job packages going to Chicago; Whitehouse, TN; or Nashville, TN.   All of these jobs are at least 47 hours per week and work a 4 days on/2 days off/3 week rotating schedule. The trips to points in Tennessee are home daily. The trips to Chicago have a layover 1 day per week, but we provide lodging and layover pay. All work is dry van with a day cab and 53' trailer.  The job package includes: *Weekly pay *Paid holidays *Paid vacation *Health insurance subsidy *Voluntary benefits *Late model equipment *Safety-oriented company  For more information about these exciting new jobs, contact Angela at (844) 244-5284.  https://intelliapp.driverapponline.com/c/salmon?r=craigslistindianapolis80715

Title: Midwest Regional Driver Needed! FCC Now Hiring! Home Weekly! Great Pay
Description: This is the career you deserve!  Looking for a better opportunity?  FCC offer's no touch freight, excellent pay, and home every weekend.  FCC is currently hiring both Company drivers and Owner Operators for this Regional Division. Company drivers average $65K per year, and Owner Operators average $175k gross per year - plus, over the last 12 months alone our Company Drivers have seen 3 pay increases, and our Owner Operators have had 4!!! Drive for a company that has been voted BEST FLEETS TO DRIVE FOR eight years in a row - drive for FCC!  YOU'LL GET: Recent Pay Increases for Both Company Drivers and Owner Operators!!! Run the Midwest Region ONLY!  Weekend Home Time of 34-48 Hours EVERY WEEK! Paid Vacation. $0.04/Mile Quarterly Mileage/Safety Bonus. Eligible for a $0.01/Mile Annual Increase - EVERY YEAR! Consistent, No-Touch Freight. 2,500-2,700 Miles a Week. Newer Truck w/APU, Fridge, Freezer and 2000 Watt Inverter. Valued, Family-Oriented Company Atmosphere!  REQUIREMENTS: Minimum 2 Years OTR verifiable experience in the last 3 years. Must meet all Federal Motor Carrier Safety Regulations. Must have a Commercial Drivers License with proper endorsements in state of residence. No serious traffic violations in the past 3 years.

Title: FedEx Delivery Driver-Seasonal Drivers Needed!!!
Description: Job Description Daystar Deliveries is looking for SeasonalFull-Time Delivery Drivers in the Indianapolis, IN area. Opportunity for full time after Christmas as well.  Overview:  · Schedule: Tuesday-Saturday.  · Depart from FedExGround Indianapolis, IN location  · Most deliveries will be made to residential locations.  · The vehicle provided by Daystar Deliveries may vary between: -Step Van -24 /26-foot box truck - Sprinter - Cargo Van  · A commercial license is NOT required  MUST Possess the following to be considered:  · ONE FULL YEAR of on-the-job driving experience (Uber and Lyft do qualify)  · A clean MVR(Motor Vehicle Record) without excessive speeding tickets, reckless driving,etc.  · MUST BE 21 YEARS OF AGE OR OLDER  Training: $120.00 per day  Salary: $700.00-$850.00 per WEEK  Job Type: Temporary  Salary: $700.00 to $850.00 /week  Please answer the following questions in your response/application to the job posting: How many years of commercial driving experience do you have? How many years of delivery driver experience do you have? How many years of driving experience do you have? Do you have the following license or certification: CDL Class B?

Title: CDL Driver - Class A or B
Description: Stone Mart is one of the largest Natural Stone Distributors in the Central Ohio area with an excellent growth record. We are looking for a CDL driver for our Indianapolis location.  We offer benefits including paid vacation days, paid sick days, paid holidays, health insurance, and pay to match the best in the industry for candidates with experience and ability. Drivers are home almost every night.  As a local delivery driver, you will be responsible for:  -The continuous safe, courteous and efficient delivery of materials to customer locations in Indiana and surrounding states.  - Basic product knowledge.  - Assist in unloading at job sites.  - When deliveries are completed early, you may be required to work in our facility assisting other warehouse personnel.  What Stone Mart is looking for in a team member:  * Timeliness and Responsibility are key * Able to be respectful and be helpful to all clients * Exemplify our company and brand to everyone you encounter on the road * Willing to own your position and strive to always go the extra mile * Daily trips in flatbed truck * Long hours when needed, but hard works meets just compensation * Hard-working and respectable individual looking to grow with a growing company  Requirements:  The position requires at least 1 year experience. Neat appearance and have a clean driving record with a Class B CDL DOT Medical Card required Ability to pass a drug test and background check.   Please submit your resume online.  ***Stone Mart is a great place to work! Our presence is only in Ohio and Indiana. We are not associated with any other locations!***  8215 Zionsville Rd. Indianapolis, IN. 46268  Job Type: Full-time
Compensation: hourly wage based on experience per industry standard

Title: Delivery driver
Description: FedEx Ground contractor looking for a dependable driver.  Several shifts open.    Starting pay depends upon experience.  You need to have a clean MVR, one year of driving experience(Uber,door dash,Amazon etc...). Clean criminal background.  Average pay starts off at $700 a week.  If interested please send resume.
Compensation: Starting no less than $700 a week

Title: Warehouse Associate/Forklift Operator
Description: We are looking for a Warehouse Associate to add to our team! Will be responsible for stocking shelves, receiving trucks, picking orders for customer pick-ups and for next day deliveries. We are looking for someone with good customer service skills and will be responsible for interacting with customers regularly. We do require forklift experience for this position. Must be able to lift up to 70 lbs and our products consists of siding, windows, doors and other building materials.  Requirements:  1 year or more Warehouse experience Forklift experience a must Valid driver's license Reliable transportation to get to work Excellent customer service skills Lift up to 70 lbs regularly Please apply to this ad or call  216-377-6833

Title: Midwest Dedicated Regional Class A CDL Truck Driver ($1,105.00/week)
Description: Home time weekly for 2 days, 5-day work week, dedicated account, Midwest regional operating area, guaranteed minimum pay, earn on average $1,105/week, paid vacation, and paid holidays. Learn more about PTI's Dedicated Regional Truck Driver position.Overview:Home Time: Weekly 2 days - Friday and Saturday; Saturday and Sunday; or Sunday and MondaySchedule: driving nights Sunday-Thursday, Monday-Friday, or Tuesday-SaturdayGuaranteed Minimum Pay: $1,100/weekCompensation: average $1,105.00/week and $57,460.00/yearDetention: $17/Hour after first hour and up to 8 hours/dayDouble Drop & Hook Pay: $10Stop-Off Pay: $20First-Load Bonus: $500 paid after first load is pulledBonuses: Up to $300/month MPG Bonus and $1,000/Referral BonusAdditional Details:Operating Area: Illinois, Indiana, Iowa, Michigan, Minnesota, Missouri, North Dakota, Ohio, South Dakota, and WisconsinEquipment: Late-Model Kenworth or Freightliner Diesel SleeperPaid Vacation: 2 Weeks Per Year Paid (1 Week Every 6 Months First 3 Years)Paid Holidays: $120/day (6 Paid/Year)Insurance: Medical, Vision, Dental, Life, and Short/Long-Term DisabilityRetirement Planning: 401K Match and Free Financial CounselingAllows Passengers: YesAllows Pets: YesRequirements:Current Class A CDL9-12 months or more recent tractor-trailer experience  Learn More About This Position Founded 29 years ago in Green Bay, Wis., PTI is listed in the Commercial Carrier Journal’s Top 150 Carriers, as a for-hire, dry-van trucking company, competing with over 500,000 trucking companies in the U.S. The company focuses on regional truckload, dedicated truckload, and intermodal services with multiple locations throughout the Midwest, Southeast and Southern U.S.   Job ID: MW005

Title: $60cpm, CDL "A", OTR
Description: Looking for drivers that are eager to make money, work with a family environment, and have great benefits - now hiring a few qualified drivers. -Excellent pay, weekly settlements -$500 Sign On bonus, if approved before 12/12/2019 -Stable routes with good miles and Stop-off pay $50 -Regular home-time - biweekly or better -All Holidays at Home Location -Minimum of 12 months OTR experience required. -Newest equipment, A/T, manual transmission, - Weekly Direct deposit… No escrow, - Apply On-Line txt your number

Title: Construction clean up - Driver/Helper
Description: GT's Hauling LLC is looking for a driver/helper for construction clean up. Someone that wants to have fun and grow with a start up company. Work is very fast paced, heavy lifting and outside all year round. Must have valid drivers license and ability to drive truck with trailer. Background check will be required.   Starting Pay will be $15 an hour, with a raise/review after 90 days.   Work will be from Northeast side to west side of Indy.   This will be a full time position, no benefits at this time. Vacation will be discussed after 90 days.

Title: Multiple CDL Positions - Speak On-Site to a Recruiter
Description: Schneider offers an unparalleled variety of driving positions. Pick the job that meets your optimal combination of pay and home time, and always get the respect you deserve. We offer one of the widest varieties of truck driving jobs in the industry - for both Team and Solo drivers. Title: Class A Drivers - Dedicated Trips
Description: Class A Drivers! Salmon Companies is reworking our network and we have exciting new opportunities for full-time drivers to haul mail from Indianapolis to various points. We have openings for 6 drivers, with job packages going to Chicago; Whitehouse, TN; or Nashville, TN.   All of these jobs are at least 47 hours per week and work a rotating 4 days on/2 days off schedule. The trips to points in Tennessee are home daily and are no-touch loads. The trips to Chicago have a layover 1 day per week, but we provide lodging and layover pay of $200 per layover. The trips to Chicago are nominal touch loads. All work is dry van with a day cab and 53' trailer; no endorsements needed.  The job package includes: *Weekly pay *Paid holidays *Paid vacation *Health insurance subsidy *Voluntary benefits *Late model equipment *Safety-oriented company  For more information about these exciting new jobs, contact Angela at (844) 244-5284.  https://intelliapp.driverapponline.com/c/salmon?r=craigslistindianapolis80715

Title: FCC MW Regional Driver Needed! Per Diem/Weekly Home Time/Benefits!
Description: This is the career you deserve!  Looking for a better opportunity?  FCC offer's no touch freight, excellent pay, and home every weekend.  FCC is currently hiring both Company drivers and Owner Operators for this Regional Division. Company drivers average $65K per year, and Owner Operators average $175k gross per year - plus, over the last 12 months alone our Company Drivers have seen 3 pay increases, and our Owner Operators have had 4!!! Drive for a company that has been voted BEST FLEETS TO DRIVE FOR eight years in a row - drive for FCC!  YOU'LL GET: Recent Pay Increases for Both Company Drivers and Owner Operators!!! Run the Midwest Region ONLY!  Weekend Home Time of 34-48 Hours EVERY WEEK! Paid Vacation. $0.04/Mile Quarterly Mileage/Safety Bonus. Eligible for a $0.01/Mile Annual Increase - EVERY YEAR! Consistent, No-Touch Freight. 2,500-2,700 Miles a Week. Newer Truck w/APU, Fridge, Freezer and 2000 Watt Inverter. Valued, Family-Oriented Company Atmosphere!  REQUIREMENTS: Minimum 2 Years OTR verifiable experience in the last 3 years. Must meet all Federal Motor Carrier Safety Regulations. Must have a Commercial Drivers License with proper endorsements in state of residence. No serious traffic violations in the past 3 years.

Title: Hiring solo drivers up to $0.60/mile
Description: Hiring  solo drives up to $0.60/mile (Chicago) and owner operators • Over the road (OTR) • Single driver makes 2500-3500 miles a week • We also hire owner operators (12% of gross dispatcher fees) • 2-year experience is preferred • Direct deposits are made every Monday • Company fuel card • We use PrePass for tolls • $1000 security deposit each driver • Our company is based in Chicago, so we reimburse the travel expenses  We are looking forward to hearing from you soon! Title: Construction clean up - Driver/Helper

Title: (IN) Seasonal Hauler/ Driver Helper
Description: We are looking for a Hauler/ Driver Helper for a recycling facility located in Indianapolis IN.  The Helper rides in the vehicle and provides waste removal services for customers who reside on a designated residential route.  The Helper is responsible for safely loading waste and poly carts, as well as carrying bags and containers to the vehicle for disposal. The position assists the Driver in maneuvering his or her vehicle by directing the Driver from the ground. In addition, the Helper helps to maintain the cleanliness of the vehicle, as well as the residential route and work area.  Shift start at 6:00 am Monday-Friday  Pay $12.50     Requirements are:  .-Steel toe boots.  .-Have your own transportation to make it on time every day to work.   Email your full name with phone number and I will call you ASAP.

Title: Diesel Technician/Mechanic II
Description: Position Summary: Penske Technician II will generally assist in the repair and diagnosis of major components or remove/replace major components of various truck and trailer equipment at the direction of Lead Technician or Maintenance Supervisor. Expectations include the ability to diagnose and repair the following with little or no supervision: Clutches, PTO Systems, Electric Systems, Hydraulic/ Air Brake systems, Heating/ Air Conditioning Systems, Instruments and Gauges, and Preventive Maintenance Service.   Address: 4304 W. Morris St. Indianapolis, IN 46241   Major Responsibilities:  - Demonstrate proficiency in the repair and diagnosis of - with some assistance: Engines (gas and diesel), Power train to include differentials, transmissions, clutches, drive shafts, PTO's and wheel ends, Electrical systems including starters and alternators, HVAC systems, Steering systems, Electronics to include ECM's, ECU's, sensors etc., Engine bolt on items such as turbos, fan clutches, injectors, cooling system etc., Brake systems including ABS, Suspension systems (spring and air) - Perform mechanical and general appearance reconditioning of equipment for "trade-ins" and prepare new equipment for delivery. - Identify and determine parts required for repair of disassembled units - Perform all levels of preventive maintenance services on truck and trailer equipment - Identify warrantable repairs and document on repair order - Maintain work area appearance and safety - Road test Vehicles when necessary to diagnose malfunctions or to ensure that they are working properly. - Use hand tools such as screwdrivers, pliers, wrenches, pressure gauges, and precision instruments, as well as power tools such as pneumatic wrenches, welding equipment, and jacks and hoists. - Inspect brake systems, steering mechanisms, wheel bearings, and other important parts to ensure that they are in proper operating condition. - Perform routine maintenance such as changing oil, checking batteries, and lubricating equipment and machinery. - Adjust and replace brakes, tighten bolts and screws, and reassemble equipment. - Raise trucks, buses, and heavy parts or equipment using hydraulic jacks or hoists. - Inspect, test, and listen to defective equipment to diagnose malfunctions, using test instruments such as handheld computers, motor analyzers, chassis charts, and pressure gauges. - Examine and adjust protective guards, loose bolts, and specified safety devices. Inspect and verify dimensions and clearances of parts to ensure conformance to factory specifications. - Specialize in repairing and troubleshooting of major components such as engine, transmissions and differentials, to include replacing complete assemblies, turbochargers, fuel system components etc. - Other projects and tasks as assigned by supervisor   Qualifications  - 2-4 years practical experience with tractor trailer maintenance required - High school diploma or equivalent required - Vocational/Technical or certification preferred - Specialized training in the repair and replacement of vehicle components preferred - Proficiency in the use of shop tools required  - A valid drivers license is required  - Current CDL license with air brake certification preferred, willingness to acquire CDL if you do not have one. - Basic computer skills preferred for data entry into maintenance systems. - Ability to work in non-climate controlled conditions required - Regular, predictable, full attendance is an essential function of the job.- Willingness to travel as necessary within the district (customers yards, close geographical area and training sites), work the required schedule, work at the specific location required, complete Penske employment application, submit to a background investigation (to include past employment, education, and criminal history) and drug screening are required. Physical Requirements: -The physical and mental demands described here are representative of those that must be met by an associate to successfully perform the essential functions of this job. Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions.-The associate will be required to remember and understand certain instructions, guidelines or other information. The associate must be able to see and verbally communicate. Specific vision abilities required by this job include close vision, distance vision, peripheral vision, depth perception and the ability to adjust focus.-While performing the duties of this job, the associate will be required to move frequently, stand, walk, and sit. The associate is frequently required to use hands to touch, handle, and feel, and to reach with hands and arms. The associate must be able to regularly lift and/or move up to 50lbs/23kg and occasionally lift and/or move up to 100lbs/45kg.   Penske is an Equal Opportunity Employer.   About Penske Truck Leasing Penske Truck Leasing Co., L.P., headquartered in Reading, Pennsylvania, is a partnership of Penske Corporation, Penske Automotive Group and Mitsui & Co., Ltd. A leading global transportation services provider, Penske operates a premier fleet of vehicles and serves its customers from locations in North America, South America, Europe, Australia, and Asia. Penske’s product lines include full-service truck leasing, contract maintenance, commercial and consumer truck rentals, used truck sales, transportation and warehousing management and supply chain management solutions. Visit www.GoPenske.com to learn more.    To apply for this position, please CLICK HERE

Title: Owner Op/Lease Purchase Ownership Program - 4 divisions to choose from
Description: Autumn Transport is looking for Owner Operators and Lease Purchase Operators to pull our liquid tanks, dry bulk pneumatic tanks, end dumps, and hopper bottoms over the road and regionally. We have steady, year round freight and have what it takes to make you a successful owner operator.    We prefer to use the term Ownership Program vs Lease Purchase because we are set apart from other companies in that we do not have a huge balloon payment at the end, we do not charge rent on the trailers and a person can expect affordable weekly truck payments and own the truck outright in approximately 3 years. We work with you to find a truck that meets the requirements for both you and the purchasing department.  Autumn Transport was founded in 1980 and has been family owned and operated since. We have an open door policy and know our drivers by name! We are committed to the success of all of our family of operators.  We Offer:  -Good home time -Weekly Settlements -Direct Deposit -100% Owner Operator -Pre-Pass -PeopleNet PD4 -100% Fuel Surcharge to the Owner Operator -Excellent Lease Purchase Ownership Program available  Requirements:  -23 years old -2 years OTR tractor/trailer experience within the last 3 years -Consistent employment history -Clean record and CSA score  If you are interested please follow the link below to our website and fill out an application below or give us a call at   (651) 294-0131 ask for Mark  https://intelliapp2.driverapponline.com/c/autumntransport?uri_b=ia_autumntransport_1609754814  http://www.autumngrain.com/prospective-drivers/lease-programs/

Title: CDL Drivers with Hazmat & Tanker endorsement
Description: ** Who we are looking for ** MOTIVATED DRIVER (someone who likes what he's doing) MONEY MAKER (team player - communicative and a problem solver) LONG TERM DRIVER (not just for a few checks and leave)  Requirements: 2 years CDL holder No DUIs No texting while driving offenses  Hazmat Endorsement is a Bonus (offering top pay) Tanker Endorsed drivers are WELCOME too  **What we offer:** ***direct deposit 1099 to your business account*** ***Well maintained Freightliner Cascadias - new only if availbe*** Highly motivated dispatch team to get the best loads and highest rates to keep you well payed! Title: HOME DAILY, UP TO $27.00 HR. CDL A DRIVERS
Description: About the position : UO TO $27.00 AN HOUR 12 months of recent tractor trailer driving experience Local out & back full-time. Mostly M-F work. Days & Evenings available. Number of stop will vary depending on customer needs & position. No touch & touch freight available  Automatic & manual trucks available. Typically hauling just Dry Van & Tanker  Hauling mail, medical supplies or chemicals & ingredients  The Benefits of working with OLS: Maintain a stable balance of work and home life with Out & Back Runs! Weekly Pay Our insurance covers medical, dental, and vision. We also offer Life Insurance, 401K, and HSA options 6 paid holidays a year Accrued PTO/ Vacation Time Driver Referral Bonuses & Safe Driver Bonuses  Requirements:  Valid Class A CDL.   12 months of recent Tractor Trailer driving experience within the last 36 months  Endorsements: Tanker & Hazmat helpful Must be 23 years of age or older No DUIs / DWIs in the past 5 years No more than 3 moving violations in the past 48 months Must be able to pass a DOT Drug Screen, Physical, and comprehensive Background Check  I AM INTERESTED! HOW DO I APPLY?

Title: $28/hr + Home Daily// Class A CDL Early morning start
Description: One of the best assigned runs------Indy to St Louis every day!  Early morning 3am start Back home each day by 1pm Tuesday thru Saturday  •We provide you with an assigned truck (no Slip Seating) • Freightliner & Volvo Daycabs • No touch freight • Full Benefits after 90 days with Medical, Dental, and Vision • 1 weeks of paid vacation after the first year of employment • 6 paid Holidays: New Year's, Memorial Day, July 4th, Labor Day, Thanksgiving, Christmas Day • Holiday and Safety Bonus program •401K with 2% match!!!!! after one year anniversary   Job Requirements: • Required: Class A CDL with one-year experience in past 3 years (or 5 years in past 10 years) • Will need Doubles endorsement. Our Fleet Manager will train on doubles. • No felonies in a criminal background check • Must be able to pass a drug test, road test, and DOT physical • Minimum of 3 tickets and/or accidents in the last 3 years  We run a private Fleet of Semi-tractor trailers with FedEx ground and Amazon Our drivers typically recommend other drivers, but we’ve hired everyone’s family qualified for Class A.  Call Talent Capital (216)469-5428

We run Midwest and South .NO WEST COAST. call or text 708-222-7277

Title: Class A CDL Truck Driver-Home Daily
Description: Job Description We need solid, safe, professional drivers to add to our fleet! Our company is bulking up for the holidays, but the best of the best will be kept on and made a permanent employee.  Company:  Indiana-based, family owned, 4th generation  Job Description:  NO TOUCH FREIGHT!! We deliver mail and packages to other warehouses and post offices. We run 365 days a year and 24 hours a day.  Shifts:  Most runs dispatch between 6pm and 6am. You will make 2 runs a shift unless given a longer distance. Be prepared to work 6-7 days a week!!! This is a great opportunity to make a lot of money in a short amount of time!  Pay:  $30/hr during peak season!! If hired full time, pay will be $22.50 straight pay with $5.11 fringe for the first 40 hours.  Requirements:  Must have 2 years of experience or 2 winter seasonS Must have experience with MANUAL transmissions!!! No more than 2 speeding violations in 3 years NO following too close violations NO FELONIES All accidents will be looked at and MUST be disclosed! Must pass 2 drug screens and company road test HONESTY and INTEGRITY are very important to our company!  Spots are filling up fast so call us TODAY!  Lisa 205-410-1745  Shala 205-937-1702  Driver Force Inc. is an equal opportunity/affirmative action employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to sex, gender identity, sexual orientation, race, color, religion, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, age, or any other characteristic protected by law.

Title: Lead Chef / Cook
Description: Our Restaurant is looking to hire a new lead  Chef /Cook and an Assistant Chef / Cook who will be responsible for preparing awesome dishes for our guests. Duties will include prepping meals by weighing, measuring, and mixing ingredients, cooking meals, checking ingredients for freshness, and arranging and garnishing the dishes. You will also be in charge of ensuring that the kitchen and equipment are properly cleaned and maintained. You also will be responsible for preparing food for the 2 food trucks and catering events, as well as operation of the trucks on occasions. To be successful in this job, you will need a thorough experience with hot and cold food preparation. Culinary school education is preferred, and prior experience in a related position is an advantage. Rate starts at $12 to $15 per hour. Salaried arrangements also possible.

Vehicle Needed --- Cargo Van, Truck or Huge SUV -- NEED space to load sacks of mail in Vehicle Experience --- Need good personal references, be DEPENDABLE, be able to lift up to 50lbs (mail bags) Location --- Avon IN and surrounding towns Pay --- Job Pays $250. Job should take about 9 hours total to pick up Friday from our customer's location and deliver to Post Offices Friday and Monday. I will pay $250 total, which should cover Pay, Partial Job Holdover & Gas. Please provide --- Name, Address, Cell number, valid Driver's License, other contact number, personal references  Call, TXT -or- Email me --- 336-709-6310 ask for Kenny

Title: WTC IS NOW HIRING HOURLY PAID CLASS A CDL DRIVERS IN YOUR AREA!
Description: ARE YOU TIRED OF WORKING FOR FREE WITH YOUR CURRENT EMPLOYER? If so then it’s time to look at Watsontown Trucking Company, the leader of pay in the trucking industry.  At WTC you are paid for every on-duty hour and OT after 50 hours. It’s the only fair way to pay a driver.  You deserve to be paid when you’re behind the wheel or sitting at a customer’s dock.  Its proven to be the most stable and stress-free way being a Class A CDL Driver.   At WTC we have one of the lowest turnover rates in the industry.  Our drivers find a peace of mind that they never had before with any other company.   WTC is seeking qualified Over the Road and Regional Drivers to service our growing customer base.    Regional  • STARTING PAY $20 per hour (OT after 50 hours) • Home weekends  OTR • STARTING PAY $21 per hour (OT after 50 hours) • 14-21 Days Out • Ample home time  o Dedicated Driver Manager o 24/7 Dispatch available  o Assigned trucks-no slip seating o Onsite shop of 50 mechanics available 24/7 (365 days a year) o Family owned and operated since 1941, with 500+ employees o Full Benefits Package with Medical, Prescription, Dental and Vision Coverage o 401K with a company match o Life insurance, Long Term Disability, Short Term Disability and Aflac Coverage Options o Bonuses, Holiday Pay, Vacation Pay, and Stability! o Driver Referral Bonus Program o Safety bonus  • Please reach out to Gerald at 570-522-1276 with any questions or to apply for the position. Requirements include: • Class A CDL • At least 2 years of recent driving experience • DOT Medical Card
Compensation: Starting Rate up to $20-21/ per hour

Title: Delivery Drivers - Full & Part Time
Description: Panera is seeking Delivery Drivers to be the driving force behind our new delivery program. Delivering for Panera is a great way to earn extra income on a flexible schedule. As a Panera delivery driver, you will join a team that loves to have fun at work and participate in a culture of helping those around you. No previous experience needed, bring your positive attitude and we will provide the rest!Our drivers earn hourly in wages, tips and mileage reimbursement and receive their tips in CASH at the end of their shift.Why deliver for Panera? Company provided on-the-job commercial auto insurance coverage.  No need to purchase additional coverage through your existing insurance provider to cover your car while delivering for Panera.You can take pride in the craveable, clean food you deliver.Little to no cash handling required, as all our orders are paid for online.Join a team that believes in the value of good food that’s also good for you.Tips and mileage are paid out to you daily.While on your shift enjoy 65% off of Panera food.Health benefits available for part-time associates.Enjoy various discount programs for merchandise and services.What will you do as a Panera delivery driver?You will whisk away deliciously correct orders from the cafe to famished customers.Help your team out in the bakery-cafe in between deliveries.Bring the Panera guest experience to homes and offices by providing outstanding customer service.What will you need to get started?You must be at least 18 years old.Have a valid driver’s license.A vehicle with current registration and insurance.Motor vehicle record in good standing.For immediate consideration, please apply today!Panera, LLC is an Equal Opportunity Employer.Apply : http://panera_0gDkQcljobs.joveo.com/job_1427033285

Title: Seasonal and Permanent, Valet Attendant Positions Available
Description: About the Job   Driven To Serve® and Ready to Succeed!   Valet Driver - We offer flexible schedules, the ability to earn cash tips and a fun work environment  The Position:  We’re looking for valet drivers with excellent people and communication skills, proficiency in English -both verbally and written - and the ability to perform physical activities such as running, lifting, and bending. Valid driver’s license required.  As the valet driver, you will establish positive guest relationships through the consistent delivery of excellent customer service. More specifically, you will be responsible for parking and retrieving guest vehicles with high levels of effectiveness and efficiency. Valet drivers must possess the ability to work independently and in a team environment while observing safety precautions at all times. Your responsibilities will also include maintaining and cleaning equipment and the valet area to ensure a presentable and safe work environment. Additional responsibilities may be assigned as needed.  We offer: • Full-time and part-time hourly positions available • Flexible work schedules: days, evenings, overnight and weekend shifts • Cash tips - distributed daily • Growth and career opportunities (we promote from within)  • Our people are our most important asset. we are a diverse and inclusive workplace that promotes advancement and maximizes potential.  Need more reasons to apply? • Fun work environment with like-minded people • Work at premier locations in your city • Meet interesting and well-known people • Potential to drive luxury and exotic vehicles  MAKE SURE YOUR RESUME IS INCLUDED WHEN APPLYING FOR THIS JOB FOR IMMEDIATE CONSIDERATION.

Description: About the position : Up to $1400 weekly & $500 bonus after 90 days of full-time employment 12 months of recent tractor trailer driving experience  Full-time, local & regional available. Various schedules & stops depending on the position. Both no touch & touch accounts  Combination of automatic & manual trucks. Hauling either Dry Van or Flatbed  $500 bonus for completing the first 90 days of full-time employment   The Benefits of working with OLS: Maintain a stable balance of work and home life with Out & Back Runs! Title: PART TIME WAREHOUSE - DAILY PAY
Description: Small  building materials store needs help with managing inventory and arranging product for sale.  Duties would include loading/unloading trucks, breaking down incoming boxed inventory and preparing product for sale.  This position would would be on an as needed basis with approximately 15/20 hours per week to start.  Starting pay is $12 per hour paid daily.  Must be able to lift 50 lbs.  Located on the west side of Indianapolis. This is a growing company with multiple locations so there is opportunity for growth.  Please forward work history/resume.

Title: Snow Removal - Operators, Subs, Labor
Description: Community Green Landscape Group is looking for hard working individuals to join our team in a variety of snow removal roles including general labor clearing and salting walks, equipment operator performing snow removal in skidsteer with hand controls, performing snow removal as plow/salt truck driver, and snow area manager.   All roles start as hourly pay with pay range varying by role. General Labor: $12.00 - $18.00 per hour Plow/Salt Driver (requires valid license): $18.00 - $22.00 per hour Equipment Operator: $20.00 - $30.00 per hour Snow Area Manager: $18.00 - $25.00 per hour  All positions have the potential to transition to year round employment performing landscape work during the season based on performance.   Equipment Operator Position also available as independent contractor.  We're also always looking for experienced snow removal partners in all areas of the city.

Title: CDL-A Company Driver
Description: Regional Company Driver Job  Great pay and great miles!   Benefits:  Consistent Miles & Guaranteed Pay   Pre-Pass   Truck Stop Scanning   Health, Dental, And Vision Insurance (Free Onsite Clinic)   Matching 401K, Life Insurance, And Optional Disability Plan   Holiday And Vacation Pay   Awards Programs: Service, Appreciation, Roadside Inspection, Safe-Driving   Top Achiever Program   Rider Program   Spousal Support Program   Scholarship Fund   Credit Union   Direct Deposit   Requirements:   At least 21 years old   1 year verifiable experience within the last 3 years or 2 within the last 5   Trainees must be recent graduates from a certified truck driving school and/or have a minimum of three months comparable experience   Stable work history   No more than 3 moving violations in the last 3 years   No more than 2 preventable accidents in last 3 years   No DOT preventable accidents in the last 3 years   Able to pass DOT physical, drug test, and other evaluations   Minimum requirements of FMCSR   About Us:   Epes Transport is dedicated to providing quality transportation services. Our mission is to continuously improve our service quality to meet the needs of our employees, customers, and suppliers. Epes Transportation (originally 'The Transport Company') began as a family business in 1931. In 1987, Epes Carriers, Inc. purchased the company and moved its headquarters from Virginia to North Carolina. Today, Epes is the largest private trucking company in North Carolina. Interested in joining our team? Apply now! Are you a Veteran with GI Bill® educational benefits? At EPES Transport, we offer an NC Works Apprenticeship Program that will provide you with additional monthly pay. Call your local recruiter for additional information.Apply Now

Title: DEDICATED US MAIL RUN
Description: Postal Xpress, a US Mail Contractor is currently taking applications for 2 FT Class A- CDL driverS with at least two years of verifiable experience, to transport the US Mail over the road. The driver would meet the relay in Shelbyville, IN at 9:30 pm and depart at 9:45 pm. The driver would then make the three following stops. 1) Chicago NDC arrive 01:20 am and depart @ 01:50 am. 2) Chicago ISC arrive at 02:30 am depart at 03:00 am. 3) Carol Stream P&DC arrive at 03:30 am and depart 03:45 am. Your schedule arrival time back to Shelbyville is 09:45 am. Your days on would be Sunday, Monday (Layover in Chicago $100), Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday and Friday with Saturday off. This run pays 60 hours per week and the total weekly gross is estimated at $1,747.      ***$1000 SIGN ON BONUS FOR THE FIRST DRIVER APPROVED***  . Top Hourly pay at Postal Rates  . Dedicated, scheduled route  . No heavy lifting-if you load or unload, mail carts on wheels  . 24/7 Operations and Safety support  . Experienced Diver Managers  . Excellent equipment and maintenance program  . Weekly pay by direct deposit  . Paid Postal Holidays  .Vacation time (after-1st year)  . Health insurance provided ( Postal Health & Welfare helps cover cost)  . Voluntary benefits available-Dental, Eye and Life & Disability insurance program  Minimum Requirements:  . Must meet all Federal Motor Carrier Regulations . At least 25 years of age . Have at least two years of recent verifiable tractor trailer experience. . Clean MVR No more than (2) moving violations in the past (3) years. . Clean accident safety record . Clean PSP (Roadside Inspection History) . Valid DOT Physical . Pass DOT drug screen . Satisfactory work history . Clean criminal background  For consideration please call (770) 904-1091 or you can apply at www.tlchrconnect.com Company Validation Code T04055. Principals only. Recruiters, please don't contact this job poster.
Compensation: ALL TRIPS PAY $24.05 PER HOUR PLUS AN ADDITIONAL RATE OF $5.11 AN HOUR UP TO 40 HOURS PER WEEK.
