Title: Paratransit Driver
Description: Apply Now!Paratransit Drivers needed in Indianapolis, IN – Hourly Rate $14.00! Transdev is hiring Paratransit Drivers in Indianapolis, IN to provide passengers with disabilities with safe, friendly transportation in vehicles designed for wheelchair lifts, seats and other special access. This position focuses on non-emergency medical transportation, but we welcome candidates with experience in customer service, home health-care, and providing high-quality patient or other care. Transdev proudly serves our communities with ADA (Americans with Disabilities Act) transportation. Come join the largest private-sector operator of public transportation in North America one that cares about its employees, passengers and their communities. Why Drive With Us?  Starting salary $14.00/hour Paid health benefits, along with flexible work schedules Much, much more!  Apply Today for immediate consideration! Responsibilities  Drive a transit bus and transport passengers around Indianapolis, IN in a safe and courteous manner Greet passengers, ensure fare payment and maintain a safe environment Notify dispatch of any incidents, accidents, mechanical concerns Other duties as required  Qualifications  21 years old or older with a high school diploma, GED or equivalent 3 years of experience driving a personal vehicle Flexible schedule to work mornings, afternoons, evenings, overnights, weekends, and holidays A valid driver’s license in good standing Excellent customer and communication skills Physical Requirements Include Ability to: Sit for extended periods of time Lift, push, pull, and carry tools, objects, or equipment above shoulder level without assistance Move up and down stairs easily Reach overhead and below the knees, including bending, twisting, pulling, and stooping  Apply today – Interview times are open now! Title: Warehouse Material Handlers Needed!!!!!
Description: Come and work for a company that values your skills, and rewards you for them!!! We have great benefits, a full compensation package, and stable permanent work!! You would be working with a manager and team that respect and support your success.   Crew2 is a large installation company doing business with the largest home improvement retailer in the world.  We're currently seeking a Warehouse Material Handler in our Indianapolis location performing the responsibilities below;  Responsibilities: • General warehouse duties including receiving and storing materials, in addition to cleaning and sweeping • Receive, load, and unload flooring and other products in the warehouse • Deliver, and pick up material from client or customer locations utilizing company van or cube trucks • Cut and stage flooring material for the day(s) installs • Organize receiving information for inventory control records • Coordinate fleet maintenance  • Perform shoveling and landscape duties for the building  Requirements: • High school diploma or GED  • Ability to lift 50-75 lbs. and pass physical • Effective oral and written communication skills • Strong customer service and organizational skills • Team player/customer focused • Ability to pass a background check • Valid drivers license and clean driving record desired  Please reply to the posting with your resume attached, and Human Resources will contact you once we review your resume.

Title: Pilot Flying J Class A CDL Refined Fuel Driver
Description: We are currently seeking an experienced Fuel Transport Driver with an excellent driving record. The right candidate will have a Class A CDL with Hazmat and Tanker endorsements and 1 year of tractor/trailer driving experience. Our drivers enjoy the generous compensation and the excellent benefits package we offer.  Local / Home Daily Excellent Pay - Paid Weekly! Medical, Dental, Vision, Prescription Company Paid Life Insurance and Long-Term Disability Company Matched 401K with a 60% match of your first 6% contribution Flexible Spending Accounts, Healthcare HRA, Dependent Care FSA Paid Vacations and Holidays  Pilot Flying J is the nation's leader in the Travel Center industry, and is the largest operator of travel centers in North America with more than 750 locations in 43 states and six Canadian provinces.  Pilot Flying J's growth has gone from 1.1 billion fuel gallons sold in 1996, to more than 7 billion sold annually today. Pilot Flying J serves more than 1.3 million guests a day and is committed to connecting people and places with comfort, care and a smile at every stop.  Pilot Flying J is the place for you!!!  (865) 474-4397

Title: FEDEX**Needed Class A CDL drivers REGIONAL runs
Description: Power Vision a contract provider for FEDEX is hiring several drivers that desire to be home daily running all REGIONAL runs. All loads are DROP and HOOK and NO TOUCH FREIGHT.  I have SEVERAL positions that are paying $.58 pm averaging 2300-2500 miles per week Monday through Friday with the possibility of additional hours on weekends if desired.  All are an evening runs, usually with an 8-10 hour turnaround time.  We offer exceptional insurance and retirement benefits!  Please TEXT "461" to Sherry at 865.335.8547 for more details    BENEFITS:  * Excellent Pay ($.58 pm averaging 2300 to 2500 mpw) * Weekly Pay with Direct Deposit * Home Daily * Medical, Dental, Vision * 401K retirement * Paid Vacation * 100% NO TOUCH FREIGHT  * 100% Drop and Hook * Uniforms provided  REQUIREMENTS:  * Clean Background Check * Pass Drug Screen * Clean MVR * MUST HAVE 1 Yr  Verifiable Tractor Trailer Driving Experience in Past 3 Years or 5 Years in the Past 10 Years * Current DOT Medical Card * Class A CDL with Doubles Endorsement is required for this position but if you don't possess at time of hire, you can obtain after the hiring process.

Title: Local Drivers Needed
Description: Apply at: https://workforcenow.adp.com/mascsr/default/mdf/recruitment/recruitment.html?cid=a7b2b76b-bd0a-467e-90bf-23709c09983d&ccId=19000101_000001&jobId=125009&source=CC2&lang=en_US  SUMMARY OF RESPONSIBILITIES: Operates a commercial motor vehicle tractor-trailer and or straight truck vehicle on behalf of the company to complete household goods shipments for local moves. Is the lead person in charge of help/labor connected to a particular move that s/he is assigned. Incumbent provides a quality moving service interacting with all levels of Crown Moving and Storage customers, vendors and other staff in a professional manner.   ESSENTIAL FUNCTIONS: Assumes lead role/responsibility for helper/laborers assigned to move in the loading and unloading of household goods shipments for local moves. Responsible for completion of all paperwork on assigned each job including but not limited to Bills of Lading, Daily records of duty status (logbooks) and military and government paperwork. Prepares an inventory of items to be prepared for shipping and inspects each item closely identifying any existing damages and listing these on the inventory.  Properly stack, pad, and secure household goods in company vehicles Remove debris from customer’s premises after loading, unloading or unpacking Load the necessary materials and equipment on the vehicle for each job Deliver and unpack household goods at the customer’s residence Follow preventive maintenance schedules on equipment Load and deliver storage pickups and deliveries Perform O&I moves (office moves) when needed Perform packing jobs as necessary Check oil and fuel levels on all equipment before driving Palletize storage shipments in the warehouse Assist with cleaning the warehouse, dock, and local equipment Maintain up-to-date logs for intrastate and interstate moves  EDUCATIONAL REQUIREMENTS: High school diploma or equivalent  EXPERIENCE REQUIREMENTS: Must have 1-year experience driving tractor-trailer plus one year of household goods experience for class A and 6 months experience driving a straight truck and 6 months of household goods experience for Class B. Must have an excellent safety record. No more than 3 moving violations in the past 12 months. No more than 5 moving violations in the past 24 months. Requires professionalism and confidentiality and the ability to read and interpret operating and procedure manuals.  PHYSICAL REQUIREMENTS: The employee must meet the following physical requirements of this position: Lift and lower boxes weighing up to 125 lbs.  Repetitively lift and lower boxes weighing an average of 45 lbs.  Lift and carry boxes weighing up to 70 lbs.  Push and pull 300 lbs. loaded onto a 2-wheel dolly for a distance of up to 100 ft. Push and pull 135 lbs. loaded onto a 2-wheel dolly up and down ramps and steps  Step into and out of trailers  Climb ladders
Compensation: Starting pay (with no experience) $15.75/hr for Class B & $18.00 for Class A. Pay determined by experience.

Title: On-Call Roadside Assistance Drivers Needed
Description: Local Roadside Assistance company looking for seasonal help (maybe longer). Service calls consist of the following services:  Jump Starts Vehicle Unlocks Tire Changes Fuel Delivery  MILITARY VETERANS WELCOME  Experience is preferred, but NOT required.  To make the job easiest & efficient, you'll need the following tools:  20+ Ft Jumper Cables Lockout Kit Provided (with no up front cost) 3 Ton Low Profile Jack 18” Breaker Bar (½ Drive) w/ Sockets (impact, a plus) 3+ Gallon Gas Can / 5 Gallon Diesel Can A Professionally Presentable & Reliable Vehicle (fuel efficient, a plus)   Must have valid drivers license, good driving record, current insurance, be able to pass a background check and be willing to work on call. You must be reliable, trustworthy and willing to work.  SERIOUS INQUIRIES ONLY, PLEASE  For consideration, please go to:  http://www.joinbtl.com

Title: Maintenance Tech - Homes/Apartments
Description: BARRON PROPERTY SERVICES: Barron Property Services is currently seeking a highly skilled Property Maintenance Technician for a full time position!  Barron Property Services is a locally owned and operated company that has been in business for over 15 years. BPS excels in property management while offering professional maintenance and renovation services. This is a full time position with consistent and guaranteed work.  Job Description  - Diagnose service ticket issues and take appropriate action - Residential repairs including hvac, plumbing, painting, electrical, carpentry, etc. - Rent ready cleaning: mopping, vacuuming, bathroom cleaning, trash removal, etc. - Roof repairs, gutter cleaning, exterior painting, etc. - Replace furnace filters, water heaters/softeners, plunging/snaking toilets, - Admin task: completing service tickets, completing notes, tracking mileage, etc.  Attributes  -Strong communication skills  - Customer service skills with residents -Must always be reliable and on time - Sees work through to completion - Detail oriented  Bonus Attributes/Skills  - Light to extensive experience in roofing (patch & repair experience ideal) - Knowledge of how to repair appliances (stoves and fridges) - Capability to pull a 12 ft. aluminum trailer (trailer mileage is reimbursed) - Great problem solving skills in solving complex issues  Qualifications  - 3-5 years of experience in residential/apartment maintenance preferred - Reliable transportation - truck with capacity to haul a trailer is strongly preferred - Own basic/necessary tools to complete the required work - Cell phone - Valid Driver’s License - High School Diploma/GED  Barron Property Services is an Equal Opportunity Employer.  Job Type: Full-time  Hourly Rate: $17-$25/hr.

If you have less then 6 months we can train you  LEASE OPERATOR PAY   ♦ Up to 77% of the gross (depends on experience)  ♦ Fuel card with huge discounts  ♦ Free cargo, bobtail and liability insurance  ♦ Free base plate, ELD, EZpass/PrePass  ♦ Full maintenance and maintenance related repairs covered  ♦ No forced dispatch  LEASE OPERATOR IS RESPONSIBLE FOR:   ► Truck $700 per week  ► Trailer $150 per week  ► Occupational accident insurance $40 per week  ► Escrow $60 per week / for 50 weeks, with total amount $3000  ► Fuel and tolls, will be deducted from settlement  ► IFTA (quarterly, we are going to prepare it)  ► Lease operator agreement can be canceled any time with 2 weeks notice  REQUIREMENTS   ● Valid CDL Class A  ● If no experience must have CDL school diploma with 160 hr  ● Minimum of 24 years old  ● No more than 3 moving violations in the last 3 years  ● No criminal record  ● Must read and speak English  ● Must have own smartphone  FOR MORE INFO CALL 630-506-4259 Dimitri Or click here to APPLY ONLINE

Title: Does Lack of Miles have you Scared on Payday?
Description: Still Screaming About Not Getting Enough Miles? Feel Like Your Dispatcher is Ghosting You?     Stop falling for tricks, Continental Express is all about the treats. Our Regional Drivers average 2,500 miles a week, and YES, you can earn more if you do more than hold a steering wheel. Don't be frightened by our dispatchers, they are real people who won't ghost you. We have dedicated customer accounts to keep you moving, it's spooky how quickly you get your next load assignment. Are you haunted by the fact that you may never make it home? Surprise, four weeks paid vacation is knocking on your door! To learn more about our company, you don't need to go to a psychic. Give us a call, 1-317-250-0420.     ☞ Click Here To Apply! ☜    Driver Benefits:   ☑   FREE Medical Insurance. ☑  Top Industry Pay ☑   4 Weeks of Paid Vacation. ☑  $2,000 Sign On Bonus. ☑        Weekend Delivery Bonus.* ☑        Weekly Fuel Bonus. ☑        Quarterly Safety Bonus. ☑        Annual Mileage Bonus. ☑        Detention pay, Starting after 2 hours! ☑         $1,000 Referral Bonus. ☑        401k with company match. ☑        AND MORE!    Additional Driver Perks:   ✓  Pet Policy. Bring Your Furry Friend! ✓  Rider Policy. ✓  Paid Orientation. ✓  NO Touch Freight. ✓  NO New York. ✓  Strong emphasis on your personal safety. ✓  A Dispatcher that Actually Listens.    Driver Requirements:   Must be at least 25 years of age    Stop By One of Our Terminals:   Sidney, OH. Indianapolis, IN. Louisville, KY. Danville, VA. Gaffney, SC. Fort Worth, TX.     Don't let this opportunity pass you by, email or call us today! 1-800-497-2100.  Details are subject to change at any time. Please call for current offers and information. *not all details above apply to all positions listed above.    Start Your Application Online at CEJOBS.COM
Compensation: Sign On Bonus, Guaranteed Pay, FREE Health Insurance, and MORE!!!

Title: CDL-A DRIVERS' “DREAM”RUN !
Description: This run GETS YOU HOME, TO YOUR HOUSE, EVERY DAY!! But there’s MORE!  Yes… not just “back to the terminal”… TO YOUR HOUSE!!  …just after the supper hour!  It’s for long enough to eat, see the family, get a shower, change clothes, etc!  This is a DEDICATED FedEx Ground “Contractor’s Bid Run” exclusively for TWO CO-DRIVERS…  Some use the word “TEAM”… but this is soooo far from the ‘normal’ team-type run….  THIS run features ALL THE GOODIES a set of Co-Drivers have always wanted, and MORE…  * 5500 PLUS miles per 5-day work week… * $.60 Cents Per Mile TEAM PAY, with RAISES! * Home every night for 3-5 hours  * New Volvo 860 Custom, Deluxe “Best-Ride-in-the-Business” Sleeper Tractor * NO bumping docks * NO loading freight * NO counting pallets * NO Hassles * ALL DROP AND HOOK; A trailer exchange “bump meet”…literally a 2-minute trailer switch!   * Company paid insurance * Company percentage matching 401K * Paid Vacations * Safety/Incentive Bonuses * Safety Shoes Furnished * Uniforms Furnished  Here the requirements to apply:  * Current, valid CDL-A license with DOUBLES ENDORSEMENT. * At least 1 Year of Verifiable “tractor-trailer” experience within the last 3 years. * No License restrictions for driving only an automatic transmission. * No Felony Convictions in your background. * CLEAN MVR/CSP driving record(s).  Rare, unusual opportunity for safe CDL-A drivers.  Most of our teams have been with our very reputable company for many years.  Come join our “family” of safety-conscious, reliable, dependable professional men and women and find out what it REALLY feels like to LOVE YOUR EASY, HASSLE-FREE JOB!!  Call Jim in Indpls at 317-600-7115 right away!!  Jim has CLOSE TO 4.5 MILLION SAFE miles over his 20-plus year transportation career! As you talk with him, you’ll understand that “he understands”. He’s “DONE THIS RUN” and can answer any of your questions about it!  Don’t miss-out on a genuine opportunity to finally be HAPPY, and actually LIKE YOUR JOB! Call Jim right NOW!!

Title: Casey's Fuel CDL Driver - Home Daily! $5000 Sign-On Bonus!
Description: Join the Casey's General Stores team as a Fuel Transport Driver hauling HAZMAT fuel loads to local Casey's stores! You'll have a set schedule, territory and are home daily. In addition, you'll receive a $5,000 sign-on bonus, two weeks of vacation and five days of sick upon hire. Casey's has industry leading pay and benefits too.   Driver Requirements: CLASS A CDL with HAZMAT endorsement 3 years of Class A Experience, ideally with one year hauling HAZMAT products Acceptable safety record and stable work history  Apply online at https://www.caseys.com/careers/transportation-positions. Click 'Click Here to Apply Now' and find 'Gas Transport Driver - All States Except MN and IL'. Call 1-800-MyCaseys (1-800-692-2739) with questions.

Title: Rental Car Drivers
Description: Managed Labor Solutions (MLS) is a unique provider of outsourced labor to companies large and small. We focus on non-core but critical activities in an effort to enhance our client’s profitability and improve productivity. MLS is a part of the Horizon Facility Services (HFS) family of companies an organization with roots dating back to 1971. Enjoy providing great customer service? Have a clean driving record? Have a passion for driving cars?  If this is you, then why not get paid for doing it and come join us! MLS is seeking quality, high energy and team driven people to work at our Indianapolis International Airport location as a Rental Car DriverPay Rate: $10 per hour Job Duties/Responsibilities Provide amazing service and professionalism to our customers  Follow all company safety policies and procedures   Perform safe driving practices and able to follow verbal directions  Able to adapt to changing schedules and/or tasks as required  Transport vehicles safely within the site from one location to another safely and quickly  Ability to work under minimal supervision and have excellent time management skills  Follow direction of Management and able to reach, stretch, bend and sit for long periods at a time  Requirements Valid driver’s license with clean driving record  Must be 18 years or older  Must be flexible with schedule to work night, weekends and holidays as needed#INDLPPlease apply online with Managed Labor Solutions at: https://managedlaborsolutions.prismhr-hire.com/job/158897/rental-car-drivers?s=cl

Title: Immediate position for construction crew leader

Jobs will include small service repairs, remodels and punch work. Applicant will deal directly with clients. Applicant will be w-2 and have company vehicle. Must have valid Indiana drivers license, also have all tools required to complete work. MUST be able to pass drug screen. Excellent advancement opportunity, aggressive pay increase and simple IRA included.  Call for interview-Ashley Smith-317-523-8886

Title: Warehouse Worker
Description: UPS is hiring Part-Time, Seasonal, Warehouse Workers for our warehouse in Plainfield, IN.  As a Package Handler (warehouse worker), you would work with a team sorting packages and loading or unloading trucks. If you are looking for a part-time job working between 17.5 to 40 hours per week over at least 5 days, are at least 18 years old, and can move packages averaging 25-35 lbs (and up to 70 lbs), then we want you to apply today! APPLY NOW UPS offers: · Hourly pay of $14/hour  · Weekly bonus from $100-$125 (depending on shift) for perfect attendance each week · Part-Time schedule available · Skip the gym! You’ll get a workout working with us! · Growth opportunities and year round opportunities available Apply today to schedule your interview! APPLY NOW  Requirements: · At least 18 years of age · Available to work a seasonal, part-time schedule over five days per week · Able to lift packages weighing 25-35 lbs on average, and up to 70 lbs without assistance · Willing to submit to background and drug screening · Legally able to work for any U.S. employer without sponsorship About UPS: Founded in 1907, UPS is the world's largest package delivery company and a leading global provider of specialized transportation and logistics services. UPS is an equal opportunity employer – race/color/religion/sex/national origin/veteran/disability/sexual orientation/gender identity

Title: Local Dry Van, Flatbed, Tanker Driver: Home Daily & No Weekends!
Description: DuBois Chemicals develops, manufactures, distributes and supports proprietary chemical and equipment products for a broad range of industrial and commercial applications, fulfilling mission-critical customer needs. Learn More and Apply  Responsibility Level:          Drivers are responsible for transporting different types of goods from warehouse to customer’s locations using various sized power units ranging from class A to one ton flat bed and goose neck trailers. This transporting is to be done in accordance with DuBois policies as well as following DOT guidelines for the safe operation of a motored unit. Following appropriate safety procedures to transport hazardous materials is a must for DuBois Target Zero safety initiative, for driver and for public safety. You would be required to perform inspection before and after a trip.  Warehouse responsibilities will also be required specifically loading or unloading your trailer or a customer’s trailer at the warehouse. You will be required to pass and perform fork lift duties as required by DOT. Your daily assigned tasks will be given to you by the warehouse manager who will have various needs according to customer needs. You will be asked to fulfill duties in a safe and timely manner and to be an effective operational employee.  Job Highlights: -Avg $25/hour -Monday through Friday with rare weekend -Tanker, Dry Van, Flatbed runs  -75% Local runs with some overnights  -Touch freight - load and unload  -Uses pallet jack and fork lift -Medical, Dental, Vision, Life, Disability  -Paid time off  -401K effective after 90 days (company match 4%)  -Safety bonus  -Manual transmission  Requirements:  -Hazmat, Tanker, Doubles endorsements  -Minimum age: 21 -Minimum experience: 1 year  -No more than 2 moving violations in the last 12 months  Learn More and Apply

Title: Whitlock's Pressure Wash
Description: $30,000 - $50,000+/year.  Immediate Openings and career advancement opportunities!  No experience necessary.  Whitlock's has immediate service tech openings through our Lebanon, IN branch.  Pay is weekly and there are no checks held back.  Start today and have a paycheck by Friday.  Must have a current/valid driver's license.

Title: Hiring OWNER OPERATOR - Guaranteed $2.05 Per Mile Year Round
Description: OWNER OPERATOR COMPANY HIRING OWNERS OPERATORS $2.05 MILE GUARANTEED  We are 100% owner operator company, no company drivers at all. All owners are treated equally. Also, we are family owned, so our priority is to be your right-hand people for whatever you need out on the road 24-7.  - Owner Operators Needed ($2.05 Per Mile Guaranteed Daily/ 5 days a week / all year round ) - Freight Runs in Illinois, Indiana, Wisconsin, Ohio, Iowa, Nebraska (Omaha Area), Missouri, and Michigan. - Daily miles 150 -450 - Loads are all lined up day in advance, which means no waiting for a load. - Fuel Cards available with discounts - Weekly Settlements with direct deposit each Friday - Trailers for rent available - Plate Programs/ Registration Available - Home daily available as well if you live in the area in states mentioned above. - All loads weight no more than 38,000lbs. - We haul dry vans only.   Our Charges: - 10% from your weekly gross income, you take 90%. - $200.00 weekly for cargo & auto liability - $10.00 Eld Tablet Rental ( 3MD System)  Requirements: - 3 Years’ experience - Clean MVR Record for last 3 years - No accidents within last 3 years - No DUI/Criminal Charges at all - Must have a valid Annual Inspection (Certified) of a truck 1 week old before the start of the job.    FOR MORE INFORMATION AND TO APPLY CALL 847-466-5891
Compensation: Hiring OWNER OPERATORS - Guaranteed $2.05 Per Mile Year Round

Title: Looking for Door & Window Installers!!!! Indianapolis  Area!
Description: Install Partners LLC is looking for Door & Window Installers for the Indianapolis  area!!!!   The work will consist of installing Exterior / Patio / Interior / Security Doors / Windows in residential homes.  Must have tools and a reliable vehicle (small truck at least).  Criminal Background check will be required. NO FELONIES WILL BE ACCEPTED. Clean backgrounds get approved almost immediately!   Speak English, Neat/Professional in Appearance, Customer Service Skills. DEPENDABILITY IS A MUST!  No need to look for work!!! We will handle customer scheduling and you will not be collecting money from the customers. Installers are paid bi weekly and paid by the job at a percentage of the purchase order. We do not pay hourly.  MUST have Smart Phone and email/Computer to receive daily work schedule and send in completed work. All scheduling and payout amounts are visible at all times through our online scheduling platform that can be viewed on your phone or computer.   Email basic information through this ad. Does not have to be formal resume'. List name, area of town you live in, type of vehicle, basic experience and how we can contact you. We are looking for experienced installers ready to work. Would also consider individual with limited experience but a desire to learn the trade to work with experienced installers as helper.  Company has been providing Installers with work for 25 Plus years. We find the work, schedule with customer, and pay consistently via Direct Deposit. No collecting of money required of installer.  https://www.installpartners.net https://www.instagram.com/installpartners/
Compensation: Installers are paid every two weeks on a percentage basis. Direct Deposit.

Title: Owner Operator Needed
Description: Gold Star Trucking LLC is seeking reefer owner operators based out of Indiana.   Drivers must have at least two years experience and a clean record.  2500 to 3500 miles a week   YTD all mile average $2.35 per mile  Routing for weekly home time  Competitive compensation:  88% to owner-operators  All rate confirmations are forwarded to owner-operator Weekly direct deposit settlements KeepTruckin ELD provided for free NASTC fuel discount averaging $.20 off cash price Reefer trailer rental available    If you would like to join the family please call Daniel at 317-895-9142.

Title: Seasonal Cleaning Technician
Description: Local cleaning company now hiring part time seasonal help with the strong possibility of becoming a permanent position after the holidays. We do residential cleaning and are looking for someone with high energy, who loves hard work, is dependable, punctual, reliable, trustworthy, friendly, detail-oriented and has a servant's heart to clean homes for top pay, including tips. Work Monday-Friday, up to 20 hours per week`, no weekends or nights. MUST be a team player who can follow directions. MUST have a SPOTLESS criminal record--absolutely no exceptions. Background checks WILL be done and must be passed. MUST be able to pass a drug test. MUST have a valid driver’s license, auto insurance, a squeaky-clean driving record, and RELIABLE transportation. Most of the work will be done in Zionsville and Carmel. If this is too far for you, please don't apply. MUST be able to read and speak English and be at least 21 yrs of age. If this interests you and you meet all of the MUST requirements listed above, we'd love to chat with you! If you are interested, please call us at: 317-430-7684. Serious candidates need only apply please.

Title: Lead Tractor Technician - $2,500 Sign-On Bonus!
Description: Central Transport is an industry leading Less-Than-Truckload (LTL) transportation carrier. We are one of the nation’s largest LTL carriers and have experienced significant growth over the last several years. As we continue to expand our network, we are seeking quality mechanics to help maintain our fleet of over 1,600 tractors, 6,000 trailers, and 1,100 forklifts across the United States and Canada.  Position Available: Diesel Mechanic (1st shift) – Performing preventative maintenance as well as troubleshooting and repairing electrical and after-treatment systems on our Class 8 tractors. Diesel Mechanics start at $24/HR - $28/HR  What Central Offers: $2,500 Sign-On Bonus Industry Leading Pay Medical, Dental, PTO, Paid Holidays Off, Paid Bereavement Leave, Paid Jury Duty Leave Now Offering Blue Cross Blue Shield Blue Care Network! Free Uniforms Provided  Responsibilities Include: Perform all levels of preventive maintenance services Repair trucks, and trailers and related equipment in a timely and efficient manner Inspect brake systems, steering mechanisms, wheel bearings and other important parts to ensure that they are in proper working condition Perform routine maintenance such as changing oil, checking batteries and lubricating equipment and machinery Repairing and troubleshooting of major components such as engine, transmission, and differentials Responsible for repairing damage to containers, trailers, and chassis. Repairing tears on the sides of containers Replacing lights Tire repair Landing gear repair Frame repair Preventative maintenance / running repair / brakes / suspension  Job Requirements: 3 years of experience Basic set of tools ASE certification preferred but not required  If you’re interested and would like to learn more, please call 586-467-0140 ext. 2671 or submit your resume!

Title: No Tools Required
Description: Looking for a better opportunity ? This is it ! ...We are a Full Service Repair Facility looking for a few "Team Members" to participate in our apprenticeship program. We know that it can be tough transitioning from a "Lube Tech to a "Certified Auto Tech" and we want to help.  "NO TOOLS REQUIRED" we will supply the tools to get you started on your road to becoming a certified Auto Technician. You will be partnered with one of our Certified Technicians, where you will work on bettering your skills.  All that is required is a Valid Drivers License, Good Attitude, Good Work Ethic, and 6 Months or more experience in either an Auto Shop or Auto Mechanics Tech School, Auto Vocational School or equivalent.

Title: DirecTV Installation Technician / Lead Technician
Description: Installation Technician - DirecTV  DIRECTV TECHNICIAN NEEDED – NEW INSTALLS ONLY!!  Responsibilities: • Installation of satellite television in residential homes and commercial businesses • Ensuring all installations are completed per DirecTV standards • Customer service • Adhering to set time frames • Count / reconcile/ and maintain inventory stock supplies on a weekly and monthly basis  Qualifications: • Previous experience in telecommunications, preferably DirecTV • Familiarity with DirecTV equipment • Excellent written and verbal communication skills • Ability to pass a drug screen and background screening  We are currently seeking a DirecTV Technician with experience to join our team. If you want to join our team, we are offering a sign-on bonus for experienced technicians on a case by case basis, with the amount varying and to be determined based on need in market and location.  WE OFFER: Competitive rates – piece rate Weekly pay via direct deposit Support staff Dispatch available to support you in the field Contract - 1099  YOU NEED: A truck, van, or SUV that is licensed and insured A clean background Basic hand tools and the knowledge of how to use them Inventory knowledge of the equipment used for DirecTV installations  We are a tech focused service company with several sites throughout the United States. We would love to talk to you about joining our team. Please respond to this ad with an email that includes your phone number and an attached resume and someone from our office will call you back within 24 hours.

Title: Apartment Maintenance Tech
Description: Family owned and operated apartment complex on Indy's east side looking for an Apartment Maintenance Technician.    We own and operate a couple of apartment complexes on the eastside (as well as several houses on the east and northeast sides) of Indianapolis and are looking for a full-time experienced maintenance tech who is a self-starter, is knowledgeable in all forms of maintenance, and is a team player.  We have a simple hiring philosophy:  Hire people who work hard, are intelligent, interested in fixing stuff, and who we enjoy working with.  Who do we like to work with?  Someone that’s a good conversationalist with a pleasant disposition, friendly, outgoing, and most likely a bit nerdy.  Not too nerdy, mind you, but a little bit.  We are looking for someone with knowledge in painting, carpentry, plumbing, HVAC repair, electrical, and general apartment maintenance.  Day-to-day maintenance operations would include (but not limited to):  • Repairing and treating structures such as showers, sinks, appliances, doors/cabinets, walls and building exteriors • Make ready units for new move-ins • Completing work orders for residents or property • Have a working knowledge of HVAC systems for repairs and replacement • General building maintenance • Great customer relations: must have strong communication and people management skills to deal effectively with a wide variety of people and personalities (team members, residents, vendors, etc.). Must maintain professionalism and respect while dealing with upset or angry residents. • Must be flexible and able to help at other properties if needed • Ability to work some weekends on a rotating schedule for on-call/24hr maintenance • Complete grounds work such as: grounds pick up, sweeping, and light landscaping • Must be willing to perform any task that is required • Must possess a valid driver’s license, reliable transportation, and tools  Employees are required to be honest and trustworthy with a satisfactory background. A valid driver's license and reliable transportation will be required as this position will entail the operation of a personal and potentially a company vehicle.  If interested in discussing this job:  1. Respond with the subject line: “I want to work for you.” 2. Include a resume with contact information. 3. Write a simple paragraph about why you want to work for us and why you think you’d be good at it.   4. Write another paragraph telling us something interesting about yourself. *Paragraphs can be brief and simple, we’re not grading you on your literary talents :-)

Title: Insulation Installer

Our company installs insulation into pre-existing homes in the central Indiana area. No layoffs with starting pay ranging from 50k-65k a year with $1000 sign on bonus. Requirements are: must have a valid driver's license.

Title: Amazon Warehouse Team Members in Whitestown – Earn up to $20/hr!
Description: Amazon is now hiring holiday warehouse team members in Whitestown!       Hourly Pay Rate: Earn Up $20/hr; $500 sign-on bonus  Shifts we are hiring for: Full-Time Seasonal  On-the-Spot Job Offers! Hampton Inn | 6005 S Main St. Whitestown, IN 46075  Tuesday and 11/26 | 8:30 am - 7 pm  IDENTIFICATION AND WORK AUTHORIZATION DOCUMENTS: Bring ORIGINAL and UNEXPIRED documents to complete the federally-mandated employment verification process. Proper documentation is REQUIRED to work at Amazon. You may need to bring more than one form of identification based on the type. Some examples of acceptable documentation are:  U.S. Passport Photo ID AND Social Security Card Driver's License AND U.S. Birth Certificate          Amazon warehouse jobs are a great way to start earning money with or without experience in a distribution center, factory, or warehouse. Many people who become local warehouse associates have already worked in fulfillment and distribution, (such as a forklift drivers, warehouse picker, shipping and receiving, warehouse packing, warehouse stocking, distribution center jobs, food warehouse jobs, and overnight or night shift warehouse jobs). Join the Amazon team and work at a local warehouse job. People who work at Amazon warehouse jobs also come from many backgrounds and industries, jobs, gigs, and student internship types ranging from driving to retail, Walmart warehouse jobs, Target distribution centers, FedEx warehouse package handler, UPS warehouses, packing jobs, shipping and receiving, customer service, creative industries, and general labor. Amazon warehouse jobs are perfect for a full-time, part-time, or seasonal job. No experience necessary. Apply now to a warehouse job at Amazon!         Amazon is an Equal Opportunity Employer - Minority / Women / Disability / Veteran / Gender Identity / Sexual Orientation / Age

Title: Electricians Needed
Description: DEI INC is seeking electricians for traveling positions across the United States.   Beginning in December we will have work involving conveyor systems in several states.   Earn mileage and travel pay, as well as per diem for living and food expenses while on the road. Earn overtime hours and receive valuable training! Perks include vacation time and health insurance plans.   We have several positions open for anyone with electrical skills. Positions availible for those just out of trade or vocational school, Apprentices, Journeymen, and Foremen.   During the interview process you will be asked to meet a hiring manager via FaceTime or Skype. You also may be asked to provide a Drivers License number or submit to a background check.   We look forward to working with you! Please fill out our application form at https://www.deintegrators.com/work-for-dei to get started!
Compensation: DEI pays competitive rates based on skill level, as well as per diem and travel pay

Title: CDL-A Full Time Lease Operator Drivers for immediate hire!
Description: LEASE PROGRAM  FULL-MAINTENANCE LEASE PROGRAM WITH 0 MONEY DOWN • No hassle, full-service maintenance program • Walkaway lease  2016, 2017 FREIGHTLINERS • Freightliner Cascadia: $700 per week*  • Flatbed and Dry Van trailers   NEW 2019 OWNER OPERATOR PAY PACKAGE! • 88% to start • 90% top pay (after 6 months only)  Our contractors are currently averaging approximately $6,000 - $8,000 a week in gross revenue.  We are offering the following services: • Year-round freight • Our drivers average 2500+ miles per week • Friendly, experienced No Force Dispatch! • Technical support • On the road support • Clean inspection bonus • Fuel Cards, EFS Checks • Pay every Friday (Direct deposit) • Occupational Accident insurance • Driver Referral Bonus! $500  How to qualify: • Be 21 years of age or older • Possess current Class A CDL • Minimum 2 years of experience • Have a current medical card • Pass pre-employment drug screen • Clean driving record  For inquiries, call or text our recruiter 708-475-0055 EXT. 111 or After Hours 708-882-0613

Title: ***Cable Bury Technicians Needed***
Description: We are currently looking for hard working, self-motivated people to bury cable and fiber in the Indianapolis, Bloomington, Avon, Plainfield, and Brownsburg areas.  We bury cable in the ground using Ditch Witch 100-Sx machines. This is outside work. We work in the heat, and rain or shine. There is no shortage of work . This is year around. We do not require any experience. You should expect to make between $700 and $1400 a week. (you are paid by the job, Contract piece work We pay bi-weekly Must have a valid driver's license.  Must have a Truck, Van, or SUV that can tow a small trailer. Must be able to pass a background check and urine screening.  Must be over 18.  Must be able to lift heavy material.    Técnico de sistema de Cable y Gota entierrada ganando hasta $1500 sema (indianapolis area)  compensation: contract  employment type: contract   (Indianápolis and Bloomington) Buscando técnicos de sistema de Cable y Gota entierrada ¿No tiene experiencia? No hay problema. . .Nosotros lo entrenaremos!   Debe tener una camioneta, van o SUV (todo terreno), debe tener herramientas estándar.  (Taladro con cable e inalámbrico, pala, herramienta de preparación de Cable, pala de punto, llave inglesa de 7/16, cable de extensión, varios alicates y pequeñas herramientas.)  Deben hablar y entender inglés.  Este es un trabajo afuera durante todo el ano y es fìsicamente exigente. Si usted no está acostumbrado a trabajar en el calor, la lluvia o el tiempo frìo este trabajo no es para usted.   Por favor comunicase conmigo al numero tres uno siete cinco cinco siete tres siete nueve dos   Si tienes un máquina de perforación o experiencia con perforación puede ver un bono para usted!   Bajare este anuncio tan pronto se llenan los puestos.

Title: Automotive Technician
Description: Meineke Plainfield Is Family Owned and Operated Full Service Repair Shop.  We are looking for an experienced Automotive Technician / Auto Mechanic / Automotive Service Technicians to join our team.  We have plenty of work here every day. Title: AFS is hiring forklift operators / laborers in Franklin
Description: American Freight Service is looking for full-time stand-up forklift operators / laborers to meet customer needs at our Franklin warehouse location.     Compensation:   We start at $14 dollars an hour for a 90 day training period. After 90 days commission positions available, employees receive medical, 401k, and boot reimbursement among other great perks.         Potential hires must:    Have a valid drivers license  Have two forms of identification  Be drug free  Undergo a background evaluation  Be able to lift at least 75 pounds  Follow and work safely within protocols  Have basic math skills  Have basic computer knowledge  Have the ability to multi-task   These are some of the requirements to be considered and succeed with our company. A full job description detailing everything is included upon an interview and once hired. AFS is a great company to work for that takes care of its employees.     If you are interested in joining our team submit your application on our website at,   americanfreightservice.com    "Click on Employment, then pre-application form.      Dave Norris  American Freight Service
Compensation: $14 hr 90 day training / Commission after trained and certified

Title: Several outside sales reps
Description: Seeking part time and full time independent sales managers needed to cover a 50 miles radiusfrom your home AND18 Telemarketing Specialists to prequalify national and regional Chain Accounts. Both positions can be filled from your home!  What We Do  We provide free Vending Massage Chairs ( retail worth from $3,500.00 to $10,000.00 each!!) to high traffic waiting area of any businesses and secured inside business on Consignment(the Business must have minimum average traffic of 50 people/ and up daily in order to be qualified. WE SHALL PAY FOR THE COST OF THE VENDING MASSAGE CHAIRS, PLUS FREIGHT OF DELIVERY AND REMOVAL, INSTALLATION PLUS TECHNICAL SUPPORTS ETC. EACH STORE OWNER ONLY HAS TO PROVIDE THE SPACE (INSIDE STORE ONLY!)/ POWER OUTLET PLUS BASIC WEEKLY CLEANING OF OUR DAILY INCOME PRODUCING VENDING MASSAGE CHAIRS and then we split the monthly revenue with the store owners and our Sales Rep (and District manager) and our Company. Purely consignment arrangement with each vendor. Not sales necessary involved.  We are looking for 95 part time or full time independent regional sales managers to cover each of the major US cities and eventually grow to be 10 distract managers  A: 95 Part time or full time Independent Sales Managers: We are in need of 95 outside sales reps and telemarketing specialists to set up and consign our newly developed Patented vending massage chairs to businesses such as Casinos, shopping malls, car wash places, Doctor’s offices, retirement centers; five star Hotel Lobby and Fitness centers and VIP lounge area, national and regional fitness centers, national and regional high-end restaurant chain’s waiting area, national and regional beauty salon and skin care shops, rehab centers, Hair Salons, train station waiting areas, ground bus station waiting area, family fun centers; truck stops and rest areas for truck drivers, Airport waiting areas, hospital waiting areas; waiting areas of oil change and mechanic shops, Dental offices, Lawyer’s offices, Cigar Bars, Tanning Shops; Nursing homes, kitchen and reception areas of Office building or industrial parks, Movie theater waiting areas, Bowling Alley waiting and rest area; etc. etc.  Now we are expanding our unique Vending massage Chair program nationwide after several years of test marketing and software development. Currently we are hiring one experienced regional sales manager to cover every 50 miles radius in the following cities and its surrounding satellite cities : ( total 95 Independent Regional sales managers at part time or full time( 1099): New York NY; Chicago, IL; Houston, TX; Philadelphia, PA; Phoenix, AZ; San Antonio; TX; Dallas, TX; San Jose, CA; Austin, TX; Jacksonville, FL; San Francisco CA; Indianapolis, IN; Columbus, OH; Fort Worth, TX; Charlotte, NC; Detroit, MI; El Paso; TX; Seattle, WA; Denver, CO; Washington DC; Memphis, TN; Bonston, MA; Nashville-Davidson, TN; Baltimore, MD; Okllahoma City, OK; Portland, OR; Louisville-Jefferson County, KY; Miwaukee, WI; Albuquerque, NM; Tuscon, AZ; Frescno, CA; Sacramento, CA; Kansas City, MO; Mesa, AZ; Atlanta, GA; Virginia Beach, VA; Omaha, NE; Colorado Springs, CO; Raleigh, NC, Miami, FL; Oakland, CA; Minneapolis, MN; Tulsa, OK; Cleveland; OH; Wichita , KS; New Orleans, LA, Artington, TX; Tampa, FL; Bakersfield, CA; Aurora, CO; Urban Honoluu, HI; Corpus; TX; ST Louis, MN; Cincinnati, OH; Anchorage, AK; Henderson, NV; Greensboro, NC; Newark, NJ; Plano, TX; Teledo, OH; Lincoln, NE; Orlando, FL; Jersey City, NJ; Chula Vista, CA; Fort Wayne, IN; Buffalo, NY; Durham, NC; St. Petersburg, FL; Laredo, TX; Madison, WI; Lubbock, TX; Norfolk, VA; Chandier, AZ; Glendale, AZ; Reno, NV; Scottsdale, AZ; Hialeab, FL; Garland, TX; Irvine, TX; Chesapeake, VA; Gilbert, AZ; Paradise, NV; Fremont, CA; Arlington, VA; Baton Rouge, LA; Richmond, VA; Boise City, ID; Des Moines, IA etc. You will have up 90 days to learn and train through an online training program to compete to be the top producer and deal closer in each city.  **But only one top producer and deal closer in each city shall earn the exclusive & protective sales territory for that city after Training Period.** Compensation for being the top producer in each city: • Higher finder’s fee ( $45 to $125 per chair) • Higher residual profit sharing plan; 10% of the monthly gross of MPVF’s share per chair • Medical benefits • A Bonus shall be awarded to the sales rep with 150 chairs shall be consigned by the sales manager himself/herself The sky is the limit for your income if you will choose this life time unique Career!! If you want to make unlimited income in this opportunity and build a residual income you can retire on, this is the position for you! The Qualifications of Independent Sales Rep (part time or full time) and supports from MPVF: 1. Must have at least 10 years previous independent sales experience or telemarketing experience, preferably in the B-B businesses sales; with good deal closing skills 2. Previous experience in selling products or services to the industries of Casinos/ Hotel chains/ High End Restaurant Chains/ Chains of Fitness Centers/ Movie Theater Chains; shall be a plus 3. Previous knowledge of vending massage chairs shall have priority consideration 4. Prior Telemarketing training certificate is a plus 5. We will provide free training programs up to 90 days before assigning the exclusive territories and executing the sales agent formal contract to prequalified Candidates 6. We provide hot leads to Qualified Candidates with executed NCND and Sales Rep Agreement in Places, and may help the first 1-3 deals during the free training period 7. We provide free training materials/ business cards/ start up package 8. We will provide protected and exclusive territory protection to the top one candidate after the free training period of 90 days. 9. We provide large inventory of Best producing vending massage chairs on East and West coast for immediate delivery and installations 10. We provide 24/7 technical supports for service all of Vending massage chairs nationwide 11. Professional phone manner is required. Previous outside sales rep experience is a Plus. 12. Good credit rate and no previous crime convictions from any of the candidates applying to any of the positions, WITH NO PENDING IRS LIENS OR JUDGMENT LIENS AGAINST HIM/HER! We will authorize the sales reps to open the Cash Box monthly to verify and handle the Cash in his/her sales territory! B: 18 Telemarketing Specialists: We are looking for 18 Telemarketing Specialists Your specific Job decription shall be: 1. Find names and contact telephone or extension/direct email address and direct fax number of the final decision maker who is authorized to sign the leasing agreement and accept our vending massage chairs in their business floor;  2. Do the initial pre-qualification and phone and email presentation to prequalify the entire list and decide which suspects, which are the prospects; are  3. If prospect is interested to see the product or see the presentation; either Set up presentation appointments for MPVF's outside sales rep in any place (either their corporation office or some retail store where there is our vending massage chairs so that they can meet face to face with our local sals rep, for the presentation.  4. Mark and document all the calling notes and results for both suspects and prospects in MPVF's Google Shared Docs and Folders daily;  You would tele-market the following large special account categories (part time or full time as independent contract base ( 1099):  1. All Casinos in USA ( except few assigned ones to other local reps already by sales contracts.) 2. All shopping malls( except few assigned ones to other local reps already by sales contracts.) 3. Regional or national chains of retirement centers; 4. Regional or national chains of five star Hotel Lobby and waiting area;( except few assigned ones to other local reps already by sales contracts.) 5. Regional or National chains of Fitness centers,( except few assigned ones to other local reps already by sales contracts.) 6. National and regional chains of high-end restaurant chain’s waiting area;(like Red lobsters etc.)( except few assigned ones to other local reps already by sales contracts.) 7. National and regional chains oif beauty salon and skin care shops; 8. National or regional Train station's waiting areas; 9. National and regional ground bus station waiting area; 10. National or regional chains of family fun centers (Chuckee Cheese, Disneyland, etc.) 11. Over 30,000.00 truck stops and rest areas for truck drivers, 12. All the major US Airport waiting areas; 13. National and regional chains of hospital waiting areas; 14. National and regional chains of oil change and mechanic shops waiting areas; 15. National and regional chains of Dental offices 16.National and regional chains of Nursing homes, 17. National and regional chains of Movie theater Chain’s waiting and rest areas, 18. National and regional chains of Bowling Alley waiting and rest area;  We will provide you one of the above most updated industry mailing list to call. You will be working with our corporation office staff and local sales reps.  Qualification of the Telemarketing Specialists: 1. Must have at least 5 years’ telemarketing experience as independent contractor base, with good and verifiable good performances and references; 2. Previous certification or education in the telemarketing is a Must; 3. Any prior working experiences in any of the 18 industries shall be a Plus;  The Telemarketing Specialist’s compensation plans are as follows:  1. $250.00 or $500.00 pre-qualification fee per confirmed appointment with prequalified leads from above. $250 per chair under 500 locations, and $500 per chair with over 501 locations; payable upon the fully execution of the leasing contract & delivery & installation of the chairs for the special accounts.  2. 1.5% or 0.75% residual income of MPVF’s monthly profit for each income producing vending massage chair to telemarketing specialist who initialed and prequalified the chain and set up the presentation with the right decision maker for each chain. 1.5% residual for the chains of over 501 locations, including 500 locations. 0.75% residual for the chains of less than 500 locations, for the term of the agreement.   C: 10 District Managers: 10 full time only as District sales managers (W-2) to cover the 10 large regions of USA: 1. Pacific Northwest region; 2. Southwest region; 3. Rocky Mountains region; 4.Midwest region; 5.Texas region; 6. The South region, 7.Mid-Atlantic Region; 8.New England Region; 9.Florida Region. 10. California Region. The 10 US regional Sales managers shall be chosen & promoted from our top producing independent sales managers in normal circumstances unless candidate has over 10 years of successful sales and sales management experience in the Vending Massage Chair Marketing AND location LACATING Industry Only ,must provide at least 5 verifiable references from vending industries ( supplies or customers only). Full time District Managers shall have: • a monthly Base Salary • Travel expenses allowance • Finder’s fee and Residual profit splitting plan for any deals closed directly by the District Manager • Medical benefits and 401K pension plans plus overrides of Finder’s and residual profit plan for all the sales and income producing vending massage chairs in that Whole District(Please read the following qualifications for District Managers.) If you want to build a residual income you can retire on, this could be the position for you! If you want to make unlimited income in this opportunity by working from your home office, please send your resume for consideration! Please email your recent resume to: david@ucvcfunding.com only. Don’t Call please! Please visit our website for basic info of our product: www.mpvendingfranchise.com . Do not call us before you sending your resume first. We will contact you for a phone interview. For those applying for District Managers; we will conduct phone interview first, then might fly you to Los Angeles, California to do a face to face interview.
Compensation: •	Higher finder’s fee ( $45 to $125 per chair) •	Higher residual profit sharing plan; 10% of the monthly gross of MPVF’s share per chair •	Medical benefits

Title: Assembler
Description: Volt Workforce Solutions is searching for 1st and 2nd Shift Assemblers for our client Schneider Electric in Oxford, Ohio.FORTUNE and Forbes magazines have recognized Schneider Electric as a top employer through listings based on employee feedback.  First, FORTUNE named Schneider in the top ten 2019 Best Workplaces in Manufacturing & Production.  And Forbes has named Schneider as a 2019 America’s Best Employers for New Grads! Both awards are based on employee feedback and are a testament to the #SEGreatPeople we have working at Schneider Electric.  “We accept our people as they are, celebrating our differences so that every person feels uniquely valued and safe to be their best self.” – Aamir Paul, Country President, U.S. Available Shifts and Pay Rate:1st Shift – Monday through Thursday  6:00 am – 4:30 pm - $12.002nd Shift - Monday through Thursday  4:30 pm - 3:00 am - $12.00Responsibilities:*Sets-up and operates equipment, including tooling and controls.*Makes necessary gauge adjustments and settings.*Selects proper raw stocks and checks against blueprint specifications.*Segregates, sorts, and disposes of scrap and writes scrap tickets.*Counts, reports and records production.*Transports material and changes truck batteries within acceptable limits.*Maintains quality and productivity standards.*Obtains and epoxy wraps bus-way according to specifications utilizing all necessary tools and equipment to perform the job.*Coats surfaces of manufactured and purchased articles or equipment with finishing or protective material.*Uses foam packer.*Operates hoists.*Assemble all types of devices, working from blueprints, sketches and other established procedures and data.*Alter parts to suit assemblies as required. Inspect, label, pack and identify assemblies as required.*Processes labels.*Maintains equipment, including daily cleaning, dusting, tightening bolts, detection of and reporting of abnormal conditions (heat, vibration, noise & leaks).*Maintains good housekeeping and adheres to plant regulations and safety rules.*Assist with hanging and removing of parts on the powder coat line.*Hanging and removing parts on the paint line.*Selects, measures, cuts and assembles lumber and crates products as required. Skills:*Ability to lift 26 lbs without assistance*Demonstrated ability to successfully perform multiple tasks in a fast-paced environment*Must be able to pass background and drug test.*Must have diploma or GED.If interested, please apply or call Terry at 513-302-4465 or email Volt is an Equal Opportunity Employer.

Title: Home Improvement Service Technician
Description: Home Improvement Service Technician;     Leaf Filter is the #1-rated professionally installed gutter protection system in America, as rated by the largest consumer reporting magazine. LeafFilter North, is the exclusive provider of the Leaf Filter Gutter Protection System in the United States and Canada. We installed over $347 million in gutter protection in 2018 and we are projecting to install 0ver $500 million in 2019!  Leaf Filter Service Techs install and service America’s best gutter protection system. They work to provide remarkable customer service and uphold Leaf Filter’s reputation of quality and integrity. They take pride in their ability to do things the right way, the first time, every time!  You don’t need experience with gutters or gutter protection to qualify for this position, but you MUST have experience in a construction related field. The service tech needs to have a reliable vehicle with the ability to transport ladders. The Tech must have ladders and hand tools. Work hours are Monday - Friday 40 -48 hours per week. It's a great position for someone looking to make a new career.  In order to qualify you must demonstrate the following skills: • Sound Construction knowledge • Basic remodeling/Carpentry experience • Professional demeanor • Excellent communication skills / strong time management • Drive a Truck, SUV, or Van that can hold material and work ladders.  Some of our best technicians came from these backgrounds: • Cable or satellite  • Roofing/Siding • Gutter industry • Exterior Painters  Service Technicians receive the following company benefits: • Paid Training • $40,000.00 – 45,000.00 Starting salary based on experience • Company paid gas card • Medical benefits after 90-days of employment • Growth within the company / We promote from within  Contact Derrick Szepiela at 419-467-9448

Title: Detailer/Light Mechanic - Shelbyville, IN
Description: About us Superior Auto is one of the nation’s largest privately-held automotive retailers specializing in buy-here pay-here financing.  Founded in 1975, we have grown from our original location in Fort Wayne, Indiana to over 65 locations in Indiana, Michigan, Ohio and Kentucky. Our comprehensive training program is designed to provide a great opportunity for the right candidate.   If you have a proven track record of success and take pride in delivering top-notch customer service, then come grow with us!  What We Offer In addition to being part of an industry leading team, you'll enjoy an excellent benefits package including the following: Competitive rate of pay, we pay for experience!!! Medical, Dental, Vision, FSA Life Insurance Tuition Reimbursement 401(k) and profit sharing Paid Vacation, Paid Sick Days, and Paid Personal Days including your birthday! Sundays off + 1 weekday  Responsibilities  As a Detailer/Mechanic, you will have a high level of accountability for our inventory such as: Ensuring the dealership looks exciting and inviting to customers Utilizing your mechanical skills to evaluate and repair inventory Assisting the front office with customer service and collections Detailing vehicles   Qualifications  While customer service is the #1 skill you can bring to our team, the following skills and attributes will be integral to your success: High school diploma or GED preferred but not required Previous detailing and/or auto mechanical experience Good communication and interpersonal skills Self-motivation and a strong desire to succeed Goal and solutions-oriented Ability to adapt, learn and execute in a fast-paced team environment Valid driver’s license and good driving record Computer literacy  Superior Auto, Inc. is an Equal Opportunity Employer  Apply @ www.superior-auto.com/careers

Title: Tired of Driving Uber? Become a Roadside Technician
Description: Pop-A-Lock of Indianapolis is looking for a full-time car door unlocking (CDU)/ Roadside Service technician with a desire to learn and advance within our company as an apprentice locksmith. We are seeking a reliable, hardworking self-starter who is able to work independently while also being a dependable part of our team.  Ideal Candidate  -mechanically inclined  -trainable and willing to learn new skills  -problem solving skills  -excellent communication skills  -excellent customer service skills  -must be courteous and honest  -You have open availability including nights, weekends, and holidays  -You are drug-free (drug screening required)  -You live in the Nashville/ Franklin or surrounding area  We are military-friendly and appreciate the value of military experience.  Candidates for consideration must clear a background check and a drug screen, and must have a valid IN driver's license with a clean driving record.  You must provide a DMV Report.  Tools and training will be provided. Training and apprenticeship in auto, residential and commercial locksmith work will gradually follow based on the candidate's progress and performance as a Car Door Unlocking/ Roadside Service technician.  COMPENSATION -Hourly rate plus tips and overtime  REQUIREMENTS  -Courteous personality with excellent customer service skills  - Dependability, integrity and honesty a must  - Able to work weekends/evenings/holidays  - Favorable references  - Clean driving record  - Drug free  Build a career and become a Locksmith!

Title: Account Representive - Logansport
Description: About us  Superior Auto is one of the nation’s largest privately-held automotive retailers specializing in buy-here pay-here financing.      Founded in 1975, we have grown from our original location in Fort Wayne, Indiana to over 65 locations in Indiana, Michigan, Ohio and Kentucky. Our comprehensive training program is designed to provide a great opportunity for the right candidate.   If you have a proven track record of success and take pride in delivering top-notch customer service, then come grow with us!  What We Offer In addition to being part of an industry leading team, you'll enjoy an excellent benefits package including the following:          Competitive rate of pay.  We pay for experience!!!          Medical, Dental, Vision, FSA          Life Insurance          Tuition Reimbursement          401(k) and profit sharing          Paid Vacation, Paid Sick Days, and Paid Personal Days including your birthday!          Sundays off + 1 weekday  Responsibilities As an Account Representative, you will have a high level of accountability for customer account functions such as:          Working with customers to manage their accounts          Cash handling          Assisting with vehicle sales and financing          Utilizing collection tools to maximize dealership’s profitability  Qualifications While customer service is the #1 skill you can bring to our team, the following skills and attributes will be integral to your success:          High school diploma or GED          Previous face-to-face customer service experience or customer care experience          Excellent communication and interpersonal skills          Self-motivation and a strong desire to succeed          Goal and solutions-oriented          Ability to adapt, learn and execute in a fast-paced team environment          Valid driver’s license and good driving record          Computer proficiency  Superior Auto, Inc. is an Equal Opportunity Employer Apply @ www.superior-auto.com/careers

Title: Drillers and Driller Assistants
Description: ProLink Resources has openings for Drillers & Driller Assistants currently in Indianapolis, IN.The Driller and Driller Assistant will be responsible for all tasks related to environmental drilling.  This is with an award-winning firm, and perks of the position include benefits, paid holidays/PTO, and opportunity for growth!  Job Responsibilities:  Perform work using auger, rotary, and coring drilling equipment Perform other subsurface sampling techniques Install monitoring wells Collect soil samples Adjust equipment on the rig as necessary Remove dirt, rock, and other sediment Requires heavy lifting  Requirements:  Must have a valid Driver's License Must be able to life 100 lbs Must be able to travel  ProLink Resources is an equal opportunity employer. All applicants will be considered for employment without attention to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, veteran or disability status.
Compensation: Driller $16-$24 per hour; Driller Assistant $14-$16 per hour

Title: Caregiver hiring event 12/12 1pm-4:30pm
Description: Senior Home Companions Recruitment open house-Thursday 12/12 from 1pm-4:40pm Drop in any time between 1pm and 4:30pm to be interviewed and learn more about being a Caregiver with Senior Home Companions. Located at 8445 Keystone Crossing in suite 250. If you can’t make this event please text the word “start’ to 317-854-0275 to complete a short pre-screen and possibly set up an interview.  If you want to be part of a supportive, mission driven team that works together to help seniors in your community maintain active and engaged lives, then Senior Home Companions is the place for you!  Job Description___________________________________________________    Senior Home Companions caregivers provide tailored, personal services for each unique client they serve. After having a thoughtful conversation with the client and family, we hand-pick caregivers who will align with them and present the opportunity to the selected caregivers. Duties may include but are not limited to: • Personal Care • Companionship • Housekeeping Services • Transportation • Meal Preparation • Medication Reminders • Dementia Care • Fall Prevention  Benefits ______________________________________________________________ • Flexible Work Schedules • Short shift premium • Holiday Shift Premium • Continuing Education Opportunities • Joining a supportive and caring team  Job Requirements_____________________________________________________ • A valid driver’s license, auto insurance, and reliable transportation • 18 years of age
Compensation: $10-$11.25 an hour depending on experience and licenses

Title: Merchant Account Reps - First Ever Opportunity - No Competition
Description: Are you selling (or have you sold) merchant processing? Tired of price compression?  Do you wish you had a unique value add to acquire merchant accounts and close up to 70% more sales? We have it - it's a proprietary technology - and it's free for merchants, we guarantee to match or beat their pricing & it works with surcharging and cash discounting – that means no credit card fees for merchants!  We have a proprietary software technology that we have developed that integrates with our payment terminals. It assists them with online reputation management. We pay upfront bonuses and cover terminal costs. Agents - use this unique tool to stand out from the competition. The sale is value, not pricing, and our technology is fully compatible with cash discounting and surcharging.  Requirements - Minimum one year of merchant processing experience or willingness to see 20 businessowners per day - Reliable transportation - Valid driver's license  Training - We provide full training - in-person or virtual

Title: Looking for a better career opportunity in warehousing?
Description: American Freight Service is looking for motivated individuals to meet our customer needs within the warehousing industry. We are currently hiring for full time positions at our Franklin Indiana location.   Are you looking for a better opportunity to work for a company who values their employees, compensates you for your hard work, and provides job security within the warehousing industry? AFS is it!  We are not a "temp to hire" company, when you start with AFS you are a valued AFS employee from day 1.  We do not sell dreams, only the opportunity for you to be employed by a company that works with you to achieve yours.   Here are just a few benefits to being an AFS employee.     Compensation:    We start at $16 an hour with additional incentives for a 90 day training period. After the 90 day training period  full incentivized positions are available. Our incentivized pay scale allows employees to be compensated accordingly for their hard work. AFS incentivized employees average $20+ an hour / $40-$60k yr. and receive medical, 401k, and boot reimbursement among other great perks.          Potential hires must:    Have a valid drivers license  Have two forms of identification  Be drug free  Undergo a background evaluation  Be able to lift at least 75 pounds  Follow and work safely within protocols  Have basic math skills  Have basic computer knowledge  Have the ability to multi-task   These are some of the requirements to be considered and succeed with our company. A full job description detailing everything is included upon an interview and once hired. AFS is a great company to work for that takes care of their employees.     If you are interested in joining our team submit your application on our website at,   americanfreightservice.com    "Click on Employment, then pre-application form.      Dave Norris  American Freight Service
Compensation: $16 hr 90 day training / Incetivesed pay after trained and certified

Title: HOLIDAY LIGHTING INSTALLER
Description: Looking for a Full-Time crew for Holiday Lighting: This is a high-end operation, working on homes, estates and commercial projects. We install string lights, wreaths and garland for seasonal lighting scenes across the Nashville area. We work from sunup to sundown 5+ days a week for 2 months before the Christmas holiday, then we take it all down in January. The season begins in mid-October, through mid-December with take downs in January, or until everything is down and packed away. That’s typically around 3 months of work. We typically work 35-50 hours a week once the season hits. We need energetic, enthusiastic and safety conscious help. We are hoping to find someone with a great attitude and drive with the possible opportunity to become a Full-Time employee after the holiday season is over.  You will be asked to move and climb ladders, climb trees, and maneuver up onto roofs, to hang lights.  Heights should not be a problem for you. You should be able to carry bins weighing up to 60 lbs. You should be comfortable working in the cold. You should bring your own meals, snacks, and hydration.  You should have a valid driver’s license and reliable transportation.   Please have a clean professional appearance, and attitude.  The starting rate for holiday work is $15, which covers all the basic expectations. A rate of $16 can be unlocked very quickly with a good attitude and initiative. A rate of $17 can be unlocked with a demonstrated increase in production, speed, and attention to details. A rate of $18 can be unlocked with absolute demonstration of productivity, speed, accuracy, and independence.  *There is no smoking or vaping on the job site or in the vans. *There are no bathrooms available on job sites.  Drug and alcohol use is forbidden.    The weather outside is frightful, so dress accordingly!

Title: Caregiver
Description: Apply Now: https://www.surveygizmo.com/s3/1066887/Mature-Caregivers?utm_source=craigslist&utm_medium=classified&utm_campaign=craigslist_indy  Caregiver Mature Caregivers is a leading in-home care company providing experienced and dedicated caregivers to families in need of assistance for one of their members. Our mature, age 50-plus, employees seek to improve health and daily living experiences to enhance the quality of life for our clients. Our services range from companionship to full-time care 24 hours per day/7 days per week. Join our dedicated and passionate team of caregivers in one of the following capacities:  Companion Duties include: - Conversation & Companionship - Some Meal Preparation - Light Housekeeping - Errand Services - Grocery Shopping - Incidental Transportation - Laundry & Linen Washing - Clothes Shopping - Recreational Activities - Grooming & Dressing Guidance - Organize Incoming Mail  Certified Nurse Assistant (CNA) / Personal Care Aide Duties include (in addition to those listed above): - Bathing - Mobility - Transferring & Positioning - Incontinence Care - Medication Reminders - Oral Hygiene - Special Diet/Meal Preparation - Feeding - Toileting  Job Requirements: - Current Driver's License - Social Security Card - Level 2 AHCA Background Screening  Apply Now: https://www.surveygizmo.com/s3/1066887/Mature-Caregivers?utm_source=craigslist&utm_medium=classified&utm_campaign=craigslist_indy

Title: Part Time Help Wanted (Entry Level):interview immediately
Description: Our local offices have entry level openings in customer sales & service to fill immediately. No experience is necessary as we provide simple but effective training. The starting pay rate is $15 guaranteed base/appt. but there is an opportunity to make more based on performance with our company. The position entails working with new customers face to face and servicing our existing customers as well. We have part time schedules available and are sensitive to school schedules as we have great experience working with students. Seasonal openings available for those who just want to work around the holidays.  Position Details: *Great starting pay *No experience necessary, we train *Flexible schedules *No cost to start *Customer sales and service *Company scholarship program based on work performance  All ages 18 & older are welcome to apply and some conditions apply  Click  here to fill out an online application. 1st come, 1st serve        Working at Vector Marketing is perfect for those who are looking for part time, seasonal, full time, temporary, holiday, or those just looking for a flexible work opportunity. No experience needed (entry level). All ages eighteen +. We have reps who work with us from all backgrounds - customer service; retail; office work; stocking shelves at a warehouse like Amazon or Costco; as a driver for uber, lyft, or doordash; as a server; receptionist; sales rep; cashier; fast food; barista at Starbucks or Panera Bread; stocked shelves at Walmart or Target; restaurant work, call center; telemarketing; entry-level; bus boy; college student; contractors; data entry; gig economy user; hostess; host; freelance worker; network marketing; intern; internships; marketing; advertising; copywriting; salesperson; part-time; babysitter; retail associate; temp; babysitting; communications; administrative assistant; admin work; student work; work from home; remote work; landscaping; mowing people’s lawns; dog walking, etc….. We can train you to do well with us!

Needs Thursday, flexible other day afternoons MOORESVILLE: DAILY 9A-11A AND 8P-10P (WILL PAY MORE FOR THIS CASE PER HOUR) WESTFIELD: TWO 4 HOUR SHIFTS WEEKLY FISHERS: 4-7P M,W,F INDY CENTRAL WEST:  7P-10P  T,TH,F  INDY CENTRAL: MONDAY AND FRIDAY 2P-5P (LOOKING FOR ONE CONSISTENT PERSON)  AND DAY SHIFT FOR INDIANAPOLIS AND SURROUNDING COUNTIES!! Valid Driver's license, reliable vehicle, Valid car insurance (will need TB skin tests prior to working out in the field, & CPR certification-before the 90 day probation ends)  Clover Senior Care is a licensed Personal Service Agency founded 51/2 years ago by a nurse with a mission; to provide GREAT care that goes above and beyond for seniors, veterans, and the disabled.We offer flexible scheduling to accommodate candidates looking for full-time or part-time.Job  Types: Full-time, Part-time Salary: $11/HR TO 12/HR!! Title: Amazon Warehouse Team Members in Indianapolis - Earn up to $16.00!
Description: Amazon is now hiring holiday warehouse team members in Indianapolis!Hourly Pay Rate: Up to $16.00Amazon warehouse jobs are a great way to start earning money with or without experience in a distribution center, factory, or warehouse. Many people who become local warehouse associates have already worked in fulfillment and distribution, (such as a forklift drivers, warehouse picker, shipping and receiving, warehouse packing, warehouse stocking, distribution center jobs, food warehouse jobs, and overnight or night shift warehouse jobs).
